TEXT_AN_BACKBUTTON_DESC.text: Would you like to quit the game?

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0001.text: Well… There's no help to it, then. I need your help, hero of Hasla.

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0002.text:
My name is #&$#$.
 Haha, I'm sure you've seen me around.

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0003.text: Or rather, think you've seen me around.

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0004.text: You see, I'm not the person you think I am.

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0005.text: But let's stop the small talk. We're here at L.C,

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0006.text:
the mysterious company nestled deep within the lands of Hasla.
Usually the place should be bustling with devs,

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0007.text: busy developing the features for the next update…

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0008.text: But… an unfortunate turn of events resulted in an infestation of 'bugs,'

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0009.text: contaminating all the devs and ruining their schedule.

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0010.text:
I'm here to make a small request:
save all the developers from these 'bugs'

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0011.text:
Simple, right?
How to save them, you ask?

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0013.text:
Hey, don't worry too much. I'll be helping you,
 in the form of a Goddess nice enough to lend me her physical form.

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_0014.text: Now, if you use a 3-chain, the Gatekeeper will open the way for you.

TEXT_A_WR_DG_BUGLC_INIT.text:
Huh? How did you…?
 Is it because of 'them' that you arrived here…?

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_ATK_1.text: A crude ring given to all new students of the Roman Republic Military Academy. Nobody - not even the professors, and certainly not the students themselves - knows the reason behind its bestowment. A faint aura of mana shrouds the ring's red stone.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_ATK_2.text: A red bejeweled ring given to the best students of the Roman Republic Military Academy. The mana held within the glowing scarlet jewel is much greater than that of other red rings, and amplifies the owner's strength and courage.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_ATK_3.text: "Ares's Rage" is an enchanted ring given to the senator of the Roman Republic Grand Council who succeeds the name of "Ares," as well as Ares's troops, the "Golden Galeas of the Battlefield." The ring intensifies its owner's fighting strength, but simultaneously makes him excessively belligerent.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_ATK_4.text: With its beautiful red jewel overflowing with mana and decorated with elaborate golden engravings, this ring is given to all "Golden Galeas of the Battlefield" whenever Senator Ares claims victory in battle. While it does heighten one's physical strength to the utmost, the ring has been nicknamed "Ares's Wrath" for the excessive cruelty it awakens within the heart of its owner.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_ATK_5.text: Ares despairs over how inhumanely violent "Ares's Wrath" makes him and his troops, and asks for Hades's blessing over the ring as to minimize the effects of its madness. Ares then gives the ring a new name - "Ares's Awakening" - and asks Athena about the truth behind their rings.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_ATK_6.text: It is revealed that the rings of Roman had beeen made by the Goddess Chronos, who had foreseen the resurrection of Manacar. The rings, made of manatium, would leech on the mana of the Apostle and to keep its power at bay. After realizing the significance of his ring, Ares trains both his body and mind to expel the evil aura that the ring holds. He succeeds and the ring is thus reforged into "Ares's Transcendence," a ring of pure strength.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_DMG_1.text: Zeus was famous from his infancy for having been born with the powers of lightning. Despite his parents' wishes for him to attend Roman's Military Academy, the ever liberal Zeus instead creates his own fan club, "Thunder Worshippers," giving noble rings with the power of lightning to the members.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_DMG_2.text: Out of the Thunder Worshippers, who are comprised of those who admire Zeus's strength, Zeus picks the best and most trustworthy warriors as members of his own guard, and presents them with noble azure rings.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_DMG_3.text: After many victories on the battlefield, Zeus is eventually elected as a senator of Olympus. He officially incorporates the Thunder Worshippers into the "Thunderstorm Troops," and bestows upon them the azure ring passed down generations of Zeuses and their subordinates. Everyone, including Zeus himself, is quite pleased with their new rings, named "Zeus's Lightning."

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_DMG_4.text: Senator Zeus and the Thunderstorm Troops claim victory over every battle and hunt they participate in, as a result, become the most popular of senators and their armies in Roman. As a reward, Zeus receives rings of "Zeus's Thunderstorm," which he passes out equally among the elite of the Thunderstorm Troops.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_DMG_5.text: Both "Zeus's Lightning" and "Zeus's Thunderstorm" grant immense courage to their owners - but simultaneously render them excessively free-spirited. When his soldiers begin refusing to follow orders, and even desert the army, Zeus instills his own powers of lightning into the rings to alleviate their effects: the rings of "Zeus's Fulmination."

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_DMG_6.text: Yet when even the provision of "Zeus's Fulmination" does not stop Zeus's soldiers from deserting the Thunderstorm Troops, the concerned Zeus searches through the confidential documents of the Council for a solution. When he realizes that the rings of Olympus have been made of manatium to restrain the Apostle Manacar, Zeus - declaring that he cannot lose to a mere Apostle - pours all his powers of lightning into the rings to make the perfect "Zeus's Radiance."

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_PROB_1.text: A ring given only to students of the Special Training class of the Roman Republic Military Academy. As its name forbodes, omnious occurences - strange accidents, or cases of sleepwalking - affect the owner of the ring, but the students think of them merely as part of an initiation process. There has been a rumor that the ring is somehow related to the Tower of Manacar.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_PROB_2.text: Only the best students of the Special Training class - those who have survived the intense training and have been informed of the secret special forces troop, the "Styx" brigade - receive this ring. The grim mana concentrated within the ring's amythest stone simultaneously strengthens and tortures its owner.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_PROB_3.text: It is revealed that the ordeals caused by the "Ominous Amethyst Ring" are, in fact, part of the entrance exams of Roman's Special Forces. Those who overcome their ring's trials are recruited into the "Styx" Special Forces, led by Senator Hades of the Roman Republic Grand Council "Olympus." Hades himself gives his blessing over the ring in order to neutralize the ominous spirit within; this "Hades's Blessing" is the telling mark of Styx members.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_PROB_4.text: A ring given only to the veteran members of the Styx Special Forces, who have carried out countless missions of assassination with Senator Hades. While the ring's amethyst jewel is much bigger and more beautiful, and thus carries much more mana, Hades's blessing prevents any bad luck from harming its owner and instead strengthens one's courage and fortitude.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_PROB_5.text: Despite Hades and the Styx Forces' efforts to stop the fallen Persephone, her evil spirit corrupts all who come near her. Hades despairs over being unable to protect his troops, and climbs the Peaks of Glory to pray to the spirits of his ancestors. Hades finally manages to exorcise the shadow of evil through the light of his ancestors, and creates the ring of "Hades's Auspice" to give to his subordinates.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_CRIT_PROB_6.text: The spirits of Hades's ancestors reappear in his dreams, and asks Hades to judge and punish the new evil, Persephone. In order to repay his debt to his ancestors, Hades engraves an amethyst jewel with much stronger mana to create the ring of "Hades's Judgment." Over their newly forged rings, he and the members of Styx vow to punish Persephone to the end, and begin their long search for the Hermit Queen.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_DEF_1.text: A golden and very durable ring given to students of the Defense Guardian class, the hardest course at Roman's Military Academy. Competition to enroll in this course is very harsh, as students get first priority to enlist in the "Guardians of the Sun," the army led by Senator Athena of Olympus.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_DEF_2.text: Only the best of the Defense Guardian class of the Military Academy receive the "Hard Ebony Ring." The mana within the ebony jewel embedded in the middle of the ring helps the wearer retain a heart of honor and pride, and so immerse themselves even more in their training.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_DEF_3.text: A ring given to Senator Athena and members of the "Guardians of the Sun." The obsidian jewel of "Athena's Guardianship" shines brilliantly with mana, but as the jewel is small, so not to bother handling one's shield, only a few are aware of its beauty. The jet mana strengthens both body and mind of the wearer, as if becoming a living shield.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_DEF_4.text: Athena begins to question why wearing "Athena's Guardianship" induces her to forget everything at times. After much research, she finds the records left by the first Athena of Roman, and discovers the truth: that the rings passed among the generations of Olympus senators were made of manatium, in order to keep Manacar at bay. In order to continue her ancestors' will, Athena envelops the ring with an aura of protection.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_DEF_5.text: Yet the light of protection with which Athena bound "Athena's Protection" did not prove to be eternal. While foraging through ancient parchments, Athena discovers that one can concentrate the will of protection and light into the holy laurel stone. She embeds such a gem in the newly forged ring in order to restrain its aura of obliviousness.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_DEF_6.text: Yet Athena does not stop at forging "Athena's Tutelage." After training to revive her sense of iron justice and strong pride, Athena succeeds in imbursing her will into the ring and binding the evil spirit of Manacar within. Athena names the newly made ring "Athena's Glory," and it is said that the ring always brings Athena proud victory.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_RST_1.text: The first senator to be granted the name of "Hera" was the queen of Roman, who, in the stead of the runaway king, stayed behind on the battlefield with her ladies-in-waiting to deliver relief supplies and nurse the injured. The queen always insisted on wearing very plain clothes - save for the ornate ring on her finger.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_RST_2.text: When people of Roman discover that the queen's silver ring had been bequeathed to her by her mother, they collect silver in order to forge it into a much more elegant design. Ornate silver rings, fashioned after that of the reigning Hera of the battlefield, becomes something of a fad among the nobility of Roman.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_RST_3.text: After the end of the Apostles' War, the first Hera is elected to the Olympus Council by her people. After hearing the story of Manacar from Goddess Chronos, Hera decides after long council to accept responsibility over manatium: the element that absorbs Manacar's mana and weakens its power. So the first manatium ring is created: the ring of "Hera's Breath."

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_RST_4.text: The realization that Manacar's Fury seeps out of "Hera's Breath" drives the first Hera to seek Goddess Chronos's help. The goddess infuses both the strength of Cora and the gentle will of Hera into the ring to restrain the Fury. Naming the newly forged ring "Hera's Caress," Chronos requests the queen to pass down the ring and its responsibility to the future lineage of Heras.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_RST_5.text: The passing of years weakens the spirit of Cora within "Hera's Caress." The present-day Hera decides that the ring must be protected with more will of light, and - together with members of the "Rainbow of Benevolence," who have served "Hera"s for generations - imbues benevolence and love into the ring, which becomes the gently glowing "Hera's Benevolence."

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_RST_6.text: When Manacar's Fury began to seep out from even "Hera's Benevolence," Hera heads to the Temple of Mount Olympus. Extraordinarily, all monsters of the mountain flee before the light of benevolence that shines from her. After Hera's long prayer, the desire for peace of all the Heras throughout the years becomes a brilliant azure gleam that encompasses the ring and creates "Hera's Prayer."

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_VAMP_1.text: A rusty ring whose original owner and identity are a mystery. It was discovered near the Tower of Manacar, and is presently being researched by the Styx Special Forces, led by Olympus senator Hades of the Roman Republic Grand Council. A faint aura of mana can be felt from the ring's round ebony stone.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_VAMP_2.text: When a Styx member cuts his finger and spills a drop of blood on the rusty ring, the ring's stone absorbs the blood and starts emitting a gentle sheen. The Council issues a vow of secrecy against discussing this strange occurence, and begins the long search to find the ring's original owner.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_VAMP_3.text: One day, Persephone, the last hidden Olympus senator dubbed the "Hermit Queen," awakens from her long slumber. Due to her incredible hold of mana, she had been asked by Goddess Chronos to go to sleep under the influence of the manatium ring "Persephone's Thirst." Yet the numerous rings on her fingers taint Persephone with their odious aura, and so the Hermit Queen wakes lusting for blood and mana.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_VAMP_4.text: It was through her mana that Persephone managed to stay alive during her slumber within a pool of blood, and through her ring that she recovered her spent mana. Yet through the years the spirit of Manacar ate away at her sleeping soul, whispering of greater power and bloodlust. It was only after Persephone succumbed to the darkness that the spirit informed her of a way to infuse greater amounts of her mana into other rings - through sacrificing blood.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_VAMP_5.text: The fallen and bloodthirsty Persephone ambushes the Council, stealing the remaining rings and fleeing to the Tower of Manacar. In return for delivering the rings to the spirit of Manacar, she obtains and absorbs some of the great amount of mana contained within them. And so the ring of imperfection is created: "Persephone's Lust."

TEXT_BACKGROUND_NEW_RING_ALL_VAMP_6.text: Thus due to Persephone the Tower of Manacar gradually regains its powers and begins shaking. Even before the abnomalies of the Tower Persephone is preoccupied only on accumulating more and more mana, evolving the ring into even more grotesque proportions. Yet even the new ring "Persephone's Folly" fails to satisfy her lust, and so Persephone disappears into the shadows - forever searching for stronger and more beautiful mana.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_ATK_5_KURENAI.text: In the ancient eastern lands, where mystical flames danced and wars blazed, a strange tale is told. A legend of a wandering swordsman who appears in the dark of night, wearing a demon mask blacker than shadows. Hushed whispers spoke of the carnage and slaughter wrought by the demon, and the people begin to wear rings engraved with that very demon's visage to keep themselves safe from his blade.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_ATK_5_KURENAI_H.text: The remains of the first Priestess of Ryu, buried on the slopes of the Primal Mountain. The ring is very old, but the engraved flames dance as if they are alive. On the inside is etched the words: "For thee I light the way to hidden truths."

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_ATK_6_KURENAI.text: Years pass and the rings become a talisman against not only the demon-swordsman, but all misfortune. They are now carved in holy silver for that very purpose. Do the rings really have such power? The answer is unknown, but the demon-swordsman slowly fades both into legend and from the people's memory. Forgotten, but real.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_CRIT_DMG_5_KURE.text: For years the swordsman in the black demon mask has been fighting the screams of the spirits that haunt him. Again and again he struggles to lower his blade, but each time, he is drenched in red. The swordsman loses himself to despair - until one day he meets a maiden, clothed in a garb of white and crimson.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_CRIT_DMG_6_KURE.text: The maiden, without revealing her name, silently begins to pray. With her hands clasped tight, her prayer silences the spirits for the first time. The swordsman, trembling in relief, looks upon the maiden who immediately weaves white and crimson threads into a talisman. After imbuing it with her life and blood she hands it to the swordsman. "You must go," she said. "Go to the Primal Mountain."

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_CRIT_PROB_5_KUR.text: The swordsman of the vile mask knows not where the Primal Mountain is. The maiden thinks for a moment, and then with a gentle gesture, calls forth from the heavens a lone bird. She speaks with the same gesture to the swordsman: follow that bird. The swordsman hesitates, he does not wish to leave her. Yet he must follow the bird, and so he begins his journey.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_CRIT_PROB_6_KUR.text: The road to the Primal Mountain is a difficult one. The bird, made of the maiden's power, slowly begins to fade into the sky with each step taken away from her. Days pass, and the bird is nothing more than a shade, a faint outline in the sky. So, the swordsman only looks to the sky as he journeys, terrified of losing the bird. Yet not even his desperation could bind a bird of the heavens to earth and it vanishes before his eyes. Lost, the swordsman stops... and despairs.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_DEF_5_EVENT_FUG.text: A ring given by a thankful Fergus to mercenary leaders who helped him test out his Ent Robot. Despite its name, wearing the ring doesn't actually increase chances of getting great success. How unfortunate.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_DEF_5_KURENAI.text: In a village lives a boy, living off the trinkets he makes. One night he dreams of a bird whose thunderous arrival splits the heavens before transforming into a Fire Dragon. It  asks the boy to, "guide the one who seeks the Primal Mountain." The boy thinks nothing of this dream at first, but the bird-dragon visits him night after night and slowly... the boy begins to believe.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_DEF_6_KURENAI.text: On the fateful night, the boy dreams once more, but this time the dragon, with its eyes blazing, says... "It is time." The night was silent as the boy awoke and as he cut through the dark in the pale moonlight. The light shattering against the brilliance of his white clothes. When at last he came face to face with the swordsman in the demon-mask he was strangely unafraid.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_RST_5_KURENAI.text: Who was the swordsman in the stories of old? The reaper haunting the darkest shadows of the night? The swordsman finally knew what he was. A vengeful spirit, the revenant of a bloody war in the eastern lands, long ago. Death had embraced him but he had not known. Sword in hand, he WAS the demon painted on his mask. In the crimson light the swordsman wept, in shame and resentment, until the light set his soul free. The boy realized only then that he too, had been weeping, and knew what he had to do.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_RST_6_KURENAI.text: The boy returns and begins to forge rings. Into it he engraves his sincerest desire for the souls sacrificed in war to find peace. The rings, awakened by his passion, glow with a crimson hue and become talismans against corruption. Yet, at the highest peak of the eastern lands, a vengeful spirit...

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_VAMP_5_KURENAI.text: The boy guides the swordsman and paves a path with the moon lighting the way. It was a path he had never trod before but it was strangely familiar. Halfway up the Primal Mountain the boy smells the acrid tang of blood over the scent of the moonlit grass. He turns and sees the blood dyeing each step of the swordsman. The boy gasps, but the swordsman shakes his head and gestures, "onward."

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_ALL_VAMP_6_KURENAI.text: The boy swallows his fears and presses on toward to the peak of the Primal Mountain. With every step the scent of blood thickened, and the swordsman's form faded. Not knowing how many dusks and dawns had passed, the pair reached the peak. In the flickering crimson of the volcano, the boy turns around to face the swordsman only to see his mask melt away.

TEXT_BACKGROUND_RING_FUGUS.text: A ring given by a thankful Fergus to mercenary leaders who helped him test out his Ent Robot. Despite its name, wearing the ring doesn't actually increase chances of getting great success. How unfortunate.

TEXT_BASIC_CENTER_MIRROR_01_DESC.text: A mirror with a wooden frame. Its simple design suits it for all rooms.

TEXT_BASIC_CENTER_PICTURE_01_DESC.text: A wooden frame encasing a simple picture.

TEXT_BASIC_CENTER_PICTURE_02_DESC.text: A wooden frame encasing a simple painting

TEXT_BASIC_CENTER_WINDOW_01_DESC.text: A wooden window. Basic and neat.

TEXT_BASIC_CENTER_WINDOW_02_DESC.text: A wooden window. Basic and neat. (Version B)

TEXT_BASIC_CENTER_WINDOW_03_DESC.text: A wooden window. Larger than the other models.

TEXT_BASIC_CENTER_WINDOW_WHITE_01_DESC.text: A wooden window painted in white. The perfect addition to a brightly colored room.

TEXT_BASIC_CENTER_WINDOW_WHITE_03_DESC.text: A wooden window painted in white. The perfect addition to a brightly colored room. Larger than the other models.

TEXT_BASIC_TOP_LAMP_01_DESC.text: A ceiling light for your room. It brightens the atmosphere, so to speak.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_ATTACK_ALL_INF.text: Total sum of <physical, magical, and neutral> damage done to the enemy.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_ATTACK_DPS_INF.text:
<Total Damage> divided by the playing time (seconds).
The higher the figure, the stronger the hero's attack abilities.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_ATTACK_MAGIC_D.text:
Damage caused by magical attacks. It is affected by the enemy's resistance.
Higher resistance penetration deals magical damage more effectively.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_ATTACK_NEUTRAL.text:
Damage caused by neutral attacks.
Neutral damage ignores the enemy's armor and resistance.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_ATTACK_PHYSICA.text:
Damage caused by physical attacks. It is affected by the enemy's armor.
Higher armor penetration deals physical damage more effectively.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_BLOCK_SPSKILL_.text: Number of special skills used in battle.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_BLOCK_USE_BLOC.text: Number of blocks used in battle.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_DEFENSE_ALL_IN.text: Total sum of <physical, magical, and neutral> damage taken from the enemy.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_DEFENSE_BARRIE.text:
Damage blocked by shield.
Counted separately from damage taken.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_DEFENSE_HEAL_I.text:
Amount of allies' HP healed.
Includes heal by life steal.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_DEFENSE_MAGIC_.text:
Magical damage received from enemy.
Higher resistance lowers this damage.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_DEFENSE_NEUTRA.text:
Damage that ignores the hero's armor and resistance.
Higher HP could prevent the dangers of neutral attacks.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_DEFENSE_PHYSIC.text:
Physical damage received from enemy.
Higher armor lowers this damage.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_TEAM_ATTACK_AL.text: Total damage dealt by team to enemy.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_TEAM_ATTACK_DP.text:
<Team Total Dmg> divided by the playing time (seconds).
The higher the figure, the stronger the team's attacking abilities.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_TEAM_USE_1CHAI.text: Number of 1-chains used by team in battle.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_TEAM_USE_2CHAI.text: Number of 2-chains used by team in battle.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_TEAM_USE_3CHAI.text: Number of 3-chains used by team in battle.

TEXT_BSTATISTICS_CATEGORY_TEAM_USE_SISTE.text: Number of goddess skills used in battle.

TEXT_BS_FUGUS_PHASE_DEF_ALL_2.text: I won't lose to you like this!

TEXT_BS_FUGUS_PHASE_DEF_ALL_3.text: You don't say... Do you enjoy this pain?!

TEXT_BS_FUGUS_PHASE_DEF_MAGIC_2.text: This anti-magic golden shield will protect my robot more strongly!

TEXT_BS_FUGUS_PHASE_DEF_MAGIC_3.text: Here's something stronger! It's going to hurt!

TEXT_BS_FUGUS_PHASE_DEF_NORMAL_2.text: I'm raising my shields - but not because it hurts or anything!

TEXT_BS_FUGUS_PHASE_DEF_NORMAL_3.text: Watch out, this will sting a bit!

TEXT_BS_FUGUS_PHASE_IDLE_2.text: I won't make the same mistake this time!

TEXT_BS_TOPDISH_COOK_POSION_BAN.text: What's this? Poison?! Get it away from me at once!!

TEXT_BUTTON_BLUETOOTH_FRIEND_DESC.text: Become friends with nearby users through Bluetooth.

TEXT_BUTTON_SEARCH_FRIEND_NAME_DESC.text: Send friend request to another user of Hasla.

TEXT_BUTTON_SEND_PROMOTION_MESSAGE_DESC.text: Share Crusader's Quest through various means.

TEXT_BUY_ITEM_LOCK_DESC.text:
Oops, your purchase was made, but it seems like you didn't receive them properly! 
Click 'Confirm' to attempt to restore your item(s).

TEXT_BUY_ITEM_RESTORE_FAIL_DESC.text:
Please try again in a few minutes.
If the problem is not solved restart the game or contact customer service.

TEXT_BUY_WITHDRAW_7DAY.text: You can withdraw your subscription within 7 days if you do not use the purchased item.

TEXT_CANNOT_PURCHASE_DAY.text: You have reached the maximum purchase limit. The limit will be reset everyday.

TEXT_CANNOT_PURCHASE_EXP_COUNT.text:
This item cannot be purchased. 
Please try again after the current buff is terminated.

TEXT_CANNOT_PURCHASE_LIMIT.text: You've reached the maximum purchase number. You are only able to purchase {0} times per account.

TEXT_CANNOT_PURCHASE_MONTH.text: You have reached the maximum number of purchases. Purchase limit will be initialized every 1st day of the month.

TEXT_CANNOT_PURCHASE_TICKET_EVENT.text: You do not have enough resources to enter the stage.

TEXT_CANNOT_PURCHASE_WEEK.text: You have reached the maximum number of purchases. Purchase limit will be initialized every Monday.

TEXT_CANNOT_USE_EXP_COUNT.text:
This item cannot be used.
You must wait until the current buff ends.

TEXT_CAUTION_BUFF_DESC.text: Currently buff is already on. Using new buff will overlap the previous buff. Confirm?

TEXT_CDN_WARNING_DESC.text: Data usage fees may be incurred. We recommend connecting to Wi-Fi. Also, make sure you have enough storage space in your device before proceeding.

TEXT_CHAMPION_DOMAIN_COMING_SOON.text: The force is getting ready at the Exchange Center.

TEXT_CHAMPION_DOMAIN_SUPPLY_FULL.text: You can send up to {0} heroes to the force.

TEXT_CHAMPION_DOMAIN_SUPPLY_GET_REWARD_B.text: You are able to send extra supplies after you acquire the reward.

TEXT_CHAMPION_DOMAIN_SUPPLY_MORE_DESC.text:
You are able to send extra supplies to the force. When Friendship level is full, you will receive a reward.
(Champion level won't increase.)

TEXT_CHAMPION_DOMAIN_SUPPLY_REWARD_NOT_Y.text: You are able to receive a reward when Friendship level is full.

TEXT_CHAMPION_FREE_DOMAIN_SUPPLY_REWARD_.text: Here are your supplies. Pack'em up.

TEXT_CHAMPION_GODDESS_DOMAIN_SUPPLY_REWA.text: A support kit from the Order has arrived.

TEXT_CHAMPION_MANAGE_STAT_DESC.text: Champion's stat is affected {0:p0} much by team member's stat. (Not influenced by effects, Berries, and Weapons)

TEXT_CHAMPION_MANAGE_TITLE_DESC.text: Champion's stats are effected by team member's stats. (Not influenced by effects, but berries and weapons are applicated)

TEXT_CHAMPION_MINO_DOMAIN_SUPPLY_REWARD_.text: I hope you get decent supplies!

TEXT_CHAMPION_NOS_DOMAIN_SUPPLY_REWARD_M.text: I hope the supplies help you a lot!

TEXT_CHAMPION_NO_CHAMPION_DESC.text: You cannot use a Champion on this stage.

TEXT_CHAMPION_NO_CHAMPION_UNLOCK.text: You have no champion you can use.

TEXT_CHAMPION_PACK_CONTENT.text: Here's the reward for purchasing a Champion Guaranteed Package!

TEXT_CHAMPION_PACK_COVER.text: The best choice for getting a Champion!

TEXT_CHAMPION_PACK_TYPE_1_NAME.text: Able to choose an unlocked hero

TEXT_CHAMPION_SELECT_HERO_SUBTITLE.text: Would you like to send selected Hero?

TEXT_CHAMPION_SELECT_HERO_WARN.text: Hero sent to the force won't come back.

TEXT_CHAMPION_SKILL_PREVIEW_DESC.text: You can see skill explanation by tapping skill icon.

TEXT_CHAMPION_SUPPLY_HERO_DESC.text: Heroes sent to champions do not return.

TEXT_CHAMPION_SUPPLY_LAST_HERO_DESC.text:
The Hero you've selected is
the last hero left of your mercenaries.

Proceed?

TEXT_CHAMPION_USE_AFTER_GET_CHAMPION.text: You are able to use after Champion is acquired.

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_DESC.text: The Guardian of Ryu, one of the three countries of the East. Kurenai is an incarnation of flame, born long ago from the embers of Primal Flames that the Tsukino family brought from the Primal Mountain. Kurenai has spent long years doing relatively nothing  - until she meets Himiko, the daughter of a family of warriors, and starts to interact with humans for the first time.

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: Kurenai uses "Slash of Red Lotus" to release flames that deal all enemies #physical damage# equal to ^500% of Kurenai's attack power.^

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_ACTIVE_LV1_NAME.text: Slash of the Red Lotus Lv1

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: Kurenai uses "Slash of Red Lotus" to release flames that deal all enemies #physical damage# equal to ^600% of Kurenai's attack power.^

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_ACTIVE_LV2_NAME.text: Slash of the Red Lotus Lv2

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: Kurenai uses "Slash of Red Lotus" to release flames that deal all enemies #physical damage# equal to ^700% of Kurenai's attack power.^

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_ACTIVE_LV3_NAME.text: Slash of the Red Lotus Lv3

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: Kurenai uses "Slash of Red Lotus" to release flames that deal all enemies #physical damage# equal to ^700% of Kurenai's attack power,^ and explode in 8 bursts each dealing #physical damage# equal to ^100% of attack power.^

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_ACTIVE_LV4_NAME.text: Slash of the Red Lotus Lv4

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: Kurenai uses "Slash of Red Lotus" to release flames that deal all enemies #physical damage# equal to ^700% of Kurenai's attack power,^ and explode in 8 bursts each dealing #physical damage# equal to ^200% of attack power.^

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_ACTIVE_LV5_NAME.text: Slash of the Red Lotus Lv5

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text: Kurenai's Slash of Red Lotus is ^recognized as a 3-chain attack^. Upon activation, all allies ^automatically activate their 3-chain skill,^ and ^1 block of non-leader allies^ are generated.

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_PASSIVE_LV1_DESC.text: ^Physical damage^ of all allies increase by ^10.5%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_PASSIVE_LV2_DESC.text: ^Physical damage^ of all allies increase by ^14%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_EAST_RYU_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: ^Physical damage^ of all allies increase by ^21.5%^. Additional armor penetration of 500 will be applied to all ^physical damage against boss monsters^.

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_DESC.text: The organization was composed of various warriors with self interests. There is a battle chariot in this organization but due to it's unstableness, only highly trained archers can ride it. Archers can shoot arrows steadily, thanks to horseman Winchester. It is common knowledge that a superior warrior is serving the horseman in the chariot.

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: The Freedom Heroes of Winchester's Carriage carry out an attack against the frontline enemy dealing #physical damage# equal to ^322% of Winchester's attack power.^ The carriage then rushes forward 1 time to additionally deal #physical damage# equal to ^75% of Winchester's attack power^ to all hit enemies.

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: The Freedom Heroes of Winchester's Carriage carry out an attack against the frontline enemy dealing #physical damage# equal to ^350% of Winchester's attack power.^ The carriage then rushes forward 1 time to additionally deal #physical damage# equal to ^75% of Winchester's attack power^ to all hit enemies.

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: The Freedom Heroes of Winchester's Carriage carry out an attack against the frontline enemy dealing #physical damage# equal to ^378% of Winchester's attack power.^ The carriage then rushes forward 1 time to additionally deal #physical damage# equal to ^75% of Winchester's attack power^ to all hit enemies.

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: The Freedom Heroes of Winchester's Carriage carry out an attack against the frontline enemy dealing #physical damage# equal to ^378% of Winchester's attack power.^ The carriage then rushes forward 3 times to additionally deal #physical damage# equal to ^75% of Winchester's attack power^ to all hit enemies.

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: The Freedom Heroes of Winchester's Carriage carry out an attack against the frontline enemy dealing #physical damage# equal to ^378% of Winchester's attack power.^ The carriage then rushes forward 3 times to additionally deal #physical damage# equal to ^100% of Winchester's attack power^ to all hit enemies. Enemies hit by the last charge will be ^stunned for 2 seconds^.

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_EXCLUSIVE_LV1_DESC.text: When leader uses special skill, Winchester's extraordinary boss, Joanne, appears and uses ^Lv1 'Overdrive!'^. (Once every 15 seconds; Joanne's stats are equal to ^1.5 times those of the leader^)

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_EXCLUSIVE_LV2_DESC.text: When leader uses special skill, Winchester's extraordinary boss, Joanne, appears and uses ^Lv3 'Overdrive!'^. (Once every 12 seconds; Joanne's stats are equal to ^1.7 times those of the leader^)

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_EXCLUSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: When leader uses special skill, Winchester's extraordinary boss, Joanne, appears and uses ^transcended 'Overdrive!'^. (Once every 10 seconds; Joanne's stats are equal to ^2 times those of the leader^)

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_PASSIVE_LV1_DESC.text: ^Heal effect^ of all allies increase by ^10.5%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_PASSIVE_LV2_DESC.text: ^Heal effect^ of all allies increase by ^12.5%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_FREE_FREE_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: ^Heal effect^ of all allies increase by ^15.5%^. If ally is healed when remaining HP is under 50%, said ally's ^critical chance^ is increased by ^10%^ for 3 seconds.

TEXT_CHAMP_GODDESS_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: The champion swoops down to deal @magical damage@ equal to 240% of resistance and knocks the enemy back. She then casts a shield over all allies for 5 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 240% of resistance.

TEXT_CHAMP_GODDESS_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: The champion swoops down to deal @magical damage@ equal to 480% of resistance and knocks the enemy back. She then casts a shield over all allies for 5 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 480% of resistance.

TEXT_CHAMP_GODDESS_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: The champion swoops down to deal @magical damage@ equal to 720% of resistance and knocks the enemy back. She then casts a shield over all allies for 5 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 720% of resistance.

TEXT_CHAMP_GODDESS_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: The champion swoops down to deal @magical damage@ equal to 720% of resistance and knocks the enemy back. She then casts a shield over all allies for 5 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 960% of resistance. As she leaves, the champion deals an additional @magical damage@ equal to 960% of resistance.

TEXT_CHAMP_GODDESS_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: The champion swoops down to deal @magical damage@ equal to 960% of resistance and knocks the enemy back. She then casts a shield over all allies for 5 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 1200% of resistance. As she leaves, the champion deals an additional @magical damage@ equal to 1200% of resistance.

TEXT_CHAMP_GODDESS_DESC.text: A mysterious lady born within the Order of the Goddess and raised among the Divine Cavalry, under the guardianship of Priestess Maria. Her elegant and mature personality is betrayed by bouts of strange fits, during which she shows symptoms of an unstable mind. Unknown to all save for a selected few within the Order, Noa - and the secret of her identity - is revealed to the world when Maria, trusting Lednas, decides to send her to Hero Town.

TEXT_CHAMP_GODDESS_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text: Allies receiving 'Requiem of Light' receive a buff that increases attack power by 30% of the champion's attack power and decreases received damage by 50%.

TEXT_CHAMP_GODDESS_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: ^Resistance^ of all allies increase by ^230^. When allies receive 5 hits of magical damage, they ignore the next magical damage hit.

TEXT_CHAMP_GRAN_DESC.text: The protector of the Grancia Empire, Galahad received his name from Emperor Alexander. It is said that only the knight with the greatest virtue and combat abilities is deemed worthy of receiving the name Galahad. So to be bestowed the name is a very honorable thing for the knights. However, after receiving the name, the knight has to abandon his own past and only live as the new Galahad. Since this makes finding the successor difficult, the 1st Galahad is still on duty.

TEXT_CHAMP_HAN_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: Hanee Baram uses a magic spell to increase ^all allies' evasion by 20%^ for 9 seconds. After activation, Hanee Baram deals @magical damage@ equal to ^125% of attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_HAN_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: Hanee Baram uses a magic spell to increase ^all allies' evasion by 30%^ for 9 seconds. After activation, Hanee Baram deals @magical damage@ equal to ^150% of attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_HAN_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: Hanee Baram uses a magic spell to increase ^all allies' evasion by 50%^ for 9 seconds. After activation, Hanee Baram deals @magical damage@ equal to ^175% of attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_HAN_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: Hanee Baram uses a magic spell to increase ^all allies' evasion by 60%^ for 9 seconds. After activation, Hanee Baram deals @magical damage@ equal to ^215% of attack power^, and casts a shield equal to ^215% of attack power^ over allies for ^2 seconds^.

TEXT_CHAMP_HAN_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: Hanee Baram uses a magic spell to increase ^all allies' evasion by 75%^ for 9 seconds. After activation, Hanee Baram deals @magical damage@ equal to ^250% of attack power^, and casts a shield equal to ^250% of attack power^ over allies for ^4 seconds^.

TEXT_CHAMP_HAN_DESC.text: A rare rabbit patron mountain saint among the many tiger patron mountain saints of Han. Hanee Baram is loved among her people. Usually she is cheerful and will willingly approach others, but at times she suddenly turns shy and hides out of sight.

TEXT_CHAMP_HAN_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text: All goddesses' skill effect and duration are amplified by ^1.5 times^ during duration of active skill.

TEXT_CHAMP_HAN_PASSIVE_LV1_DESC.text: All allies' ^attack speed^ increases by 15%, and ^movement^ increases by ^20%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_HAN_PASSIVE_LV2_DESC.text: All allies' ^attack speed^ increases by 25%, and ^movement^ increases by ^30%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_HAN_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: All allies' ^attack speed^ increases by 40%, and ^movement^ increases by ^50%^. If ally succeeds in evading 5 times, ^all allies' accuracy increases by 15%^ for 3 seconds. (Can be stacked maximum 4 times).

TEXT_CHAMP_MINO_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: If no blocks are used after using Aindel's champion skill, Chariot of the Confederation protects the party for 3 seconds by decreasing all received damage by 70% and preventing all forms of knockback. This state is canceled immediately upon using a block. Afterwards, Aindel shoots his bow to deal @magical damage@ equal to ^375% of his attack power^. If no blocks are used for the 3 second duration of Aindel's skill, the block generation time for the next 3 seconds is decreased by 50%.

TEXT_CHAMP_MINO_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: If no blocks are used after using Aindel's champion skill, Chariot of the Confederation protects the party for 3 seconds by decreasing all received damage by 70% and preventing all forms of knockback. This state is canceled immediately upon using a block. Afterwards, Aindel shoots his bow to deal @magical damage@ equal to ^425% of his attack power^. If no blocks are used for the 3 second duration of Aindel's skill, the block generation time for the next 3 seconds is decreased by 50%.

TEXT_CHAMP_MINO_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: If no blocks are used after using Aindel's champion skill, Chariot of the Confederation protects the party for 3 seconds by decreasing all received damage by 80% and preventing all forms of knockback. This state is canceled immediately upon using a block. Afterwards, Aindel shoots his bow to deal @magical damage@ equal to ^500% of his attack power^. If no blocks are used for the 3 second duration of Aindel's skill, the block generation time for the next 3 seconds is decreased by 50%.

TEXT_CHAMP_MINO_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: If no blocks are used after using Aindel's champion skill, Chariot of the Confederation protects the party for 3 seconds by decreasing all received damage by 80% and preventing all forms of knockback. Additionally, he continuously deals #physical damage# equal to ^50% of his armor.^ This state is canceled immediately upon using a block. Afterwards, Aindel shoots his bow to deal @magical damage@ equal to ^600% of his attack power^. If no blocks are used for the 3 second duration of Aindel's skill, the block generation time for the next 3 seconds is decreased by 50%.

TEXT_CHAMP_MINO_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: If no blocks are used after using Aindel's champion skill, Chariot of the Confederation protects the party for 3 seconds by decreasing all received damage by 80% and preventing all forms of knockback. Additionally, he continuously deals #physical damage# equal to ^100% of his armor.^ This state is canceled immediately upon using a block. Afterwards, Aindel shoots his bow to deal @magical damage@ equal to ^600% of his attack power^. If no blocks are used for the 3 second duration of Aindel's skill, the block generation time for the next 3 seconds is decreased by 50%.

TEXT_CHAMP_MINO_DESC.text: The first Elf King to lead the haughty Elf Tribe to communicate with other races, Aindel has embarked on many journeys throughout the continent with the intention to meet various tribes of Hasla. On every one of his visits to the Animal, Woopa, Devil, and other tribes, the Elf King strived to provide aid in solving each peoples' conflict. Afterwards, Aindel forms Minor Tribes' Confederation to protect all minorities who have no allegiance to a particular country, and is crowned the leader of the group. However, the striking differences among the four tribes render the alliance shaky at best, and susceptible to external influences who threat its existence. When Aindel learns from Sigruna of a town where many races live in harmony, he immediately sets out on the road, hiding his royal identity. A king must always protect his people, and all of the Confederation has become his.

TEXT_CHAMP_MINO_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text: With every 10 heals allies receive, Aindel generates 10 SP for the ally leader.

TEXT_CHAMP_MINO_PASSIVE_LV1_DESC.text: Allies' life steal is increased by 10%.

TEXT_CHAMP_MINO_PASSIVE_LV2_DESC.text: Allies' life steal is increased by 15%.

TEXT_CHAMP_MINO_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: Allies' life steal is increased by 20%.

TEXT_CHAMP_NETH_DESC.text: The genius lead engineer of Mecha Robot Project A.M.K., a confidential project undertaken by the Neth Empire Army. When the project is canceled due to the tyranny of various corporations and the oppression of collaborating officials, the disappointed Frantz leaves the Neth Army to be unheard of for years, until one day he returns with a prototype named AMK-001, eagerly participating in various missions as if to prove the superiority of his model.

TEXT_CHAMP_NETH_MEKA_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: Frantz shoots numerous missiles dealing #physical damage# equal to ^400% of Frantz's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_NETH_MEKA_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: Frantz shoots numerous missiles dealing #physical damage# equal to ^500% of Frantz's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_NETH_MEKA_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: Frantz shoots numerous missiles dealing #physical damage# equal to ^600% of Frantz's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_NETH_MEKA_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: Frantz shoots numerous missiles dealing #physical damage# equal to ^600% of Frantz's attack power^, and also an IC-Fusion Bomb that deals #physical damage# equal to ^100% of Frantz's attack power^ and decreases hit enemies' ^armor and resistance by 50% for 10 seconds^.

TEXT_CHAMP_NETH_MEKA_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: Frantz shoots numerous missiles dealing #physical damage# equal to ^600% of Frantz's attack power^, and also an IC-Fusion Bomb that deals #physical damage# equal to ^200% of Frantz's attack power^ and decreases hit enemies' ^armor and resistance by 100% for 10 seconds^.

TEXT_CHAMP_NETH_MEKA_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text: ^1 leader block^ is generated every 3 times an ally uses block skill. (Once every 1.5 seconds)

TEXT_CHAMP_NETH_MEKA_PASSIVE_LV1_DESC.text: ^Critical damage^ of all allies increase by ^20%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_NETH_MEKA_PASSIVE_LV2_DESC.text: ^Critical damage^ of all allies increase by ^45%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_NETH_MEKA_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: ^Critical damage^ of all allies increase by ^80%^. Every time ally is hit by enemy, the ^hit ally's attack power increases by 0.5%^ for 10 seconds. (Maximum stack limit 50%)

TEXT_CHAMP_NOS_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: Throws an 'icy spear' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 100% of Lia's attack power. Afterwards, Lia summons an 'ice wall' that has HP equal to 240% of Lia's @resistance@ and lasts 10 seconds.

TEXT_CHAMP_NOS_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: Throws an 'icy spear' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 150% of Lia's attack power. Afterwards, Lia summons an 'ice wall' that has HP equal to 480% of Lia's @resistance@ and lasts 10 seconds.

TEXT_CHAMP_NOS_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: Throws an 'icy spear' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 200% of Lia's attack power. Afterwards, Lia summons an 'ice wall' that has HP equal to 720% of Lia's @resistance@ and lasts 10 seconds.

TEXT_CHAMP_NOS_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: Throws an 'icy spear' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 300% of Lia's attack power. Afterwards, Lia summons an 'ice wall' that has HP equal to 720% of Lia's @resistance@ and lasts 10 seconds. The 'ice wall' ignores damage equal to Lia's @resistance.@ After the 'ice wall' is destroyed, Lia additionally summons an 'ice sculpture' that has the same HP and ability as the ice wall for 5 seconds.

TEXT_CHAMP_NOS_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: Throws an 'icy spear' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 350% of Lia's attack power. Afterwards, Lia summons an 'ice wall' that has HP equal to 720% of Lia's @resistance@ and lasts 10 seconds. The 'ice wall' ignores damage equal to Lia's @resistance.@ After the 'ice wall' is destroyed, Lia additionally summons an 'ice sculpture' that has the same HP and ability as the ice wall for 5 seconds.

TEXT_CHAMP_NOS_DESC.text: Lia is a young girl with the ability to control ice and blizzards, which wins her the respect and adoration of many in the kingdom of Nosgard. She strives to be well-liked by everyone, smiling brightly regardless of her private feelings and taking note of everyone's every word and action. Her bright and cheerful countenance may not be exactly what it seems to be...

TEXT_CHAMP_NOS_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text:
Upon activating active skill, every time the ally leader uses a block, a special skill block is generated for 5 seconds with effects described as follows. (activates once every 0.2 seconds): 

[1-chain: Heals all allies by 300% of leader's attack power]
[2-chain: Heals all allies by 500% of leader's attack power, increases allies' armor and resistance by 500 for 5 seconds]
[3-chain: Generates 1 leader block]

TEXT_CHAMP_PUMP_DESC.text: A witch from Pumpkin City, Remi acts as a veterinarian for the familiars of her hometown. Highly interested in animals and other creatures, she volunteers for the 'Champion' program for Pumpkin City in order meet various creatures from different cities and cultures. Remi shares a special relationship with her familiar cat Taro, who accompanies her not only in battle but everywhere she goes.

TEXT_CHAMP_PUMP_PUMP_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: Remi's familiar, Taro, pierces the enemy 3 times with its sharp tail, every time dealing @magical damage@ equal to ^120% of Remi's attack power.^

TEXT_CHAMP_PUMP_PUMP_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: Remi's familiar, Taro, pierces the enemy 3 times with its sharp tail, every time dealing @magical damage@ equal to ^145% of Remi's attack power.^

TEXT_CHAMP_PUMP_PUMP_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: Remi's familiar, Taro, pierces the enemy 3 times with its sharp tail, every time dealing @magical damage@ equal to ^170% of Remi's attack power.^

TEXT_CHAMP_PUMP_PUMP_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: Remi's familiar, Taro, pierces the enemy 3 times with its sharp tail, every time dealing @magical damage@ equal to ^200% of Remi's attack power.^ Additionally, ^the magnitude of all harmful effects^ are increased by ^10%^ for 10 seconds. (Original effect duration remains unaffected.)

TEXT_CHAMP_PUMP_PUMP_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: Remi's familiar, Taro, pierces the enemy 3 times with its sharp tail, every time dealing @magical damage@ equal to ^200% of Remi's attack power.^ Additionally, ^the magnitude of all harmful effects^ are increased by ^20%^ for 10 seconds. (Original effect duration remains unaffected.)

TEXT_CHAMP_PUMP_PUMP_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text: At the start of every wave, ^2 leader blocks^ are additionally generated. Upon "Shadow Cat"'s activation, ^the block generation speed^ is reduced by ^80%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_PUMP_PUMP_PASSIVE_LV1_DESC.text: ^Magical damage^ of all allies increase by ^10.5%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_PUMP_PUMP_PASSIVE_LV2_DESC.text: ^Magical damage^ of all allies increase by ^14%^.

TEXT_CHAMP_PUMP_PUMP_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: ^Magical damage^ of all allies increase by ^21.5%^. Additional resistance penetration of 500 will be applied to all ^magical damage against boss monsters^.

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: Palor the Chimera roars and swings his front paw 3 times to deal #physical damage# equal to ^80% of Agrius's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: Palor the Chimera roars and swings his front paw 3 times to deal #physical damage# equal to ^100% of Agrius's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: Palor the Chimera roars and swings his front paw 3 times to deal #physical damage# equal to ^150% of Agrius's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: Palor the Chimera roars and swings his front paw 3 times to deal #physical damage# equal to ^150% of Agrius's attack power^. He then leaps into the air and breathes fire to deal additional #physical damage# equal to 150% of Agrius's attack power.

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: Palor the Chimera roars and swings his front paw 3 times to deal #physical damage# equal to ^150% of Agrius's attack power^. He then leaps into the air and breathes fire to deal additional #physical damage# equal to 250% of Agrius's attack power.

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_DESC.text: The descendant of the Beast King, a legendary figure who ruled over all beasts in the world. Accompanied by Palor the Chimera, Agrius led a reclusive life in the Peaks of Glory - until the onset of the war, started by the Apostle of the Tower of Manacar, which drove him to cooperate with the Olympus Council of the Roman Republic. Agrius is awkward at communicating with others save for Palor, but is not at all unsociable or aloof. He is a champion who always strives to be the true Beast King.

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text: Upon using 'Wrath of Palor,' all allies generate 1 block of their own. All allies become immune to stuns and knockback for the duration of the skill.

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_PASSIVE_LV1_NAME.text: Guardianship of the Beast King Lv1

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_PASSIVE_LV2_NAME.text: Guardianship of the Beast King Lv2

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text:
All allies' ^armor increases by 230^.
Every time an ally receives 5 physical damage hits, he or she ignores the next physical damage.

TEXT_CHAMP_ROMAN_PASSIVE_LV3_NAME.text: Guardianship of the Beast King Lv3

TEXT_CHAMP_WEST_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: Desert Warriors boarding Ibelin's train deal #physical damage# equal to ^100% of Ibelin's attack power,^ after which Ibelin herself jumps off the train while throwing grenades that deal #physical damage# equal to ^200% of Ibelin's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_WEST_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: Valencian knights boarding Ibelin's train deal #physical damage# equal to ^125% of Ibelin's attack power,^ after which Ibelin herself jumps off the train while throwing grenades that deal #physical damage# equal to ^225% of Ibelin's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_WEST_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: The Elite Falcon Brigade boarding Ibelin's train deal #physical damage# equal to ^150% of Ibelin's attack power,^ after which Ibelin herself jumps off the train while throwing grenades that deal #physical damage# equal to ^250% of Ibelin's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_WEST_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: For 6 seconds, according to chain number, [Desert Warriors / Valencian knights / the Elite Falcon Brigade] boarding Ibelin's train deal #physical damage# equal to ^[80/160/240]% of Ibelin's attack power^. After end of skill's activation, Ibelin and her followers jump off the train to deal a ^critical attack^ that deals #physical damage# equal to ^250% of Ibelin's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_WEST_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: For 6 seconds, according to chain number, [Desert Warriors / Valencian knights / the Elite Falcon Brigade] boarding Ibelin's train deal #physical damage# equal to ^[130/260/390]% of Ibelin's attack power^. After end of skill's activation, Ibelin and her followers jump off the train to deal a ^critical attack^ that deals #physical damage# equal to ^350% of Ibelin's attack power^.

TEXT_CHAMP_WEST_DESC.text: A mysterious woman leading both the knights of Valencia and the outlaws of the Wildlands. Dressed in a fine suit while hiding behind an elaborate mask with an enigmatic smile, Ibelin easily grabs attention and respect through her confidence and natural charisma. Yet, she never talks about herself, frequently disappears from town, and sparsly deals with Trista. There may be more to this champion than meets the eye...

TEXT_CHAMP_WEST_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text: For 10 seconds upon activating 'Operation: Charge,' Ibelin generates ^1 random special skill block^ every 10 times allies take damage.

TEXT_CHAMP_WEST_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: Increases all allies' ^critical chance^ by ^20%.^ #Physical damage# equal to ^10% of Ibelin's attack power^ is also applied to all enemies with each critical attack.

TEXT_CHANGE_ACCOUNT_WARNING_G2F_DESC.text:

TEXT_CHAT_BAN.text: Chat disabled due to repeated negative reports.

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_10_DESC.text: A gardener who is learning from Prestina, on how to care for trees and flowers. Impressed by Prestina's wisdom, he is currently persuading the villagers to start calling her 'The Goddess of the Forest.'

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_1_DESC.text: Being a fraidy-cat, the thief only steals trinkets and doodads. Satisfied with a bow he stole one day, he now only steals arrows.

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_2_DESC.text: A girl who desires to be a scout. She is training extremely hard to become one of the best.

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_3_DESC.text: Sigruna is a member of the Silver Elf clan. She lives a very tough life because she is from the lowest caste in the elves' caste-based society.

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_4_DESC.text: She's actually a city girl who needed to get away from the stress and noise, so she hides in the countryside. She practices with her brother's bow.

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_5_DESC.text: A ninja who thinks she secretly infiltrated the town, but everyone in town knows who she is.

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_6_DESC.text: Centuries ago, the Apostles brought demons from another dimension to destroy Hasla, and those demons wrecked havoc using humans as hosts. Demona was one of these human hosts.

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_7_DESC.text: Assistance force dispatched by Nosgard to Grancia Empire. He is a talented soldier, but he does not seem to get used to war weather in Grancia.

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_8_DESC.text: Normal archer subordinated in the Grancia Empire Army. They always act in groups due to lack of individual abilities.

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_9_DESC.text: A country lass whose dream is to join the Divine Cavalry. Despite her dreams being thwarted each time by the difficult entrance exams, she never despairs but always dreams of a brighter tomorrow.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_10_DESC.text: Demona battled against the evil inside of her, until one day, a saintess exorcised the demon from her, leaving only the power behind. This was the birth of the first devil.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_11_DESC.text: The famous trouble maker in the 12 Zodiac Army. For no reason, he hates the Roman Republic representatives. He always bullies Pisces, the son of a Roman representative.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_12_DESC.text: A mass produced android produced by Neth Empire with the data from Road insutry. It resembles R-0, but its capabilities are limited compared to the upgrades that R-0 has received.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_13_DESC.text: Mir, the manager sister in charge of the Eastern Kingdoms. She may be shy and a little reserved, but she has a beautiful smile and is always willing to help those in need.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_14_DESC.text: Mia, the manager sister in charge of the Roman Republic. She lives as a flower would, with a dreamy beautiful smile and faraway look. Mia is a subject of concern for her sisters, who always take turns looking after her.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_1_DESC.text: He's a scout for the town guard. Being a scout is tiring work and requires a lot of experience on the battlefield. He is not very skilled in fighting, but is a vital part of the town guard.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_2_DESC.text: He's a warrior from a tribe located in the desert area near the Central Empire. They gained recognition from the Desert Goddess and are loyal to her. They have been protecting the Apostle's Fragment for ages.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_3_DESC.text: He is part of a group of thieves that are after the money of corrupt noblemen. They never lay their hands on the money of common citizens, and instead share the money they take from the noblemen with the people.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_4_DESC.text: In Roma, there is a army composed solely of women. They are rival to another female-exclusive army of archers: The Velvet Archers.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_5_DESC.text: In order to ambush a thug, he has been on stakeout for a month using his sister's bow. He has yet to arrest the thug. She kind of wants her bow back.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_6_DESC.text: One day, her parents were attacked by monsters. In order to support her family, she tries to climb the social ladder at all costs. There is only one way to do this: join the King's Elite Guard. To make it, Sigruna trains whenever possible.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_7_DESC.text:
Mixed heritage of human and elf. Elves are not
fond of half elves, so most of them live with humans.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_8_DESC.text:
Archer group lead by Magnus, and one of the elite guards
of the King. They are rivals of the group lead by Sigruna.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_9_DESC.text: A hunter from the Nosgardian woods. The recent conflict has decimated the population of the woods, and he finds himself starving. But he's still happy to have a warm house.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_10_DESC.text:
A mischievous elf. He shoots candy bars at children every Christmas, but
always misses.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_11_DESC.text: Nosgards' female Frost Elves do not have horns which allow them to use magic. They master the art of archery and hunt for their tribe.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_12_DESC.text: Humans associated the demons with evil. Demona fought a lonely fight against humanity. However, more and more demons were born, and Demona gathered them together.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_13_DESC.text: The most beautiful soldier in 12 Zodiac Army. Due to his beautiful appearance, Sagittarius confessed his love toward him claiming that he doesn't care whether he is a man or not.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_14_DESC.text: An archer subordinated under the Neth Resistance Army. He uses arrows with attached bombs and is excellent at counter attacking Neth magicians and machines. His combat specialty guerilla warfare.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_15_DESC.text: A follower of the Order of the Goddess who takes the yearly pilgrimage to the Holy City. He has a dogged faith in the Order and believes that his pilgrimage will take him closer to the Goddess's side, one step at a time.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_16_DESC.text: One of the Twelve Cobalt Knights of the Order of the Blue Blood. Emilia, being a commoner of the Roman Republic, who never had the chance to properly learn archery. However it didn't prove to be an obstacle in relation to her natural talent. Victoria too thought highly of Emilia's aptitude, and brought her to Grancia to officially knight her as one of the Twelve Cobalt Knights.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_1_DESC.text: A fox that looks very annoyed, but says that it is an expression to catch his prey off guard. He insists that his name is not Foxniper, but is Fox Niper.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_2_DESC.text: The most popular model of the 'Android Robot Family' that is made in the Neth Empire. She's supposed to act like a sister, but most people don't know what they're getting themselves into.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_3_DESC.text: A clown who specializes in archery at the circus. Since he couldn't perform due to the appearance of monsters, he comes forward to eradicate the monsters himself.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_4_DESC.text: A famous female archer group who wear clothes made of red silk. All members have extraordinary looks, so people fight to get a better view when they come across them in person.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_5_DESC.text: An adventurer that is crazy about animals. Not only does She like docile animals, She also likes beasts and even dragons. And she hates Gon.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_6_DESC.text: Gatcha Ranger Yellow. Probably the laziest of the Gatcha Rangers.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_7_DESC.text: An expert magician and hunter hired by Rapture Science for research. She was sent to capture a sasquatch, but after being rescued by one from a monster attack, she is conflicted about what to do.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_8_DESC.text: She likes a boy in the kendo club, so she tries to transfer to the kendo club. Little does she know that he already transferred to the archery club to be closer to her.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_9_DESC.text: After failing her 7th examination, she gives up on her hopes and dreams. Her parents, who have recovered from the attack, encouraged her to go on. Now, Sigruna feels unstoppable.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_10_DESC.text: An aristocrat and distant relative to the King, his heritage allowed him to become the leader of the Golden Archer group. He loves elegant and beautiful things.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_11_DESC.text: After the war with the Apostles, the Goddesses started to hunt the Demons for their crimes. Demona summoned the Demons together and began a war against the Goddesses.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_12_DESC.text: Altair is the only son of an aristocrat. He is very kind-hearted and handsome and although he is not as strong as most men, he was taught the ways of archery by Giparang. When Chen invaded Han, he volunteered for the battle to fulfill his obligation as an aristocrat.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_13_DESC.text: A famous hunter of the Roman Empire. At a young age, she won the first place in the Roman Empire hunting competition. She is very proud of her hunting skills, and is dreaming of hunting a great quarry that will surprise and impress everyone.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_14_DESC.text: A young warrior of the Woopa tribe, tired of his dull life in the village. One foreboding day, the Primal Mountain mysteriously erupts and threatens the Woopa tribe to extinction. In the confusion and mayhem that follows, Mamba runs away from the village.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_15_DESC.text: Lee is from an island country in the East Empire. Her mother dreamed to become the top dancer in Chen but she gave up due to hardship. Successing her mother, Lee also dreams to become a great dancer but her mother is firmly against her.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_16_DESC.text: Rahima is the daughter of nomadic tribes, wandering the wilderness of Hasla to an undeveloped land. When the tribe attempts to move to another area, they are attacked by cateran. The tribes' archery helps Rahima to resist, sadly she is separated from her family.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_17_DESC.text: A girl who resides in a convent with her elder sister Violet. One day she develops the special ability of seeing and talking with ghosts. Her sister and the other nuns, however, think she has gone mad, and pity her.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_18_DESC.text: Her father is a lord of the countryside region of Ryu. He used to be of a royal family who could succeed the throne, but he hated fighting for the throne, so he decided to step down. Kaguya loves her new peaceful life.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_19_DESC.text: An orphan of war, Chiron is saved by mercenary captain Heth who teaches him the art of battle. Under Heth's tutelage, young Chiron learns everything there is to know about archery and hammer throwing, and begins his own mercenary career soon after.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_1_DESC.text: A young member of a tribe where warriors collect the bones of beasts. The more bones they have, the more powerful they become.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_20_DESC.text: A skilled archer who dreams of winning glory on the battlefield. Instead of the honor and fame he dreamt of, however, Hansung receives a critical injury to his eyes and is forced to return home.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_21_DESC.text: An archer succeeding the lost necromancy of the Desert, Set has protected Osiris together with Isis from his youth. When Osiris, older but headstrong as ever, declares that he will set out on a journey in search for the past, Set expresses his disapproval against the futility of his mission and vows not to follow him.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_2_DESC.text: A famous ninja who is well known for his very agile movements. As a side job, he delivers papers in the morning.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_3_DESC.text: Sigruna's efforts finally pay off. With her excellent archery skills, she joins the Elite Guard and is now an expert archer.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_4_DESC.text: Robin Hood is now a new member of Green Apple. He plunders the belongings of corrupt noblemen in the name of justice, but deep down inside his heart he realizes his wrongdoing.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_5_DESC.text: Female type android developed by Road Industry. The data for development is said to have been stolen from Rapture Science, but the truth is unknown. As prototypes, all the machines were given the same mission, but only one machine managed to accomplish this mission.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_6_DESC.text:
A warrior of an Eastern country with a deep history and tradition.
He is so skilled at archery, people who see him are said to be entranced by it.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_7_DESC.text: A student from the East. She has a sister named Kaori, but she lacks her sister's ability to adapt to their new life in the West.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_8_DESC.text: Niven was a female frost elf, but she was born with a magical horn. Her family was murdered by the wolf tribe, so she sought vengeance and killed many of them in battle.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_9_DESC.text: A shy and beautiful woman who grew up in a land that never knew war. One night, she escaped from her peaceful home and fell in love with Mondrian. Now she takes every opportunity she can to meet her lover in secret.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_10_DESC.text: Magnus believed that only the nobility were worthy of his position. Therefore, Sigruna, the leader of the Silver Archer group and a peasant by birth, was a thorn in his side. Magnus argues that the Silver Archer group should be disbanded and he hates Sigruna.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_11_DESC.text: Demona grew weary of the constant persecution of the demons, and decided to lead them to a new land. This marked the beginning of a new dawn for the demons.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_12_DESC.text: Altair shoots Rebecca's horse out from under her and she is thrown to the ground. However, Altair is surrounded by the Chen army and although he escapes, he is wounded in the process. Rebecca comes to his aid and he is able to get away.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_13_DESC.text: After a long chase, Atalante captures a great lion. However, that lion was a pet of an aristocrat. Atalante goes to jail for hunting the lion but Athena saves her. After that, Atalante pledges her loyalty to Athena.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_14_DESC.text: Mamba's initial excitement of arriving at the Grancia Empire soon fades before cultural and linguistic differences. He barely makes it day by day by working as a repairman, at which he thankfully shows natural talent. One fateful day, Mamba meets Viper who has come to enhance his weapon, and decides to follow him out of sheer intuition.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_15_DESC.text: Lee is recognized as a dancer after performing in front of her mother. She gets a job as a dancer in the Royal dance company of Chen.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_16_DESC.text: Rahima woke up in Hawk's nest. She regards Hawk as her savior and decides to reside there. Lahima constantly practices archery so that she can keep the tribe's faith. She also learns how to hunt with Hawk.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_17_DESC.text: When nobody believes her to speak the truth, Viola instead finds sympathy in her ghost friends. The ghosts too find comfort in Viola, through confessing their unfulfilled desires and unresolved woes.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_18_DESC.text: Kaguya grew up like a tomboy and nobody could stop her. She enjoys running through fields and hunting with her bow. She sometimes gets into trouble, but everybody likes her because she has a friendly nature.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_19_DESC.text: Chiron's fame as a mercenary heightens daily - to the point of diminishing the reputation and work of other mercenaries. A mercenary named Nessus, especially irritated by Chiron's reputation, spreads a vile rumor that defames his master, Heth. Heth falls ill after hearing of the rumor, and Chiron sets out to seek revenge.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_1_DESC.text: Gon decorates his head with the bones of the fearful Urk. His tribe is impressed because he is the first one to ever defeat an Urk or even know what an Urk is.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_20_DESC.text: Although Hansung ends up losing his vision to his injury, he does not despair, instead opting to train against his blindness through long rounds of hunting. After years of effort, Hansung finally gains an 'inner sight' that lets him aim his arrow.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_21_DESC.text: When Osiris remains unfazed by Set's disapproval, and Isis additionally insists on following Osiris on his journey, Set realizes that he has no choice. Grumbling an excuse about his own search for a powerful scroll of necromancy, Set grudgingly follows the two with a worried eye.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_2_DESC.text: The income from his side job is pretty decent, but decides to increase the delivery area. Doing so, he meets the legendary delivery man, "Gale".

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_3_DESC.text: Sigruna continues to train, even after joining the Elite Guard. Her humble beginnings lead her to conserve everything, always making sure not to waste a single arrow. Elven tradition dictates that trees are sacred, so Sigruna's act of not wasting arrows made from trees has made her a role model for others. She is now known as the "Archer God".

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_4_DESC.text: Robin Hood becomes the head of Green Apple. Before long, he accepts the darkness in his heart and makes a vow to plunder all noblemen.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_5_DESC.text: The only R series prototype to survive. R - 1 is the result of the tireless analysis of the data uncovered by the prototypes.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_6_DESC.text: In the Eastern countries, they hold an archery tournament once every 4 years when the moonlight is at its brightest. This tournament is held from the day of the half moon till the next night when the full moon rises. A title, "Half Moon", is granted to the winner. Giparang attracts the attention of everyone with his fancy skills, and nobody doubts that he'll receive the title.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_7_DESC.text: Forever living in her sister's shadow, Hikari never accepted her own talent for archery.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_8_DESC.text: Niven assassinated the princess of the Frost Elves to prevent her clan's unification with the Wolf Tribe. She is arrested and banished from her tribe, but once the steamers arrive, she is called back to fight against them.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_9_DESC.text: A local magistrate, in love with Arona, learned of her secret rendezvous with Mondrian and had him arrested. Heartbroken, Arona swore to free her lover and get revenge.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_10_DESC.text: When the Devils invaded them, Magnus was impressed by Sigruna's performance and had a crush on her, but he couldn't get closer. Instead, he anonymously sends her tons of tree bark after learning she enjoys eating them.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_11_DESC.text: The demons that remained in Hasla were hunted down as the Order of the Goddesses grew, and Demona knew she had to return. She entered the Primal Mountain and awakened the power of Primal Flames.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_12_DESC.text: After the war, Altair's father sends him to recuperate in a small village. While living in the village alone, Altair remembers Rebecca and the aid she gave him. He realizes his love for her and leaves the village to find her.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_13_DESC.text: Athena orders Atalante, to go after the apostle who disappeared. As she was the only one who could chase after the apostle Manacar without leaving any trace behind, she begins the hunt without hesitation.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_14_DESC.text: Codename: Black Mamba. One of the aces of the Neth Resistance Army and Viper's right-hand man. Enemies fear him for his exceptional skill and silent demeanor, but he is in reality a very naive young man whose hobbies include admiring Viper and repairing weapons. Sometimes he adds '-woompapa' at the end of his sentences-woompa.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_15_DESC.text: An assassin appears during Lee's performance but at the critical moment Lee defends assassin's attack with her fans. Lee gets recognized as the royal savior and gets promoted as the principal dancer who secretly guards the royal family.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_16_DESC.text: Rahima enters into human society after leaving the nest. She is always with her friendly companion, Yumir, the hawk. Hawks will always be there for Lahima whenever she is in danger during the journey to return to her tribe.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_17_DESC.text: Viola increasingly spends her free time with the ghosts of the convent. Other ghosts, curious of the living girl who has become friends with so many spirits, come seeking Viola's company as well. However, the increased number of ghosts start disrupting the convent with their supernatural powers, causing the nuns to shiver in fear every night.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_18_DESC.text: On a day when cherry blossoms were particularly beautiful under the moonlight, a monster appeared and attacked the village. Many people got hurt and the village was in chaos. In that moment, Kaguya knocked the monster down with one arrow. That day is now a holiday to the people of the village.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_19_DESC.text: Chiron challenges Nessus to a duel, which he wins and restores his teacher's honor. He is bestowed the 'Hammer of Glory' for his victory, and appointed the master training teacher of the Zodiac Army.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_1_DESC.text: Gon has succeeded in hunting down the fearsome Tiga. He proves that he is the tribe's strongest warrior by adorning himself with Tiga's horn on the head of an Urk and its wing bones on his back.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_20_DESC.text: When Hansung returns to the battlefield to achieve his lifelong dream, the other generals ignore him as a senile, blind old man. Yet when the blind archer kills the enemy general with but a single arrow of his quiver, others come to recognize his true mastery over his bow. Hansung's many victories afterwards spread his fame far and wide throughout the lands, and he is made one of the Five Tiger Generals of Chen.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_20_NAME.text: Hansung of the Five Tiger Generals

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_21_DESC.text: Set discovers a Rosetta Stone within the temple, and on it the words 'Only the Necromancer of the Kingdom, with the Guide of the Lost, shall lead the lost souls back to life, from the chasms of the underworld.' Set, realizing that he is the 'Necromancer of the Kingdom,' nervously glances at the determined Osiris.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_2_DESC.text: Hanzo wins the battle against Gale, winning by 1 newspaper. He succeeds the name of Gale, and becomes the chief of the 23rd Newspaper Delivery Men.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_3_DESC.text: One day, demons had attacked the clan, and Sigruna shoots down countless numbers of them. She draws her bow as if she was born to hunt down the demons. Afterward, a Goddess appears asking her to use that power to save the world.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_4_DESC.text: The King has taken notice of Robin Hood's ability to curb corruption and has asked him to aim his bow at the corruption within in his own administration.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_5_DESC.text: With the success of R-1, Road Industry receives wide-ranging support from the empire, and finally creates the ultimate android, R-0. But R-0, having the memories of R-9999, seeks the truth of its existence.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_6_DESC.text: On the last night of the tournament when the winner is decided, Giparang draws his bow while everyone holds their breath. All through the tournament, Giparang has not missed a single target. He now has only one arrow remaining, and everyone focuses on his every movement. With the sound of a "swoosh," he shoots his last arrow towards the moon. No one knows why he does this, but before long, a rumor spreads: "He shot down the moon."

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_7_DESC.text: Hikari confessed her jealousy to her sister Kaori who told Hikari that she must follow her own path. From that day forth, Hikari placed her faith in her bow and never missed her target.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_8_DESC.text: After the war, Niven is imprisoned, but she escaped with her followers. She came to be called the Phantom of the Icy Mountains.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_9_DESC.text: Arona married the magistrate and used his son, Sworden, to release Mondrian from prison. Once freed, Arona and Sworden exposed the magistrate for the corrupt villain he was and banish him from their land.

TEXT_CHA_AR_LIMITED_4_1_DESC.text: Hong-Ran could never forget about the beautiful fireworks she watched at a festival when she was young. She decides to become a great fireworks craftsman. She always quotes, "I will become the greatest Queen of fireworks!".

TEXT_CHA_AR_LIMITED_5_1_DESC.text: Hong-Ran becomes the disciple of a famous fireworks craftsman. While she was training, she met Jin-Kyung and had a deep conversation about each other's future. Being inspired by Jin-Kyung's vision and diligence, she decided to work even harder to achieve her dreams.
