Yet their plans are foiled due to other fighters, and Shermie, who was waiting only for death, is transported to the dimension of Hasla in the brilliant explosion that results from their clash.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_KOF2_SHERMIE_NAME.text: Shermie of the Insanely Violent Lightning

TEXT_DM_INTERACTION_LEVEL_1_0001.text: There are tree buds growing on this piano as well!

TEXT_DM_INTERACTION_LEVEL_1_0003.text: The Masked Girl seems to dislike me...

TEXT_DM_INTERACTION_LEVEL_2_0001.text: Tree, do grow fast and tall!

TEXT_DM_INTERACTION_LEVEL_2_0002.text: Why does the Masked Girl try so hard to stop the tree from growing?

TEXT_DM_INTERACTION_LEVEL_2_0004.text: If Deemo is a hero in this world, then would I be a goddess?

TEXT_DM_INTERACTION_LEVEL_3_0001.text: Unexpectedly, the tree has wrapped the piano up.

TEXT_DM_INTERACTION_LEVEL_3_0002.text: I'm even closer to the ceiling...!

TEXT_DM_INTERACTION_LEVEL_3_0003.text: These dolls look like the Masked Girl... Where do they come from...?

TEXT_DM_INTERACTION_LEVEL_3_0004.text:
Deemo is really gentle, and whenever I'm with him I feel peaceful.
Oh, you are a gentle person too.

TEXT_DM_INTERACTION_LEVEL_3_0006.text: I can soon return to where I was. But why am I so sad...?

(Upon activating passive) SP is increased by 15 per hit. Power can be stacked maximum 3 times. If there exists at least 1 power stack, attack is changed to "Kin 1211 Shiki Ya Otome MAX." 
Kin 1211 Shiki Ya Otome MAX: Deals magical damage equal to (800% + 100% per power stack) of attack power, and stuns enemy.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_KOF_KYO_4.text: (Upon activating passive) Generates 1 block. Power can be stacked maximum 3 times

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_KOF_KYO_6.text:
(Upon activating passive) Generates 1 block. Power can be stacked maximum 3 times. If there exists at least 1 power stack, attack is changed to "Saishuu Kessen Ougi Mu Shiki."
Saishuu Kessen Ougi Mu Shiki: Deals an additional physical damage equal to 220% of attack power per power stack.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_KOF_RUGAL_4.text: (Passive enhanced) Generates 6 SP every time ally attacks or is attacked (once every 0.5 seconds); power can be stacked maximum 5 times.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_KOF_RUGAL_6.text:
(Passive enhanced) Generates 6 SP every time ally attacks or is attacked (once every 0.5 seconds); power can be stacked maximum 5 times.
(Passive enhanced) If there are at least 2 power stacks, additionally uses 'Destruction Omega' that deals physical damage equal to 895% of attack power, after 'Gravity Smash.' 'Destruction Omega' deals additional neutral damage equal to 100% of attack power per power stack with every hit, and stuns enemies.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_RB_BLAKE_4.text: (Passive enhanced) All enemies are stunned for 2 seconds upon activating 'Shadow Clone.'

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_RB_BLAKE_6.text: (Passive enhanced) The cooltime of 'Shadow Clone' is decreased to 8 seconds. All enemies are stunned for 2 seconds upon activation. Additionally, the shadow clone explodes on contact to deal neutral damage equal to 300% of Blake's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_RB_WEISS_4.text: (Passive enhanced) If 'Barrage' is activated as a critical hit, Weiss generates 1 block of her own. (Activates every 1 second)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_RB_WEISS_6.text:
(Passive enhanced) If 'Barrage' is activated as a critical hit, Weiss generates 1 block of her own. (Activates every 1 second)
(Passive added) If Weiss activates 'Barrage' mid-air, she fires additional ice projectiles that each deal magical damage equal to 140% of her attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_11.text: (Passive Activated) Cano's attack power increases by 50% for 5 seconds

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_12.text: Required number of hits to summon 'Scarecrow' is decreased by 1.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_13.text: Blade of Execution requires 2 fewer blocks to activate.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_14.text: Resistance and accuracy of scanned enemy decrease by 10%

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_15.text: Increases critical chance of card attack by 30%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_16.text: (Upon activating passive) Generates shield that absorbs fixed damage of 1500

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_17.text: Cancels all buffs of enemies hit by 'Marionette'

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_2.text: (Upon activating 3-chain) Korin's shield effect over the entire party is increased by 4444.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_4.text: (Upon attacking 'frostbitten' enemies) Sasquatch's 'Snowflower' bursts into 16 petals that explode upon contact and each deal magical damage equal to 30% of attack power. (Activates every 5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_5.text: Revive once (once every 25 seconds, invincible for 3 seconds, attack power increased by 25%)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_6.text: (35% chance upon passive activation) Next skill block deals additional magical damage equal to 315% of attack power

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_7.text: (Upon activating passive) Deals magical damage equal to 600% of attack power, and decreases attack power of hit enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_8.text: (Passive enhanced) Each animal gives an additional debuff that decreases enemies' (accuracy by 15% / critical chance by 10% / resistance by 15%).

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_9.text: (Passive activated) Attacking enemy's resistence is decreased by 50% for 5 seconds

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_1.text: (Passive enhanced) Summons an additional 'electric sphere' and an additional 'enhanced electric sphere' (deals magical damage equal to 200% of attack power per hit); all electric spheres deal 1 more hit

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_10.text: (Passive enhanced) The 'Ghoul' receives 50% less damage, and all of its stats are increased by 30%. Additionally, 'Ghost Control' deals magical damage equal to 240% of Necron's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_11.text: (Passive Activated) Cano Band is summoned for 5 seconds increasing entire party's attack power by 50%. Also, Cano's auto attack is strengthened to shoot laser which deals magical damage equal to 100% of Cano's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_12.text: Required number of hits to summon 'Scarecrow' is decreased by 1. Upon summoning second 'Spinning Scarecrows,' Demeter immediately summons 'Mecha Scarecrow' for 7 seconds. 'Mecha Scarecrow' deals magical damage equal to 70% of Demeter's attack power every 0.2 seconds, and ignores the enemy's resistance by the same amount of Demeter's resistance.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_13.text: Blade of Execution requires 2 fewer blocks to activate. Blade of Execution is enhanced, activating multi-hit and deals magic damage equal to 350% of the hero's attack power on each hit.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_14.text:
Resistance and accuracy of scanned enemy decrease by 20%. 
When scanned enemy is located on the scanning area, enemy receives magical damage equal to 50% of hero's attack power. Scanning area increases up to 50%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_15.text: Increases critical chance of card attack by 30%. Upon activating magic hat 3 times, summons a random magic box with various effects (once 2 seconds; dove trick: decreases enemy accuracy by 45%; jack-in-the-box: stuns all enemies for 1.5 seconds, card storm: deals magical damage equal to 250% of the hero's attack power every 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_17.text:
Cancels all buffs of enemies hit by 'Marionette'
Normal attack changes to 'Puppetry Rhapsody' every 15 seconds (deals physical damage equal to 110% of attack power every hit, cancels buff of hit enemies, cooltime decreases by 2 seconds upon using special skill)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_2.text: (Upon activating 3-chain) Korin additionally summons a master ancient talisman to deal neutral damage of 4444. Additionally, her shield effect over the entire party is increased by 4444, and the critical chance of the entire party is increased by 20% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_4.text: (Upon attacking 'frostbitten' enemies) Sasquatch's 'Snowflower' bursts into 24 petals that explode upon contact and each deal magical damage equal to 50% of attack power. (Activates every 3 seconds) The passive effect is applied to this attack.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_5.text: Revive once (once every 15 seconds, invincible for 3 seconds, attack power increased by 50%, SP +50)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_6.text: (50% chance upon passive activation) Next skill block is changed into 'Deadly Kiss' (additional magical damage equal to 425% of attack power, entire party heals 10% of total HP)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_LIMITED_GG_4_1.text: (While passive is active) Critical strike damage is increased by 30%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_LIMITED_GG_4_2.text: Attack power of Servant increased by 40%, explosion damage increased by 40%

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_LIMITED_GG_6_1.text: (While passive is active) Critical strike damage is increased by 60%, attacks ignore 50% of enemy resistances, and damage received is reduced by 50%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_LIMITED_GG_6_2.text: Attack power of Servant increased by 50%, explosion damage increased by 50%. When a block is used after summoning 3 Servants, all servants are summoned at once and attack. Jack-O` activates "I want out" which deals magic damage equal to 1000% of the hero's attack power.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_BARREL_01_DESC.text: A wooden bucket for all your storage needs, whether they be for solids, liquids, or even gases.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_BED_01_DESC.text: A bed with a wooden frame, topped with piles of hay. It's surprisingly comfy.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_BOOKCASE_01_DESC.text: An old bookshelf. Its age adds to its elegance.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_CHAIR_01_DESC.text: An old wooden chair. Not made for long sessions of sitting, as it doesn't have a backrest.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_CHAIR_02_DESC.text: An old wooden chair. Despite having a backrest, it doesn't look very comfortable.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_CHEST_01_DESC.text: A chest wrought of wood and iron. It looks very old.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_DESK_01_DESC.text: A desk piled with endless stacks of documents. By a mysterious force, you are drawn into grabbing the feather pen and signing them off.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_DRAWER_01_DESC.text: A wooden dresser with three drawers. There are signs of usage.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_HAY_01_DESC.text: An ordinary pile of sun-dried hay. It could be more useful than you think.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_LAMP_01_DESC.text: Its light is barely enough for nighttime reading.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_NOTICEBOARD_01_DESC.text: A notice board where you can check for various news and announcements. At the moment, there seems to be more pizza flyers.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_SHOWCASE_01_DESC.text: An old display cabinet filled with various miscellanea.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_SHOWCASE_02_DESC.text: An old display cabinet filled with wooden crates.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_STAGE_01_DESC.text: A small wooden stage. Upon standing on it, you strangely feel like bursting into song.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_STATUE_01_DESC.text: A stone pedestal. Suitable for placing things on top.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_STATUE_02_DESC.text: A statue of a gladiator carved out of stone. Majestic as the mountains.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_STATUE_03_DESC.text: An gigantic stone statue. It seems familiar for some reason.

TEXT_FAME_BOTTOM_WEAPON_01_DESC.text: A bucket filled with an assortment of weapons.

TEXT_FAME_CENTER_CLOCK_01_DESC.text: A grandfather clock as old as its name.

TEXT_FAME_CENTER_HANGER_01_DESC.text: A coat of arms with two intercrossing swords. Now you can boast about your swordfighting skills with more authority.

TEXT_FAME_CENTER_HANGER_02_DESC.text: A coat of arms with two intercrossing halberds. Strictly for decorative purposes, which they fulfill most handsomely.

TEXT_FAME_CENTER_WINDOW_02_DESC.text: An old wooden window. No light can penetrate its dusty shutters.

TEXT_FAME_PORTRAIT_BORDER_GET_DESC.text: You have unlocked a new portrait frame.

TEXT_FAME_TOP_CURTAIN_ARCHER_01_DESC.text: A banner with the emblem of the Archer class.

TEXT_FAME_TOP_CURTAIN_BLUE_01_DESC.text: A wall decoration made out of blue cloth.

TEXT_FAME_TOP_CURTAIN_GREEN_01_DESC.text: A wall decoration made out of green cloth.

TEXT_FAME_TOP_CURTAIN_HUNTER_01_DESC.text: A banner with the emblem of the Hunter class.

TEXT_FAME_TOP_CURTAIN_PALADIN_01_DESC.text: A banner with the emblem of the Paladin class.

TEXT_FAME_TOP_CURTAIN_PRIEST_01_DESC.text: A banner with the emblem of the Priest class.

TEXT_FAME_TOP_CURTAIN_RED_01_DESC.text: A wall decoration made out of red cloth.

TEXT_FAME_TOP_CURTAIN_WARRIOR_01_DESC.text: A banner with the emblem of the Warrior class.

TEXT_FAME_TOP_CURTAIN_WIZARD_01_DESC.text: A banner with the emblem of the Wizard class.

TEXT_GUARDIAN_COMMON_ATTACK_LV1_DESC.text: (Cannot Equip) Divine Beast's attack power +35% for 15 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_COMMON_ATTACK_LV2_DESC.text: (Cannot Equip) Divine Beast's attack power +35%, critical hit chance +15% for 15 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_COMMON_ATTACK_LV3_DESC.text: (Cannot Equip) Divine Beast's attack power & near ally's attack power +35%, critical hit chance +15% for 15 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_COMMON_DEFENSE_LV1_DESC.text: (Cannot Equip) Divine Beast's received damage reduction -45% for 15 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_COMMON_DEFENSE_LV2_DESC.text: (Cannot Equip) Divine Beast's received damage reduction -45%, immune to debuffs for 15 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_COMMON_DEFENSE_LV3_DESC.text: (Cannot Equip) Divine Beast's received damage & near ally's received damage reduction -45%, immune to debuffs for 15 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_COMMON_BUFF_1.text: Entire party's attack power is increased by 40% and armor and resistence penetration is increased by 300 for 5 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_COMMON_BUFF_2.text: Entire party's attack power is increased by 50% and armor and resistence penetration is increased by 400 for 5 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_COMMON_BUFF_3.text: Entire party's attack power is increased by 60% and armor and resistence penetration is increased by 500 for 5 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_COMMON_HEAL_1.text: Entire party recovers 10% HP and their armor and resistence is increased by 25%

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_COMMON_HEAL_2.text: Entire party recovers 15% HP and their armor and resistence is increased by 30%

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_COMMON_HEAL_3.text: Entire party recovers 20% HP and their armor and resistence is increased by 30%

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DESERT_ARM_LV1_DESC.text: (When Divine Beast attacks an unbuffed enemy) auto-attack critical strike chance is increased by +50%

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DESERT_ARM_LV2_DESC.text: (Ally activates a chain-3 skill) -Can only occur once every 3 sec- deals neutral damage equal to 250% of attack power to all enemies

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DESERT_ARM_LV3_DESC.text: (Sand Anglerfish Hunt enhanced) unbuffed enemies are dealt 100% more critical strike damage

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DESERT_BODY_LV1_DESC.text: (When an enemy casts a buff) neutral damage is reduced by 30% of 5 seconds for all allies

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DESERT_BODY_LV2_DESC.text: (When an enemy casts a buff) -can only occur once in 3 sec- The Divine Beast reflects the next 5 attacks, dealing 150% of the damage received

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DESERT_BODY_LV3_DESC.text: (Sand Armor enhanced) spell reflection buff increased by 5 and has a 50% chance of nullifying enemy buffs

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DESERT_HEAD_LV1_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated) All enemy armor and resistence decrease by 50%

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DESERT_HEAD_LV2_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated)Creates a poison cloud which deals neutral damage equal to 50% of the Divine Beast's attack power every second for the next 5 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DESERT_HEAD_LV3_DESC.text: (Poisoned sand enhanced) Enemies in the poision cloud cannot receive any buffs

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DOG_ARM_LV1_DESC.text: (by 45% chance when Divine Beast auto-attacks) enemy hero stunned for 1 sec

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DOG_ARM_LV2_DESC.text: (Ally activates a chain-3 skill) The Divine Beast's next 3 auto attacks do an additional 80% of Divine Beast's attack power as neutral damage

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DOG_ARM_LV3_DESC.text: (Blazing wind enhanced) auto attack freezes the enemy Divine Beast, and has a 50% chance to cause an extra attack

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DOG_BODY_LV1_DESC.text: (When the Divine Beast critically strikes 5 times) The Next 5 attacks by the enemy have a 70% chance of being evaded

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DOG_BODY_LV2_DESC.text: (When the Divine Beast evades 5 attacks) the enemy hero is stunned for 2 sec, and the enemy Divine Beast is frozen

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DOG_BODY_LV3_DESC.text: (Enhance Winter Winds) stuns 2 times, and deals additional damage equal to 300% of the enemy's resistance

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DOG_HEAD_LV2_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated) Crack of the Wind deals additional neutral damage equal to 300% of Divine Beast power

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_DOG_HEAD_LV3_DESC.text: (Enemy Goddess skill activated) Crack of the Wind(Lv.1) activated

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_FOREST_ARM_LV1_DESC.text: (When the Divine Beast is healed 5 times) the Divine Beast's auto attacks, for the next 5 seconds, heal the entire party for 50% of the Divine Beast's attack damage

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_FOREST_ARM_LV2_DESC.text: (Ally activates a chain-3 skill) -Can only occur once every 3 seconds- 3 mandragdras are summoned which deal neutral damage equal to 50% of the Divine Beast's attack power

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_FOREST_ARM_LV3_DESC.text: (Lesson of Nature enhanced) causes additional neutral damage equal to 50% of the enemy's attack power

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_FOREST_BODY_LV1_DESC.text: (For every 1% of missing HP) the Divine Beast armor and resistance increases by +5%

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_FOREST_BODY_LV2_DESC.text: (When Divine Beast is attacked 10 times) the entire party heals for 25% of the Divine Beast attack power every second for 5 seconds.\n-This can only occur once every 5 seconds -

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_FOREST_BODY_LV3_DESC.text: (Tranquility enhanced) Healing increased by +10% for 10 seconds and the entire party becomes immune to neutral damage for 5 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_FOREST_HEAD_LV1_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated) affected enemy receives magical damage equal to 5% of one's maximum HP every time the enemy tries to attack

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_FOREST_HEAD_LV2_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated) the Divine Beast is shielded for 1500 damage.

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_FOREST_HEAD_LV3_DESC.text: (Root of the Yggdrasil enhanced) the Divine Beast is shielded for 750 damage and redirects the damage that allies take to the Divine Beast

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_SEA_ARM_LV1_DESC.text: (Divine Beast is buffed, once in every 5 sec) Entire party's attack power increases as much as Divine Beast's armor for 5 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_SEA_ARM_LV2_DESC.text: (Ally's chain-3 skill activated, once in every 4 sec) Summons 3 tridents which deal neutral damage equal to 75% of Divine Beast's attack power

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_SEA_ARM_LV3_DESC.text: (Justice of the Sea enhanced) damage +50%, activated when Divine Beast is buffed

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_SEA_BODY_LV1_DESC.text: (When Divine Beast is buffed, once in every 5 sec) Entire party's (armor / resistence) is increased by the amount of 25% of Divine Beast attack power for 5 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_SEA_BODY_LV2_DESC.text: (When Divine Beast is debuffed) -Can only occur once every 5 sec- The Divine Beast becomes invincible for 2 sec

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_SEA_BODY_LV3_DESC.text: (Mild Explosion! enhanced)When the invincibility ends, attack power is increased by 75% for 3 sec

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_SEA_HEAD_LV1_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated, once in every sec) Divine Beast dash gage acquired by 4 when Divine Beast receives buff during the efffect activation

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_SEA_HEAD_LV2_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated) Activates a water cannon, 5 times, that deals neutral damage equal to 40% of the Divine Beast's attack power

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_SEA_HEAD_LV3_DESC.text: (Law of the Sea enhanced) Ally hero becomes immune to damage for 5 times when effect is activated while Divine Beast is buffed

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_VOLCANO_ARM_LV1_DESC.text: (When Divine Beast auto-attacks) additional neutral damage equal to 50% of attack power by 30% chance

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_VOLCANO_ARM_LV2_DESC.text: (chain-3 skill activated) -can only occur once every 3 sec- has a 30% chance to summon 3 meteors that deal neutral damage equal to 80% of attack power

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_VOLCANO_ARM_LV3_DESC.text: (Destruction of Worlds enhanced) Freezes the enemy Divine Beast and has a 40% chance of reactivating

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_VOLCANO_BODY_LV1_DESC.text: (When ally hero deals 10 critical hits) The next 2 attacks against the party are nullified.

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_VOLCANO_BODY_LV2_DESC.text: (When Words of dragon : Outrage is activated 3 times) Activates Dragon's Claw, which deals neutral damage equal to 150% of attack power

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_VOLCANO_BODY_LV3_DESC.text: (Dragon's Claw enhanced) damage +50%, chance of evasion +75%

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_VOLCANO_HEAD_LV1_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated) Ally's HP cannot fall below 1 during activation (lasts for 1 sec)

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_VOLCANO_HEAD_LV2_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated) summons the Volcano Cannon which deals neutral damage equal to 250% of attack power

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_VOLCANO_HEAD_LV3_DESC.text: (Volcano Whip enhanced) freezes the enemy Divine Beast and increases damage by 50%

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_WINTER_ARM_LV1_DESC.text: (After every 20th attack by Divine Beast and allies) Party's critical strike chance increases by 15% for 5 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_WINTER_ARM_LV2_DESC.text: (chain-3 skill activated by ally) Activates Raging Storm which deals neutral damage equal to 300% of Divine Beast attack power

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_WINTER_ARM_LV3_DESC.text: (Raging Storn enhanced) Freezes enemy Divine Beast, re-activated after every 10th critical hit by Raging Storm

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_WINTER_BODY_LV1_DESC.text: (After every 10th attack by enemies) Party's chance of evasion increases by 25% for 5 seconds

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_WINTER_BODY_LV2_DESC.text: (Every 10th critical attack hit by enemy) Activates the Eye of the Storm which deals neutral damage equal to 250% of enemy attack power

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_WINTER_BODY_LV3_DESC.text: (Eye of the Storm enhanced) critical damage +100%, entire party's received damage is reduced by 50%

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_WINTER_HEAD_LV1_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated) Divine Beast dash guage increased by 6

TEXT_GUARDIAN_SIS_WINTER_HEAD_LV2_DESC.text: (Goddess skill activated) Activates Fatal Blow! which deals neutral damage equal to 250% of Divine Beast attack power

TEXT_GYPSI_HERO_AR_HELP.text: Archers can easily get enemies at the back meow!

TEXT_GYPSI_HERO_PA_HELP.text: Paladin's protection is really good meow!

TEXT_GYPSI_HERO_PR_HELP.text: Priests' healing and buffs are the best meow!

TEXT_GYPSI_HERO_WA_HELP.text: Warriors are great close combat heroes, meow!

TEXT_GYPSI_HERO_WI_HELP.text: Wizards' attack range and support are the best meow!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_101_1.text: Stop it, Orfeo. You are hurting my ears.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_101_2.text: Let me play a song for you, Lady Athena!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_102_2.text: If Sien goes rampant once more...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_102_3.text: You're visiting quite often these days.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_103_1.text: What kind of game should I invent today~?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_103_2.text: I wonder who created 'Super Fighting Cards'?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_104_1.text: Ooh, a ghost! Time to exorcise!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_105_1.text: Who're you, telling me what to do? Watch out, or I'll burn you down!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_105_2.text: If you so wish to be impaled by my thorns, then so be it.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_106_1.text: You seem different from the others.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_106_2.text: Ah, the new Witch of the Forest. Welcome.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_107_1.text: How many times have I told you - you must learn to control your feelings!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_107_2.text: Arita... As ever, your words are thorny as your flowers...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_108_1.text: Vesper!! You dare to pour water over me again?!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_108_2.text: I... I have no knowledge of what you accuse of me.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_109_1.text: Wolfram, do you go to fight today as well...?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_109_2.text: I fight for our city, a city where all can be equal.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_10_2.text:
Kekeke... It seems that my ghoul 
sometimes does miss its prey.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_110_1.text: The human race... is not as evil as you think.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_110_2.text: I'll see for myself the truth.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_111_1.text: The best hero? Hah, I'll retire you again, old man!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_111_2.text: Ugh... This is why I didn't want to make a comeback...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_112_1.text: Hey, Evil Overlord! Your innocent facade can't fool me!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_112_2.text: U-um... I was simply buying some treats for Buddy...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_113_1.text: Changing my robot like this... I will never forgive that old geezer!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_113_2.text: Checking recognition registration code... Traces of obliteration confirmed. Enemy? Ally? Confusing.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_114_1.text: P-please don't stare at them like that! They're my friends!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_114_2.text: Gon, not understand. Animals are food. Not friends.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_114_3.text: Erm... So where does that put me?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_115_1.text: O Foolish Mortal, why do you wander thus?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_115_2.text: I don't know why, but he puts me at ease...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_116_1.text: These white flowers are delicious! And I feel stronger for some reason!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_116_2.text: Oh, you musn't eat these flowers...!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_117_1.text: Hello, how may I help you today?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_118_1.text: I see you don't attack me at first sight anymore, Master Shasha. Huhu.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_118_2.text: Don't fool yourself. I still abhor humans. ... So... How have you been?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_119_1.text: But I wish to know more... everything there is to know about magic.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_119_2.text: How unfortunate. Your genius must not be tarnished by darkness...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_120_1.text: So you are the second Witch of the Forest. The one Master spoke of...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_121_1.text: Dark Magic... Will it truly be the answer to what I seek?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_121_2.text: The deep shadows of the night... tend to contain the truth within, Young Witch.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_122_1.text: Master Susanoo! Oh, you are handsome today as well!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_122_2.text: Haha... You are too kind, Lady Kaguya.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_122_3.text: Why in the world are you blushing, Susanoo?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_123_1.text: Cute button noses and playful tails!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_123_2.text: Pink jelly feet and soft, gentle whiskers!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_123_3.text: All cats are - well, the cat's meow-nya!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_124_1.text: You are a heir to the throne, and yet you abandon your kin so easily.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_124_2.text: I shall not return, Magnus. For I have many tasks ahead of me.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_125_1.text: Captain 9... Your companions would not have wished you this.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_125_2.text: I live only for revenge, and I can never go back.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_126_1.text: A one-eyed beast... would surely make an interesting ghoul.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_127_1.text: No mistakes this time, sir! I'll attack him while he's in the lavatories!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_127_2.text: Hmm... I sense trouble headed this way.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_128_1.text: You know that you are not welcome here, Dark Witch.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_128_2.text: Come now, is that how you welcome a dear old friend?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_129_1.text: One hundred years of sleepless dreams faded not your memory, young one.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_129_2.text: I... had thought that you were dead, after all these years.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_130_1.text: I still cannot believe you are the captain of the famed Musketeers.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_130_2.text: Rumors and shadows... often tend to render a man bigger than he is.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_131_2.text: W-what are you talking about? I don't know what you mean!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_132_1.text: Roland is ... a very sweet man. Would you not agree, Saintess?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_132_2.text: Oh, he surely is! Roland, it seems as if you have made a new best friend!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_132_3.text: Rochefort...! Saintess, please step away from that uncouth man.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_133_1.text: I wish to become a great warrior like you, Rochefort!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_133_2.text: A willingness to sacrifice all for one will take you farther than you think.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_134_1.text: ...Ah... He worries me, for some reason...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_134_2.text: May the Goddess grace you in her purity...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_135_1.text: Perhaps it is wrong of me to think thus, but...she does not seem stable.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_135_2.text: May all sinners repent in the grace of the Goddess... Huhu.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_136_1.text: We would have lost everything if not for your aid.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_136_2.text: I am a warrior of the Woopa Tribe. I did what I must.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_137_1.text: Ooh, I could eat this every day, for the rest of my life! Nom nom...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_137_2.text: Ya really like it that much? Well, eat up!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_138_1.text: Hee hee, let us redefine 'fight like a girl'.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_138_2.text: It will not do you well to be so rude against us.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_139_2.text: This... is neither dead nor living. An unfortunate soul...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_13_3.text:
This time
I'll succeed for sure...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_140_1.text: Ooh, is this renovated piece of beauty your own work? Wow!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_140_2.text: Your gun is also good. Your skills, not bad.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_141_1.text: Delivering news as quickly as the wind! Hanzo's Delivery Service!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_141_2.text: At times I feel his talents are being wasted.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_142_1.text: That girl... She too bears the heavy burden of a second sight.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_143_1.text: He doesn't seem a full human... Perhaps we share a similar curse...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_143_2.text: Sniff sniff... Something smells rather familiar-woof...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_144_2.text: Ahem... Greed and gluttony are vices of the mortal world. Nom nom.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_145_1.text: Hmmm~? That boy smells like gold and jewels!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_145_2.text: I wonder why that nice cat lady is looking at me so strangely?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_146_1.text: Why do you leave, when even the King wishes to reward your feats?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_146_2.text: I shall return... in our kingdom's direst moment.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_147_1.text: Are you truly ignorant of the reason for this long war, Priestess?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_147_2.text: General, all of us hope for only the peace of the Eastern lands.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_148_1.text: Thank you for treating the patients always so earnestly.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_148_2.text: Oh no, nursing is my calling, after all!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_149_1.text: Hmm... I thought I saw a little wolf... Perhaps I was mistaken.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_149_2.text: ... I hope he didn't see me... I'm not yet ready to make... friends.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_14_2.text:
Please listen to me, 
Young Master!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_150_1.text: I could never be bound to only one place! After all, the world is so big and full of wonder!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_150_2.text: Yes. As the hawk cannot forget the sky, I too cannot forget the plains.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_151_1.text: W-woah!! A real-life idol standing right before me!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_151_2.text: Ooh, my fan? Thank you♪ You must be Leon the Warrior!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_152_1.text: Your true history... must never be forgotten.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_152_2.text: Yet it someone seeks to erase it... We will fight.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_153_1.text: The blade of the tribe of Dragon Hunters is sharp indeed.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_153_2.text: The goddess of the battlefield... I see the rumors were not false.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_154_1.text: How to be a truthful monarch... It is a difficult question to answer.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_154_2.text: For years I have sought the answer, and yet I still wonder.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_155_1.text: I did not know the boundaries of light and darkness would be so faint.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_155_2.text: Darkness... dwells more deeply within the light.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_156_1.text: Don't you agree that moustaches and eye patches are symbols of men?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_156_2.text: Hmm? Oho, you have a good eye, my dear fellow!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_157_1.text: Hatred only results in more hatred, Niven!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_157_2.text: Traitor! You are no longer our kin.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_158_1.text: All animal friends are so cute. Hee hee...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_158_2.text: I especially enjoy stroking their soft fur.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_159_1.text: An eye for an eye! We must seek revenge on those who wronged us!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_159_2.text: Will you think a little before waging a war that will destroy everything?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_15_1.text:
I'm just being myself. 
That is all.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_160_1.text: ... I'll be forever grateful to you, Mel. So... please don't disappear again.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_160_2.text: Oh, Teresa. You've grown up so much.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_161_1.text: Please look after Teresa. She can be a little cold, but she means well.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_161_2.text: Of course! She's my partner, after all!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_162_1.text: I do not believe a lady as beautiful as you could be evil.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_162_2.text: I... don't know whether to be grateful or offended. Perhaps both.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_163_1.text: So you are the hunter who scared away the animals of the forest!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_163_2.text: Um, I just wanted to test out my newest gun -..!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_164_1.text: Your Highness, the Cardinal cannot be trusted.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_165_1.text: ... You know much more than I do, don't you, Chief?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_165_2.text: Only the very basics. Now, when will you show me your newest work?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_166_1.text: What a sinister woman. ...Quite unlike my Victoria.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_166_2.text: I simply don't know what you mean. Huhu...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_167_1.text: You...you're just like me, aren't you?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_168_1.text: Cherry blossoms are beautiful for their brevity, aren't they?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_168_2.text: They look like pink snow fluttering in the wind!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_169_1.text: A Demon Lord still losing to the puny humans? Tsk…

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_169_2.text: Not all Demon Lords have to hate humans, you know.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_16_1.text:
I will bring change
to the Witches of the Four Elements!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_170_1.text: I wish to know...how our people faded away in the darkness.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_170_2.text: The truth reveals itself to those who seek it.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_171_1.text: I will not stop, even if I am only echo in the darkness.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_171_2.text: Ksssh... You cannot... kssshhh... break the Commander's will...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_172_1.text: I shall forgive none who dare to taint my master's name.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_172_2.text: A warrior befitting the glory of Roman, I see.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_173_2.text: How could I call the slave of that witch a true warrior?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_174_1.text: I shall soon reveal you as the witch you are.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_174_2.text: Haha... Cordial as ever, my dear old friend.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_175_1.text: All clear, Lady Athena. All is going as planned.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_176_1.text: We will not rest until the last evil disappears from the land.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_176_2.text: ...I would not wish my past on anyone. I will fight.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_176_3.text: Yes! So let's cheer up and fight together, everyone!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_177_1.text: He is the last of my kin. I cannot lose him as well!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_177_2.text: Your 'protection' will hurt him in the end, Isis! Think straight!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_178_1.text: I must know, Isis. As the last heir of our people...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_178_2.text: Osiris, I will stay by your side, no matter what happens.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_179_1.text: You two brought this on yourselves. I'm staying out of this.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_179_2.text: You always say that, Set, but surely you do not mean it.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_17_1.text:
There is... darkness here. 
I... must go...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_17_2.text:
If I could only 
turn you back...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_180_1.text: Is that chocolate I smell? Oh, Melissa~

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_180_2.text: That's enough, Demona! But... maybe a short look won't do much harm...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_181_1.text: Perhaps this temple... will finally reveal the truth I have been seeking for.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_181_2.text: Osiris, you could get hurt! I will lead the way.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_181_3.text: Tsk... All I ask is a quiet nap for a few hours...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_182_1.text: A day of indulgence at the beach... is not half bad, I see.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_182_2.text: A true warrior must have a keen sense of balance, even on the waves.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_183_1.text: Master Giparang! How... how did you...?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_183_2.text: Yeowoodong, I sacrificed everything only for you...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_184_1.text: Defy death and awake, my love, my life!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_185_1.text: Anyone who touches my little sis is dead on the spot, got it?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_185_2.text: Kaori? What brings you to the Archery Clubroom...?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_186_1.text: Oho, I see I have wandered into the waters of the Nagas!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_186_2.text: Ooooh, a human! Or maybe not a human? Hmm.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_187_1.text: Hmm, a new face around these waters.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_187_2.text: Mm... The life of a pirate isn't as good as it seemed...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_188_1.text: If you ever catch on fire... Kssshhh..

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_188_2.text: Stop, drop, and roll!! Remember, kids!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_189_1.text: What a lovely white rose. It blooms for only the most elegant of souls.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_189_2.text: Is that so? Hmm, I wonder how she will find them...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_18_2.text:
I do like your 
hair today.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_190_1.text: Hmm, roses are hard to eat with all these thorns...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_191_1.text: Oh dear! Oh dear! I shall be very late!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_191_2.text: I have a curious feeling that I need to follow that rabbit!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_192_1.text: Only death awaits those who dare to rebel against me!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_192_2.text: His star... is already tainted by darkness.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_193_1.text: Sometimes you simply need to 'chill' at the beach.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_193_2.text: Um, truth to be told, I never really learned how to swim properly...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_193_3.text: This cool and sweet sundae is a lovely summer treat ♪

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_194_1.text: This lantern... seems to shine more brightly than the moon.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_194_2.text: May this lantern shine your path…

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_195_1.text: This may not be an android, but it is certainly a fascinating subject...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_196_1.text: I do wonder what lives up on the moon!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_196_2.text: Sob... When will I ever see my darling again?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_198_2.text:
A cheering band...!
 Thank you. Trust me, we'll win.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_199_1.text: ... This feels very familiar, for some reason...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_199_2.text: Huh, you're really good at farming for a first-timer!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_19_1.text:
I did receive a noble's title, 
you know.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_19_2.text:
Hmmph. 
A pirate is a pirate.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_1_1.text:
I shall protect 
this country with my life.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_1_2.text:
What a relief that
I have such subjects by my side!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_1_3.text:
I vow to fight 
upon your call.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_200_1.text: But don't you like sweet marshmallows much better, Melissa~?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_200_2.text: Kebabs roasted over the fire are just as good, Demona!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_201_1.text: Grr... I smell the blood of a wolf-woof....

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_202_1.text: Welcome to the land of ice and snow, young one.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_202_2.text: That's strange, I thought nobody else lived on this mountain...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_203_1.text: Finders keepers, right? We're gonna be rich!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_203_2.text: Hee hee, you have a good eye for jewels, Lorelei♪

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_204_1.text: My 'detective senses' warn me... you're a no-good criminal-woof!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_204_2.text: Hmm~? I'm nothing but a simple archaeologist, hee hee!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_205_1.text: What a beautiful full moon! It's the perfect day for a trip to the moon!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_205_2.text: I... I have a feeling I should get out of here...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_206_1.text: Ugh, fried fish sticks again?! With all due respect, I hate them, ma'am!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_206_2.text: You still not hungry enough, huh? Wanna starve for a few days?!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_207_1.text: Dancing on land, what a dream come true♪♪

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_207_2.text: You are beautiful as ever, Lady Seiren.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_208_1.text: Rebel against me and you shall die. Die! Hahahahaha!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_208_2.text: It is as I feared. We must act at once.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_208_3.text: Darkness shall befall the kingdom if things continue like this.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_209_1.text: So darkness falls over the land...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_210_1.text: Elaborate plans are what complete an assassination!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_210_2.text: No, a moment's precision decides the outcome. Like brilliant ice shards...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_212_1.text: What kind of bread shall I bake?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_212_2.text: Whole grain bread is the best!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_212_3.text: But you can't miss out on chocolate cake!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_213_1.text: Stop! I'm arresting you for destroying public property!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_213_2.text: Oh, take a break. I'm Hero Mandy, protector of this city!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_214_1.text: Excuse me, I've had complaints about the noise from the neighborhood. Do you have any idea what time it is now?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_214_2.text: Hrrmph. You'll never kill our ROCK SPIRIT!!!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_215_1.text: Another building wrecked, Mr. Borgos. The third time this month!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_215_2.text: I-I'm sorry... Please notify me of any repair costs that need to be paid...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_216_1.text: Hmmph. I had nothing to wear except for this old thing.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_216_2.text: That - that's the ultimate suit of the First Captain!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_217_1.text:
It's busier than usual!
Let's reap some souls, everybody!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_217_2.text:
Let's reap some -
Huh. Very catchy.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_218_1.text: This place ain't for kids. Get out before a ghost gets you.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_218_2.text: I'm an exorcist too, you know! You wanna see?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_219_1.text: Ahem, the First Demon Overlord has returned to claim the throne!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_219_2.text: What! It's really the First Demon Overlord herself!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_21_2.text:
Die, Villain, 
in the name of justice!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_220_1.text: Wow, Vivian♡ I'm taking a photo to show Daddy ♡♡

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_220_2.text: Stop it, Rachel! Erase it right now! Raaaachel!!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_221_1.text: Those sunglasses are so last year.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_221_2.text: I suppose you are too young to appreciate the values of vintage.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_222_1.text: May our song reach the heavens in beauty♪

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_222_2.text: May our song reach the heart of a beauty♪

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_223_1.text: There have been reports of a stranger lurking in the shadows at night...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_223_2.text: Huhuhu, call me not a stranger - it is I, the Goddess of the Night!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_224_1.text: Eek, an Oni! And I'm out of my dangos, too!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_224_2.text: Ah, I apologize for frightening you. I do not hurt humans.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_225_1.text: Hmm... That mechanical arm seems a great add to my collection.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_225_2.text: One invention-stealing professor is enough for me, thanks!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_226_1.text: In the name of love and starlight!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_226_2.text: I will punish you! ... Wait, is this okay?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_227_1.text: Here comes Hasla's greatest marching band♪♪

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_228_1.text: Fast as the wind, elegant as the cherry blossoms!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_229_1.text: Then 'tis time to show off my groovy moves!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_229_2.text: Samba! Everybody, let's enjoy the fiesta♪

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_230_1.text: The soul of the sword craves flesh to sate its bloodlust...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_230_2.text: This blade... contains a malicious spirit within.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_232_1.text: Red roses represent the loyalty and passion of the knights of the Empire.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_232_2.text: Hmph, would you not say white roses are the best, for their purity and elegance?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_233_1.text: You seem to be doing well, Alexander!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_233_2.text: I fear I still have much to learn, Master Schula.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_234_1.text: Alexander, why don't you come pay an old woman a visit to her workshop?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_234_2.text: How dare you speak thus to His Majesty the Emperor!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_234_3.text: Hush Victoria! Please forgive my niece her ignorance, Teacher.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_235_1.text: As I was reporting -slurp-, the boundaries -chew-…

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_235_2.text: Athos, if you may, please swallow before speaking.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_236_2.text: Athos! This is hardly the time to be munching snacks!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_237_1.text: Athos, that is not a rifle. That is a baguette.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_237_2.text: Ah! Well, waste not, want not.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_238_1.text: Athos, have you seen my lunch anywhere?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_239_1.text: To my eyes, the view of your loveliness is enough for a feast!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_239_2.text: Rochefort, please be quiet and eat.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_239_3.text: … I may have just lost my appetite.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_240_2.text: Marpei, should I lead you back to your chambers?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_241_1.text: Hector, say you? Athena's underling will give me a worthy fight!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_241_2.text: She seems a threat… I must report to Athena of this.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_242_1.text: No more than a little child! You hardly seem a morsel.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_242_2.text: I won't lose to you or any under that Ares's command!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_243_1.text: Athena… The time has come to test our strengths!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_243_2.text: You will lay not one finger on Lady Athena.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_243_3.text: Ares's newest warrior…He has taken more than he understands.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_244_1.text:
Hoho, Princess…
 The General worries greatly for your sake.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_244_2.text: Hmph! Whatever you say, you won't chase me away, General!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_245_1.text: There are still many who require my aid!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_245_2.text: Thank you, Master Seimei! You are truly the greatest onmyoji of Ryu!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_24_1.text: Your lance is still as sharp.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_24_2.text:
Would you expect less 
from me, your lover?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_25_1.text:
Will I ever find 
my lady-love?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_27_1.text:
You old geezer! 
Stop this at once!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_27_2.text:
Just a little more... 
Just a little more...!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_28_2.text:
Once I marry Altair, 
we'll become one big family!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_29_1.text:
Don't try to stop me, 
you tin can of a robot!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_2_2.text:
Why is everyone 
so fussy about everything?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_31_2.text:
... You really 
are a fool, Roland.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_34_1.text:
Let go of my 
future husband!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_35_1.text:
I shall not leave 
Athena's side.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_36_1.text:
Do not forget 
the spirit of Roman.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_36_2.text:
General Hector is 
my role model!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_37_2.text:
To become as you are... 
A sad fate, kinsman.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_38_1.text:
The archers of Grancia
are the best in the land.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_3_2.text:
I love spending time
with you, Sister♡

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_40_2.text: It is fate that keeps me from staying by his side.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_42_3.text:
I'm the one who's 
going to protect Mel!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_45_2.text:
Mm. 
I have faith in you.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_49_1.text:
Eh? I didn't quite 
catch you there.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_4_1.text:
Don't worry, Rachel! 
I'm here for you!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_4_3.text:
To hunt demons,
such is my fate.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_50_1.text: At last I caught you.. woof!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_50_2.text:
... I hear someone 
barking nonsense... nyan.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_51_1.text:
A tribe of hawks... 
I need to write this down.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_52_1.text:
The Chrona Heroes... 
will be eternal.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_53_1.text:
Okay, everybody! 
Let's reap some souls!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_53_2.text:
A bright face,
for a reaper of souls.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_54_1.text:
The world of magic 
has no limits!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_54_2.text:
I implore you, 
leave me alone...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_55_2.text:
But what of the sorrow 
and pain she had to face..?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_56_1.text:
All evil, stop! 
Cower in fear!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_56_2.text:
The Night Witches are here.. 
This is embarrassing!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_57_1.text:
I love being 
a cat-human... nyan!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_60_1.text:
Fair skin only comes 
from sleeping well.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_60_3.text:
A rose is more beautitful 
for its thorns.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_61_1.text:
You are as beautiful
as ever, Lady Athena.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_61_2.text:
Your sweet words 
won't fool me.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_62_1.text:
A strange place this is, 
but it is a relief you are here.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_63_1.text:
What do you take me for! 
Thorns aren't tasty at all.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_6_1.text:
A woman of Ryu must 
possess both strength and beauty.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_6_2.text:
I will follow
your advice, Sister.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_70_1.text:
Munch munch... Gah! 
I thought I was going to die!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_71_1.text:
C'mon; let's have 
some fun, my flames!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_78_2.text:
Then let it burn,
as it demands.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_81_2.text:
One dead soul is
quite enough.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_82_2.text:
I must protect
my beautiful village.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_83_1.text:
Those cherry blossoms
look delicious indeed...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_83_2.text:
Are cherry blossoms
truly that delicious?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_84_1.text:
Yes, I shall give Sigruna
those cherry blossoms...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_84_2.text:
I... I am getting
shivers down my spine...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_85_1.text:
Roland! Let's train together!
Are you scared you'll lose?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_87_2.text:
A lovely lady
in this barren desert!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_88_1.text:
Whiskers of the Red Dragon..."
I too wish to have a taste!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_89_2.text: S-Saintess Maria. I picked them for you.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_8_1.text:
I shall avenge her... 
before the end...!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_8_2.text:
No... alliance do 
the Frost Elves need.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_90_1.text: Why do you insist on following me around?!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_90_2.text: O beautiful Victoria. I prepared these for you!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_91_1.text: Ah... I did not mean to offend you, elder brother.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_91_2.text: Abel... You dare to surpass me again?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_92_1.text: Sniff sniff... I smell a cat around here!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_92_2.text: Hmph! Think a dog can catch me?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_93_1.text: The summer beach is the best place to be.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_93_2.text: Summer means swimming in the ocean!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_94_1.text: Hahaha! My machines will take over the world!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_94_2.text:
Full Armor Monte.
Departing for mission.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_94_3.text:
Full Armor Sentinel.
Detected enemy, preparing extermination.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_96_1.text: Please, Rahima, no birds in the classroom!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_97_1.text: This attire is inefficient for battle.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_99_1.text: Let the stars guide your path.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_9_1.text:
To slay the darkness, 
I must embrace it.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_9_2.text:
I already have one 
to whom I have given my heart...

TEXT_INVEN_MAX_HOUSE_ITEM.text: You have reached the maximum limit of your inventory.

TEXT_KEY_REFILL_HELP_DESC.text: You can only buy Keys {0} times a day.

TEXT_KURENAIHIDDEN_BAD_TITLE.text: Consumed by the Blaze of the Eight Narakas

TEXT_KURENAIHIDDEN_CLEAR_DESC.text: The spirit has left, but the memory remains.

TEXT_KURENAIHIDDEN_CLEAR_TITLE.text: Legend of Primal Flames : Hidden Ending Reward

TEXT_KURENAI_HIDDEN_NOTI_TEXT_1.text:
Ooh! Look here!
I've found a hidden path!

TEXT_KURENAI_HIDDEN_NOTI_TEXT_2.text:
There is a hidden path here,
just as I thought. Hmmph.

TEXT_KURENAI_HIDDEN_REWARD_MESSAGE.text: Thank you for purifying the primal flames.

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_10_QUESTION_1.text:
There is a sense of foreboding in the air.
Choose your path with caution.

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_10_QUESTION_3.text:
I will be with you wherever you go,
so don't worry too much in deciding.

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_11_QUESTION_1.text:
Will you follow that spirit?
It may be dangerous.

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_1_QUESTION_1.text: Have you decided where to go?

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_2_QUESTION_1.text:
Ooh, a rabbit totem, how cute!
Do you want to go see it?

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_3_QUESTION_1.text:
Another fork in the road!
Which way should we go this time?

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_4_QUESTION_1.text:
I guess we'll come across quite a few 
crossroads like this on the way.

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_5_QUESTION_1.text:
Have you decided
whom to follow?

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_6B_QUESTION_1.text:
Which path is the correct path
to the totem, I wonder?

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_6B_QUESTION_2.text:
The signpost does point that way,
but there is another road here.

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_7A_QUESTION_1.text:
Oh? There's another path
hidden behind this rock!

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_7B_QUESTION_1.text:
One is an easy road, the other difficult.
Which path shall you choose?

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_7_A_QUESTION_3.text:
It seems that we have arrived at the right place.
I can feel the volcano calming down.

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_7_B_QUESTION_2.text:
We can't go any farther this way.
We should try another path.

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_8B_QUESTION_2.text:
Don't choose a totem because it's cute -
choose your path carefully.

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_9A_QUESTION_1.text:
A brave-looking eagle totem.
Do you think it leads to something?

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_9B_QUESTION_2.text:
These are two distinct totems.
Which one is more effective?

TEXT_KURENAI_STAGE_NOTI_JUNGLE_DEADAND.text:
This totem has already been  corrupted by the shadows.
Let's quickly go find one that's still  pure.

TEXT_LEADER_DESC.text: Players can have access to Information(Skill, Armor) by tapping Hero slot. Leader's blocks are created 50% more that other heroes' block. Players can get more EXP (150%) when using friend's hero.

TEXT_LEADER_DESC_1.text: Leader hero has additional block bonus.

TEXT_LEADER_HERO_DESC.text: Pick a hero to represent your 'account.'

TEXT_LEGENDBREAD_PACK_DESC.text:
Stat MAX Legendary Bread (1 of each kind)
 95 Jewels!

TEXT_LEGENDFRUIT_BOARD_COVER.text: Here's the Legendary Berries of Hasla!

TEXT_LEVELUP_DESC.text: Would you like to level up?

TEXT_LIBRARY_ILLUST.text: Illustrations are unlocked upon acquiring the respective heroes.

TEXT_LIBRARY_TEXT.text: You may acquire information on Heroes, Weapons, and Stories here.

TEXT_LIMITED_COSTUME_SELL_WARN_DESC.text:
Limited costume is included in the selling list.
Sell?

TEXT_LINE_INVITE_EXIT_WARNING_DESC.text:
You cannot multi-play with your invited friend if you exit now. 
Would you still like to exit?

TEXT_LINE_INVITE_LINE_MESSAGE.text:
Let's play Crusaders' Quest together!
[{0}]
[Waiting room number : {1}]
{2}
↑ You can multi-play with your friend when you tap this URL!

{3}
↑ Click and download Crusaders' Quest to save the world with beautiful Goddesses!

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_001.text:
Tip: A hero that has reached its max level 
and training can be promoted.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_002.text:
Tip: Hero Draw is the easiest way 
to gain strong heroes.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_003.text: Tip: Promote a hero to level up to the next rank.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_004.text:
Tip: Warrior and Paladin classes have 
higher HP than other classes.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_005.text:
Tip: Hunters and Archers are most 
effective against a single enemy.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_006.text:
Tip: Wizards are most effective 
against multiple enemies.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_007.text: Tip: Priests are the only class that can heal.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_008.text:
Tip: If you are short on resources, try 
purchasing them at the Shop.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_009.text: Tip: Blocks are continually created as time passes.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_010.text:
Tip: Even when you die during a quest, 
acquired rewards do not disappear.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_011.text:
Tip: You can speak with Goddesses 
at the Goddess Room.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_013.text:
Tip: Skill blocks of a character designated as the main hero
have a higher chance of appearing.

TEXT_LOADING_TIP_014.text: Tip. Gain Heroes and Jewels in Epic Quests.

TEXT_MONUMENT_01_DESC.text: A badge of honor from Valencia, presented for fighting Soltar and freeing the Fortress of Souls.

TEXT_MONUMENT_02_DESC.text: A body pillow used by a mercenary leader obsessed with their fellow heroes…

TEXT_MONUMENT_02_IMAGE_DESC.text: Select the hero to be printed on the monument.

TEXT_MONUMENT_03_DESC.text: A monument presented by Road Industry to the mercenary who broke their top-of-the-line scarecrow.

TEXT_MONUMENT_04_DESC.text: A bridge made of crows to let Altair and Rebecca rendezvous over the Milky Way. While formed by birds, it is said to be quite sturdy.

TEXT_MONUMENT_05_DESC.text: Taro's pet food, given to the mercenary leader who found Remi's secret stash of gold.

TEXT_MONUMENT_06_DESC.text: A gas mask that used to belong to Spyro. Spiny remodeled it for her own purposes.

TEXT_MONUMENT_07_DESC.text: A love letter with a big heart shaped seal. "Thank you for finding me" is written on the back, but there's no hint as to who wrote it.

TEXT_MONUMENT_08_DESC.text: Lorelei sometimes wears this badge while traveling with other heroes, trying to spread her knowledge and know-how in the field of archaeology.

TEXT_MONUMENT_09_DESC.text: A card given by the thankful Popo to a mercenary leader who bought out her store. Toto's pawprint is stamped on the front.

TEXT_MONUMENT_10_DESC.text: A badge of honor bestowed by the Kingdom to the mercenary who became a legend all throughout the lands of Hasla. It looks very familiar, for some reason.

TEXT_MONUMENT_11_DESC.text: A seashell given by the embarrassed Seiren, who begged you to keep her mishap a secret. It seems to be considered very valuable among the Naga tribe.

TEXT_MONUMENT_12_DESC.text: A card given by a man in black to the hero who snuck out of the boundaries of Hero Town. Apparently, you're not supposed to go there.

TEXT_MONUMENT_13_DESC.text: An old but classy machine, given by Road Industry to the mercenary that activated a secret code.

TEXT_MONUMENT_14_DESC.text: A red card given to the mercenary who sent a hero outside of Hero Town through extraordinary means. How did you come up with something like this?

TEXT_MONUMENT_15_DESC.text: An elegy left by Tsukino Kurenai, the first Priestess of Ryu, before her death. The poem seems to bear a cryptic message to her descendants.

TEXT_MONUMENT_16_DESC.text: A frying pan presented by Fergus to all mercenary captains who participate in his cooking contest. A chef's hat is engraved in the middle.

TEXT_MONUMENT_BUGLC_01_DESC.text: A secret key that opens the door to the mysterious company, L.C.

TEXT_MONUMENT_BUGLC_02_DESC.text:
A notebook sealed and bound.
 It seems to contain important secrets within, not meant for the public eye…

TEXT_MONUMENT_BUGLC_03_DESC.text:
Greetings, Crusaders! 
 Congratulations on finding this secret letter.
 We're currently preparing for the 'Season 2: Inheritance' update, so please look forward to the new content headed your way. We hope to see you soon!
 Yours truly, Crusaders Quest PD Sungmin

TEXT_MONUMENT_BUGLC_04_DESC.text: A doll that the dev Gorillamansion gave the hero leader in his gratitude for rescuing him. It bears an uncanny resemblance.

TEXT_PRACTICE_DUMMY_BRONZE_DESC.text: A metal scarecrow made of bronze, an alloy composed of copper and tin. It's more durable than the average scarecrow.

TEXT_PRACTICE_DUMMY_DESC.text: A scarecrow created by top-of-the-notch technology. It's a basic model made of wood, so it's not very intimidating.

TEXT_PRACTICE_DUMMY_DIAMOND_DESC.text: A scarecrow made of diamonds, the hardest organic material known. Little was known of Fergus, and how it is connected to the diamonds we own.

TEXT_PRACTICE_DUMMY_GOLD_DESC.text: A scarecrow made of gold. Both fancy and formidable.

TEXT_PRACTICE_DUMMY_MASTER_DESC.text: A scarecrow made of a mysterious metal called 'Haslium.' Durable enough to withstand even the flames of the Neth's Army Hell Flame Tanks, which contain secret technology of the Road Industry.

TEXT_PRACTICE_DUMMY_PLATINUM_DESC.text: A scarecrow made of platinum. Platinum is a rare element that makes up only 1ppb of the Earth's crust, a mere 25% of  the amount of gold.

TEXT_PRACTICE_DUMMY_SILVER_DESC.text: A scarecrow made of silver. As silver is more conductive than other metals, the scarecrow's movements are much more natural.

TEXT_PRACTICE_OPTION_DUMMY_POWER_DESC.text: Activated upon turning on the scarecrow.

TEXT_PRACTICE_OPTION_POPUP_APPLY_DESC.text:
Settings have been changed.

Apply changes and exit?

TEXT_PRACTICE_OPTION_POPUP_RESTART_DESC.text:
You must restart Practice Mode to change the stage.

Restart?

TEXT_PRACTICE_OPTION_STAGE_DESC.text: Changing the stage will restart Practice Mode.

TEXT_PRACTICE_SKILL_MANAGE_HELP.text: Try out various different special skills!

TEXT_PROMO_REMIND_DESC.text:
Thank you for participating in the Promotion.
Please check your Mailbox for a reward!
(Rewards are given once a day.)

TEXT_PRO_4GRADE_PASSIVE_TITLE.text: Hero has acquired a passive skill.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_ARITA_01_DESC.text: A pot with one of Arita's thorns planted in it. Surprisingly it's sentient, and will prickle against any hand that is not Arita's.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_BROOM_01_DESC.text: A broomstick commonly seen in Pumpkin City. It has been enchanted to clean on its own.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_BROOM_02_DESC.text: A broomstick created out of a broom and magic dust. Although it is the main means of transportation for witches, it requires much delicacy to master it.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_CANDLE_01_DESC.text: Lit with candles. It should prove quite useful when the lights - or mana - suddenly go out.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_CAULDRON_01_DESC.text: Double, double toil and trouble! A must-have item for every witch. Only its owner knows what's boiling in it.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_CHAIR_01_DESC.text: An armchair made of brown leather. The slightly reclining backrest should provide much comfort.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_FIREPLACE_01_DESC.text: A fireplace decorated with festive ornaments for Halloween.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_GRAVE_01_DESC.text: A tombstone engraved to eternalize the memory of a beloved for generations to come. … Actually, this seems to be a fake created for Halloween.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_JACKOLANTERN_01_DESC.text: A lantern created out of mana and a large pumpkin carved with eyes, a nose, mouth, and ears. The very symbol for the Halloween celebrations.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_JACK_01_DESC.text: A toy box that arouses the beholder's curiosity and surprises them upon touch. The traditional model.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_JACK_02_DESC.text: A toy box that arouses the beholder's curiosity and surprises them upon touch. This edition is cuter than the others.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_PUMPKIN_01_DESC.text: A type of vine common in Pumpkin City. Too much magic in the air sometimes grows it to the size of a building.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_SHASHA_01_DESC.text: A furnace containing Shasha's magic. The fierce flames within seem intent on swallowing everything within its reach.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_SHOWCASE_01_DESC.text: A shelf containing various laboratory experiment. Who knew witches were into science?

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_SIGN_01_DESC.text: A sign pointing somewhere… with a very foreboding picture on it.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_SOFA_01_DESC.text: A sofa made of brown leather. Comes with the complementary cushions and a doll.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_TABLE_01_DESC.text: A table commonly used by witches.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_VESPER_01_DESC.text: A bowl with Vesper's pet fish. The initials 'O.S.' has been engraved on the corner.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_BOTTOM_WOLFRAM_01_DESC.text: The residence of 'Mistral,' Wolfram's familiar, when she is in her 'small bird' form.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_BALLOON_01_DESC.text: A balloon decoration that will lighten any mood for the festivals with its bright and funny design.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_BALLOON_02_DESC.text: A balloon decoration that will lighten any mood for the festivals with its bright and funny design.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_GHOST_01_DESC.text: An ornament wrought with mana in the shape of a ghost, which an unnamed girl described in surprising detail.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_GHOST_02_DESC.text: An ornament wrought with mana in the shape of a ghost, which an unnamed girl described in surprising detail.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_GHOST_03_DESC.text: An ornament wrought with mana in the shape of a ghost, which an unnamed girl described in surprising detail.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_LAMP_01_DESC.text: A wall lamp decorated with a pumpkin wearing a hat. It's very Halloween.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_MIRROR_01_DESC.text: A round mirror. Some skilled witches enchant their mirrors for various purposes.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_SYMBOL_01_DESC.text: The emblem of the Four Witches of Pumpkin City. It seems to embody their will to create a city that is equal and just to all.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_WALLPAPER_01_DESC.text: It looks like stone, but it isn't. This realistic wallpaper is much easier to store, plaster, and give rooms their finishing touch.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_WINDOW_01_DESC.text: A window commonly found in witch's homes, made from the sole workshop in Pumpkin City.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_CENTER_WINDOW_02_DESC.text: A window commonly found in witch's homes, decorated by a witch with an artistic flair.

TEXT_PUMPKIN_TOP_CHANDELIER_01_DESC.text: A wooden chandelier with several candles attached. Its elegant charm heightens the beauty of any festival.

TEXT_PURIFYHERO_2.text: I will not forget your kindness.

TEXT_PVP_SMASH_META_SELECT_DESC.text: You can see the detailed information by pressing the skill icon.

TEXT_PVP_SMASH_META_SELECT_SKILL_DEFAULT.text:
Anut's Divine Beast 'Lizaking' is specialized for interruption and counterattack.
It is very powerful against enemies with no buffs, so it is important to continuously control the Goddess.

Sera's Divine Beast 'Windwolf' is specialized for check and evasion.
It has advantage during the early and middle phases of the battle.

Prestina's Divine Beast 'Grent' is specialized for healing and defense.
It does not have powerful attack power but is good for defending during the middle and late phases of the battle.

Aubrey's Divine Beast 'Aquinas' is specialized for controlling special effects. 
When an ally uses buff skills, the divine beast shows its best performance.

Bella's Divine Beast 'Draco' is specialized for attack skills.
It is powerful after the middle phase of the battle to overwhelm the enemy but is weak at defending. Thus, protection from allies is necessary.

Dione's Divine Beast 'Snow Monkey' is specialized for close combat.
As most skills are for close combat, it is hard to show great performance during early and middle stages of the battle. However, it would overwhelm the enemy toward the late phase of the battle.

TEXT_SISTER_BOTTOM_BED_01_DESC.text: A luxurious bed with an wooden frame and soft covers.

TEXT_SISTER_BOTTOM_CHAIR_01_DESC.text: A wooden chair with a leather cushion.

TEXT_SISTER_BOTTOM_CLOCK_01_DESC.text: An elegant, ornate grandfather clock. It chimes merrily every hour.

TEXT_SISTER_BOTTOM_DESK_01_DESC.text: A wooden desk with an ornate frame for the most elegant of rooms.

TEXT_SISTER_BOTTOM_DRAWER_01_DESC.text: A finely crafted wooden table with a candelabra placed on top.

TEXT_SISTER_BOTTOM_SOFA_01_DESC.text: A sofa made out of top-quality wood and leather. Made for elegant rooms.

TEXT_SISTER_BOTTOM_TABLE_01_DESC.text: A wooden table with cotton tablecloth.

TEXT_SISTER_BOTTOM_WARDROBE_01_DESC.text: A 2-door wardrobe crafted out of the finest hardwood.

TEXT_SISTER_BOTTOM_WARDROBE_02_DESC.text: A 4-door wardrobe crafted out of the finest hardwood.

TEXT_SISTER_CENTER_CLOCK_01_DESC.text: A wall clock with decorations resembling a goddess's wings.

TEXT_SISTER_CENTER_PICTURE_01_DESC.text: A frame encasing a famous painter's work.

TEXT_SISTER_CENTER_WINDOW_WHITE_02_DESC.text: An arch window with a larger frame to let in more sunlight.

TEXT_SISTER_NO_SISTER_DESC.text: Goddesses cannot be taken in this stage.

TEXT_SISTER_TOP_LAMP_01_DESC.text: A ceiling light that uses an eco-friendly LED bulb that keeps constant for long hours.

TEXT_SIS_SKILL_CHRONOS_DESC.text: All enemies' motion speed is decreased by 50% for 4 seconds. At the end of 4 seconds, each ally reactivates the last block used.

TEXT_SIS_SKILL_DESERT_DESC.text: Reduces attack power of entire enemy by 50% for 4 seconds, and simultaneously removes all buffs cast on enemy.

TEXT_SIS_SKILL_DOG_DESC.text: Casts over all allies a shield that absorbs 100% of damage for 1 second, and 50% of damage for 1 second afterwards.

TEXT_SIS_SKILL_FRESTINA_DESC.text: Immobilizes all enemies for 4 seconds. Every time ally is hit by enemy, ally's HP is healed by 5% of said ally's maximum HP. If ally attacks said enemy, the ally is healed by 30% of total damage.

TEXT_SIS_SKILL_SEA_DESC.text: Removes all allies' debuffs and grants them debuff immunity for 4 seconds. At the same time, increases the duration of allies' buffs by 3 seconds and effect by 25%.

TEXT_SIS_SKILL_SILUNIS_DESC.text: Ability stats of the entire ally will be increased by 20% each for 4 seconds. After the effect, evasion will be decreased by 50%.

TEXT_SIS_SKILL_VOLCANO_DESC.text: All allies deal additional neutral damage equal to 50% of their original damage for 4 seconds. (Neutral damage ignores enemies' armor and resistance.)

TEXT_SIS_SKILL_WINTER_DESC.text: Deals neutral damage equal to 5% of maximum HP to all enemies and knocks them back into the air. All enemies' attacks have a 50% chance of missing for 2 seconds afterwards.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ARROWRAIN2_DESC.text: Shoots feathers that attack the enemies in back, dealing @magic damage@ equal to (10/25/52)% of the hero's attack power based on chain length.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ARROWRAIN2_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Using chain-3 skill activates 4 magic arrows that deal @magic damage@ equal to 70% of the hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ARROWRAIN2_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Using chain-3 skill activates 4 magic arrows that deal @magic damage@ equal to 100% of the hero's attack power. These arrows have an additional 25% chance to crit.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ARROWRAIN_DESC.text: Shoots 16 arrows that each deal #physical damage# equal to [7/20/45]% of attack power towards backline enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ARROWRAIN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by her arrows have 50% reduced damage for 5 seconds. When a block is used after an ally's chain-3 skill, the arrows will have a 40% chance of exploding, dealing #physical damage# equal to 50% hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ARROWRAIN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by her arrows have 50% reduced damage for 5 seconds. When a block is used after an ally's chain-3 skill, the arrows will have a 40% chance of exploding, dealing #physical damage# equal to 75% hero's attack power. Also, the enemies' SP will decrease by 7.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CALL_HYANG_DESC.text: Call your guards, dealing #physical damage# equal to (150/325/325)% of the Hero's attack power. Chain-3 guards will use explosive arrows.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CALL_HYANG_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Guards called after an ally uses a chain-3 skill count as a chain-3 skill. When an ally uses a chain-3 skill while the guards are attacking, elite guards will be summoned. Elite guards are 1.5 times stronger than normal guards summoned by chain-3 skills.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CALL_HYANG_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Guards called after an ally uses a chain-3 skill count as a chain-3 skill. When an ally uses a chain-3 skill while the guards are attacking, elite guards will be summoned. Elite guards are 2 times stronger than normal guards summoned by chain-3 skills. When guards and elite guards attack the enemy, they will deal additional #physical damage# equal to 10% of the Hero's maximum HP.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CHIRON_DESC.text: Upon using a block skill, Chiron throws a 'Roman Hammer' that deals #physical damage# equal to 300% of attack power. Additionally, he charges [1/3/5] hammer(s) depending on chain number, which he throws as the subsequent auto attack(s). (A maximum of 5 hammers may be charged at once.)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CHIRON_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The second Roman Hammer an enemy receives deals #physical damage# equal to 600% of attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CHIRON_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The second Roman Hammer an enemy receives deals #physical damage# equal to 600% of attack power. If the enemy comes close, Chiron pushes the enemy back while dealing #physical damage# equal to 1000% of attack power, stunning them for 2 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CONDEMN2_DESC.text: Shoots an arrow that pierces the enemy, dealing @magic damage@ equal to (34/122/250)% of attack power based on the chain number.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CONDEMN2_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Block skill activated after ally's 3-chain will change into a single "Critical Shot" attack that deals @magic damage@ equal to 300% of hero's attack power. Critical Shot deals 30% increased critical damage.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CONDEMN2_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon ally's 3-chain, immediately shoots "Critical Arrow" that deals @magic damage@ equal to 200% of hero's attack power. The next block skill is changed into a single "Critical Shot" attack that deals @magic damage@ equal to 300% of hero's attack power. Critical Shot deals 30% increased critical damage.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CONDEMN_DESC.text: Shoots an arrow that pierces the enemy, dealing #physical damage# equal to (34/122/221)% of attack power based on the chain number.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CONDEMN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the leader ally's 3-chain, Gon shoots 'Resolute Shot' to deal #physical damage# equal to 250% of her attack power, and decrease the armor of hit enemies for 5 seconds by 50%. This debuff is only applied to 'Resolute Shot' activated by Gon's passive. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CONDEMN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the leader ally's 3-chain, Gon shoots 4 arrows towards the enemies in the rear to deal #physical damage# equal to 180% of her attack power. Afterwards, she shoots 'Resolute Shot' to deal #physical damage# equal to 250% of her attack power, and decrease the armor of hit enemies for 5 seconds by 50%. This debuff is only applied to 'Resolute Shot' activated by Gon's passive. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FLAME_BLAST_DESC.text: Shoots thorn of hell to an enemy in the rear and deals @magic damage@ equal to (50/120/250)% of the Hero's attack power. A flame stack will pile up equal to (1/2/3).

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FLAME_BLAST_LV2_SUBDESC.text: An enemy damaged by Thorns of Hell is lit on fire and receives $neutral damage$ equal to 50% of the Hero's Attack Power. When this effect is stacked 4 times, the hero shoots a flame arrow that deals @magic damage@ equal to 350% of the Hero's Attack Power. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FLAME_BLAST_LV3_SUBDESC.text: An enemy damaged by Thorns of Hell is lit on fire and receives $neutral damage$ equal to 50% of the Hero's Attack Power. When this effect is stacked 4 times, the hero shoots the ultimate flame arrow that deals 150% $neutral damage$ and 350% @magic damage@. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FLOATNSTING_NAME.text: Float like a Butterfly, Sting like a Bee!

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FROZEN_THORN_DESC.text: Shoots an ice arrow that deals @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/400]% of attack power at enemies in the rear. Hit enemies are pulled towards allies.
