TEXT_TIP_COMMON_TEAM.text: Try saving and editing frequently used combinations in the Team Formation Menu!

TEXT_TIP_COMMON_WEAPON_1.text: You can use Gold to unlock higher weapon upgrade options.

TEXT_TIP_COMMON_WEAPON_2.text: Check the Weapons Management Menu for available options before you upgrade your weapons!

TEXT_TIP_DG_ACCEL_1.text: You cannot use special skills or Goddess abilities in the Time Acceleration Magic Dungeon.

TEXT_TIP_DG_ACCEL_2.text: Blocks are generated at a very fast pace in the Time Acceleration Dungeon!

TEXT_TIP_DG_BREAD.text: Monsters of Chilly Bread Storage only receive damage from particular chains.

TEXT_TIP_DG_RUN_1.text: Race against a flying witch in the Witch Race!

TEXT_TIP_DG_RUN_2.text: Some obstacle pumpkins in the Witch Race are immune to either physical or magical damage.

TEXT_TIP_DG_RUN_3.text: Heroes dash forward upon using Goddess skills in the Witch Race.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_1.text: It seems Pandora has made a grave mistake.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_2.text: Deemo and the Little Girl earned special powers after coming to Hasla... And so did the Masked Girl.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_3.text: The Masked Girl wishes to keep Deemo and the Little Girl from growing the tree and returning to their own world.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_4.text: The higher the tree grows, the more anxious the Masked Girl seems.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_5.text: Will the tree help the Little Girl and Deemo back to their homes?

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_CHAIN_1.text: Using higher chains will help the tree grow faster.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_CHAIN_2.text: Using higher chains will earn more coins.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_RULE_1.text: Touch blocks of the same color when Masked Children and shadows of the Masked Girl approach the line before the tree.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_RULE_2.text: Help Deemo finish playing his piece!

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_RULE_3.text: It is recommended that you turn up the volume while playing the DEEMO dungeon.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_DEEMO_RULE_4.text: Listening to music in the DEEMO dungeon will surely yield better results!

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDEALER_1.text: Fergus's dream of building a transforming robot was foiled by the long war and resulting shortage of iron.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDEALER_2.text: The Ent Robot was born through the combination of Fergus's hammer and Celine's magic.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDEALER_3.text: Fergus's first prototype of the Ent Robot was so small that it could only be controlled by a remote control.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDEALER_RULE_1.text: Deal as much damage as you can to the Ent Robot for 80 seconds!

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDEALER_RULE_2.text: The Ent Robot is highly resistant to neutral damage.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDEALER_RULE_3.text: The Ent Robot has low HP but a very strong shield.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDEALER_RULE_4.text: Champions do not deal direct damage to the Ent Robot.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDISH_HINT_1.text:
The 'Feel' criterion of the scoresheet
changes with Fergus's current mood.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDISH_HINT_2.text: Even the smallest factors can affect your final score.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDISH_HINT_3.text:
The judges won't like common recipes - 
they'll give a low multiplier number if they are bored.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDISH_HINT_4.text: As much as you hate Fergus, please do not poison our only blacksmith.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDISH_STORY_1.text:
Fergus is searching the 'food of the heavens' he ate
in his years of training as an apprentice blacksmith.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDISH_STORY_2.text:
The ingredients are always fresh
thanks to Celine's preservation magic.

TEXT_TIP_EVENT_TOPDISH_STORY_3.text:
The judges' table is quite expensive,
as it has been made with thebest technology of the Neth Empire.

TEXT_TIP_EXCEED_4.text: Soulbound weapons can only be equipped by the relevant hero.

TEXT_TIP_EXPLORE_1.text: Heroes on an exploration are marked with a compass symbol.

TEXT_TIP_HOUSE_2.text: Some decorations possess special features or interactions. Be sure to check them out!

TEXT_TIP_HOUSE_3.text: Try placing your monuments in your Hero Home!

TEXT_TIP_KURENAI_RULE_1.text: Different paths can be taken in the Legend of Primal Flames dungeon.

TEXT_TIP_KURENAI_RULE_2.text: Every playthrough (and rewards!) can turn out different depending on what path you choose to take.

TEXT_TIP_KURENAI_RULE_3.text: Some paths lead to a dead end, so be careful!

TEXT_TIP_KURENAI_RULE_4.text: Fulfilling certain requirements will reveal hidden paths.

TEXT_TIP_KURENAI_RULE_5.text: Monsters that appear from the Hidden Waves are stronger than Normal Wave monsters.

TEXT_TIP_KURENAI_RULE_6.text:
Listen carefully to what the Goddesses say:
they may give clues to finding a hidden path!

TEXT_TIP_KURENAI_STORY_1.text: The house of Tsukino, to which Himiko belongs, is one of the three founding clans of the Ryu Kingdom.

TEXT_TIP_KURENAI_STORY_2.text: Susanoo, Saiga, and Oda were close friends in their childhood.

TEXT_TIP_KURENAI_STORY_3.text: The peak of the Primal Mountain has been devastated by the heat of the volcano, but the foot of the mountain remain lush with jungle.

TEXT_TIP_KURENAI_STORY_4.text: All rings from the Legend of Primal Flames dungeon possess a background legend.

TEXT_TIP_LOADING_TIP.text: Here you can find useful tips for playing Crusaders Quest.

TEXT_TIP_LOBBY_FRUIT.text: The training mark gradually turns from white to purple the more berries you feed your hero.

TEXT_TIP_MEDIA_1.text: Check out other news from Crusaders Quest in the Media menu!

TEXT_TIP_PRACTICE_DUMMY_1.text: The better the scarecrow, the sturdier it is.

TEXT_TIP_PRACTICE_DUMMY_2.text: The scarecrow is reset whenever you restart Practice Mode.

TEXT_TIP_PRACTICE_DUMMY_3.text: Scarecrows are unlocked as you progress through Scenario Mode.

TEXT_TIP_PRACTICE_DUMMY_4.text: Conduct various experiments with scarecrows' cutting-edge technology!

TEXT_TIP_PRACTICE_DUMMY_5.text: You can select the scarecrow in Practice Mode.

TEXT_TIP_PRACTICE_LOBBY_1.text: Learn to work with heroes and test your skills in Practice Mode!

TEXT_TIP_PVP_PVP_2.text: Colosseum opponents are A.I. versions of other Crusaders.

TEXT_TIP_PVP_PVP_3.text: The time limit of each Colosseum ticket is 1 hour.

TEXT_TIP_PVP_PVP_4.text: The Colosseum is reset every Monday, 9 A.M.

TEXT_TIP_PVP_PVP_5.text: You can use Honor to switch your opponent in the Master League of the Colosseum.

TEXT_TIP_PVP_REWARD.text: The Statue of Honor that stands at the village entrance shows the main hero of last week's colosseum rank no.1.

TEXT_TIP_PVP_RULE_1.text: Heroes become more sturdy in the Colosseum!

TEXT_TIP_PVP_RULE_2.text: If duel time exceeds 1 minute, heroes become stronger but cannot be healed from that point.

TEXT_TIP_PVP_TIME.text: The time limit for a colosseum round is 3 minutes.

TEXT_TIP_PVP_TIMEUP.text: After 3 minutes, the winner of the colosseum round is decided by the sum of heroes' remaining HP.

TEXT_TIP_RAID_CONTENTS_1.text: The especially strong Apostles among those created by Destalos are called by a different name.

TEXT_TIP_RAID_CONTENTS_2.text: Fenriruth used to be a section of the 13th Apostle Ouroboros, who was made up of five sandworms.

TEXT_TIP_RAID_META_2.text: If you cannot find a partner, a random AI hero team will appear to help.

TEXT_TIP_RING_1.text:
Essence of Mana can be acquired by
extracting rings from Fergus.

TEXT_TIP_RING_2.text:
Essence of Mana can be used to reset
rings' subsidiary options.

TEXT_TIP_RING_3.text: Essence of Flames can be used to convert rings' ranks.

TEXT_TIP_RING_4.text: Converting a ring's rank requires Essence of Flames and will change the ring's option to maximum grade.

TEXT_TIP_RING_5.text: Converting a ring's option will not yield the same option.

TEXT_TIP_SCENARIO_ATK_PURE.text: Neutral damage ignores the opponent's armor and resistance to deal true damage.

TEXT_TIP_SCENARIO_ATK_TYPE.text: All heroes' attack can be divided into four categories: "physical," "magical," "neutral," and "fixed."

TEXT_TIP_SCENARIO_BLOCK_CHAIN.text: Higher chains mean stronger block skills!

TEXT_TIP_SCENARIO_BOSS_GET.text: Clear stages with corrupted hero bosses, and they may decide to join your company.

TEXT_TIP_SCENARIO_BOSS_SP.text: Boss monsters use powerful attacks once their SPs are fully charged. Be careful!

TEXT_TIP_SCENARIO_GAMEOVER.text: Rewards already acquired are retained even if your heroes die.

TEXT_TIP_SCENARIO_LEADER.text: Leader heroes have 50% more chance of generating blocks than non-leader heroes.

TEXT_TIP_SCENARIO_PENET.text: Penetration is important if you want to deal more damage to enemies with high armor or resistance.

TEXT_TIP_SCENARIO_STATUS_BUFFDEBUFF.text: Did you know? The maximum limit of attack power and attack speed debuffs are 25%, while the maximum limit of evasion is 75%.

TEXT_TIP_SOUL_1.text: The boss heroes of the Fortress of Souls are constituted of heroes belonging to last week's Colosseum ranked Crusaders.

TEXT_TIP_SOUL_2.text: Each hero can participate only once per day.

TEXT_TIP_SOUL_3.text: Use Jewels to retry an already cleared stage and reset heroes.

TEXT_TIP_STATISTICS_1.text: You can check detailed battle statistics in the Battle Results menu.

TEXT_TIP_THANKYOU.text: Thank you for playing Crusaders Quest!

TEXT_TIP_WEAPON_3.text: You cannot convert options of normal weapons.

TEXT_TOPDEALER_LOCK_ACHIEVEMENT_EVENT.text: You can receive reward(s) after participating in {0} rounds.

TEXT_TOPDEALER_MASTERHALL_EXPLAIN_DESC.text:
Upon reaching the Master Tier with a new team,
you will enter the Hall of Fame and receive a reward.

TEXT_TOPDEALER_MASTERHALL_POPUP_DESC.text:
Congratulations on reaching Master Tier with a new team!
You have entered the Hall of Fame.

TEXT_TOPDEALER_MASTERHALL_RESPECT_DESC.text: We express our respect to Hero Leaders who are registered at the Hall of Masters.

TEXT_TOPDEALER_OUT_POPUP_DESC.text:
Your record will not be saved if you exit the game.
Proceed to exit game?

TEXT_TOPDEALER_RANDOM_FUGUS_BOX_DESC.text: Great Success! Fergus has given you a present!

TEXT_TOPDEALER_RANDOM_FUGUS_BOX_NAME.text: Fergus's Gift Box of Great Success

TEXT_TOPDEALER_RENEW_RANK_MOVING_DESC.text: Your rank is refreshed every 30 minutes.

TEXT_TOPDEALER_RESET_POPUP_DESC.text:
Will you reset your daily limit?
The daily limit is reset at {0} o'clock every day.

TEXT_TRAINING_DESC.text: Great Success multiplies training amount by {0}.

TEXT_TRAINING_NOWEAPON.text: There is no bread for training.

TEXT_TRAINING_WEP_BREAK.text:
Weapons used in hero training will be destroyed.
Continue with hero training?

TEXT_TUTORIAL_COMPLETE_DESC.text:
Congratulations! You have completed tutorial mode. 
You may check the help menu in the settings to get further information on the system.

TEXT_TUTO_BOX_INTRO_1.text:
All heroes possess 'skills.'
Use a hero's skill by pressing blocks.

TEXT_TUTO_BOX_INTRO_2.text: Press connected blocks to use stronger skills.

TEXT_TUTO_BOX_INTRO_3.text: Press connected blocks to use stronger skills.

TEXT_TUTO_BOX_INTRO_4.text:
Each hero's skill block is defined by their respective color.
Press the block that you want to use.

TEXT_TUTO_BOX_INTRO_5.text:
Heroes acquire special 'passive skills' upon reaching a certain grade.
Each passive skill requires certain conditions to activate.

TEXT_TUTO_BOX_INTRO_6.text: Using the blocks in order will activate the hero's passive skill.

TEXT_TUTO_BOX_INTRO_7.text: Using all blocks will activate the hero's passive skill.

TEXT_TUTO_EXCEED_2_REWARD_TITLE.text: Here's the reward for clearing Episode 1 Hard mode.

TEXT_TUTO_SOUL_REWARD_TITLE.text: Here are items needed to forge soulbound weapons!

TEXT_TYPE_ABILITY_STAT_DESC.text: Base Stats (Atk. Power, Armor, Resistance, HP) +20%

TEXT_UNABLE_TO_MAKE_TEAM_LONG_DESC.text: The team name has exceeded 12 letters.

TEXT_UNABLE_TO_MAKE_TEAM_SAME_NAME_DESC.text:
Team name exceeds the limit.
Please rename.

TEXT_UNABLE_TO_SEND_LEADER_HERO_DESC.text: You cannot send main hero as supply hero.

TEXT_UNABLE_TO_USE_SPECIAL_MILK_DESC.text: Current buffs should be exhausted in advance.

TEXT_UNLOCK_EXCEED.text: You can now forge weapons from the Weapon Management menu.

TEXT_UNLOCK_FRUIT.text: You've acquired #Berry# for the first time!

TEXT_UNLOCK_GUARDIAN.text: You can now enter the Super Smash Battle!

TEXT_UNLOCK_KURENAI.text: You can now enter #Legend of Primal Flames#!

TEXT_UNLOCK_SECRET.text:
You may now enter the Nest of Divine Beasts.
(Nest of Divine Beasts, Map pieces obtainable from Hard Mode 3-1 stage)

TEXT_UPGRADE_RETRY_DESC.text: The next #retry# will not result in the same hero.

TEXT_USER_PASSIVE_WEAPON_CONVERT_DOWN.text: Exclude weapon upgrade option under LV{0}

TEXT_VOICE_DOWN_DESC.text:
You can download the voice file. 
Would you like to continue downloading the voice file?

TEXT_VOICE_DOWN_DESC_2.text:
Voice files are not required to play the game. 
You may download the files at anytime in the Settings - Voice Settings menu.

TEXT_VOICE_DOWN_DESC_3.text: Would you like to download the voice file?

TEXT_VOICE_DOWN_DESC_4.text:
Language: Japanese
 
There is a voice file.
Download?

TEXT_VOICE_DOWN_DESC_5.text:
You can download the voice file
again from the settings menu.

TEXT_VOICE_DOWN_DESC_6.text: The game will restart to apply audio update.

TEXT_WALL_BASIC_BEIGE_01_DESC.text: Beige, the best color for comforting weary heroes.

TEXT_WALL_BASIC_GREY_01_DESC.text: Grey is the new black. Or its lighter version.

TEXT_WALL_BASIC_MINT_01_DESC.text: Refreshing just like your toothpaste, but it also looks good on your walls.

TEXT_WALL_BASIC_PINK_01_DESC.text: Now your heroes can feel pretty in pink.

TEXT_WALL_BASIC_PLANE_GRAYBROWN_01_DESC.text: This shade of gray-brown won't let you down.

TEXT_WALL_BASIC_PLANE_ORCHER_01_DESC.text: Not just for your hot dogs and sandwiches.

TEXT_WALL_BASIC_SKYBLUE_01_DESC.text: The best color for soothing a hero's frazzled nerves.

TEXT_WALL_FAME_STEEL_01_DESC.text: A wall crafted out of processed steel.

TEXT_WALL_FAME_STONE_01_DESC.text: A rather forbidding wall built of stone bricks.

TEXT_WALL_FAME_STONE_02_DESC.text: A rather forbidding wall built of stone bricks.

TEXT_WALL_FAME_STONE_03_DESC.text: A rather forbidding wall built of stone bricks.

TEXT_WALL_FAME_WOOD_01_DESC.text: A wooden wall that's both classy and comfortable.

TEXT_WALL_SISTER_MINT_01_DESC.text: Mint with white patterns. Still not for your teeth.

TEXT_WALL_SISTER_PINK_01_DESC.text: Pink with white patterns. How chic!

TEXT_WALL_SISTER_SKYBLUE_01_DESC.text: Blue with white patterns. Sophisticated and elegant.

TEXT_WALL_SISTER_YELLOW_01_DESC.text: Yellow with white patterns. A cheery color for your heroes.

TEXT_WEAPHONE_BONUS_MAIL_CONTENT.text: Special Bonus for Limited Hero Contract

Old Weapon is included in your salvage list.

Continue?

TEXT_WEAPON_ANTIQUE_SELL_DESC.text:
Old weapon(s) will be sold upon confirmation.

Continue?

TEXT_WEAPON_CONVERT_CHECK_DESC.text: #Previous upgrade option will be deleted#. Proceed?

TEXT_WEAPON_CONVERT_COST_INIT_DESC.text: Would you like to reset the Upgrade Cost?

TEXT_WEAPON_CONVERT_INFO_GREAT_HELP.text: Upgrading with Great Success will grant 15% additional stats.

TEXT_WEAPON_CONVERT_INFO_HELP.text:
New upgrades unlock depending on
your Player level.

TEXT_WEAPON_CONVERT_LIST_HELP.text: Options can be unlocked by reaching certain levels or using gold.

TEXT_WEAPON_DISMANTLE_DESC.text: You have a small chance of acquiring 25% more Iron in addition to other materials by through salvaging.

TEXT_WEAPON_EQUIP_ALREADY_DESC.text:
The hero already equipped a weapon. 

Unequip current weapon and equip selected weapon?

TEXT_WEAPON_LEGENDARY_DISAMANTLE_DESC.text:
Soulbound weapon(s) will be salvaged upon confirmation.

Continue?

TEXT_WEAPON_LEGENDARY_SELL_DESC.text:
Soulbound weapon(s) will be sold upon confirmation.

Continue?

TEXT_WEAPON_LIMITED_DISMANTLE_DESC.text:
Soulbound weapon(s) of limited hero(es) will be salvaged upon confirmation.

Continue?

TEXT_WEAPON_MANAGE_NOWEAPON.text: You do not own any weapons.

TEXT_WEAPON_SELL_EQUIPING.text:
Selected weapon is equipped by a hero. If you
proceed, it will be unequipped. Continue?

TEXT_WEAPON_SELL_ERROR_DESC.text: There is no weapon to sell!

TEXT_WEEKLY_PVP_QUEST_TITLE_0001.text: Novice Rank: A Road to Victory

TEXT_WEEKLY_PVP_QUEST_TITLE_0002.text: Intermediate Rank: A Road to Victory

TEXT_WEEKLY_PVP_QUEST_TITLE_0003.text: Master Rank: A Road to Victory

TEXT_WEP_AAA_HELP.text: Three attack upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_AAD_HELP.text: Two Attack and one Defense upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_AAU_HELP.text: Two Attack and one function upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_AA_HELP.text: Two attack upgrade for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_ADD_HELP.text: One Attack and two Defense upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_ADU_HELP.text: Attack, Defense and Function upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_AD_HELP.text: Attack and defense upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_ANTIQUE_HELP.text: Meow! You can forge your weapon to powerful Soulbound Weapons!

TEXT_WEP_AUU_HELP.text: One Attack and 2 Function upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_AU_HELP.text: Attack and function upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_A_HELP.text: Attack upgrade for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_BO_S6_20_NAME.text: Bow of the Five Tiger General

TEXT_WEP_DDD_HELP.text: Three defense upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_DDU_HELP.text: Two Defense and one Function upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_DD_HELP.text: Two defense upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_DUU_HELP.text: One Defense and Two Function upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_DU_HELP.text: Defense and function upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_D_HELP.text: Defense upgrade for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_IRON_HELP.text: Iron is expensive like gold these days! Meow!

TEXT_WEP_POWDER_HELP.text: Meow! This is the material for Soulbound Weapons!

TEXT_WEP_SW_S6_18_NAME.text: Call of a Hundred Spirits, a Thousand Gods

TEXT_WEP_UUU_HELP.text: Three function upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_UU_HELP.text: Two function upgrades for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WEP_U_HELP.text: Function upgrade for this weapon, meow!

TEXT_WR_ANCIENT_ANNOUNCER_ARCHON.text:
Resistance is meaningless
to this opponent!

TEXT_WR_ANCIENT_ANNOUNCER_HANZO.text:
You should never look down 
on the newspaper delivery boy!

TEXT_WR_ANCIENT_ANNOUNCER_KANO.text: For song and dance, love and justice!

TEXT_WR_ANCIENT_ANNOUNCER_SIGRUNA.text:
This opponent 
is hungry for tree bark...!

TEXT_WR_ANCIENT_ANNOUNCER_YEOWOODONG.text: Feel the power of tragic love!

TEXT_WR_BREAD_CHAIN_1.text:
Enemy is only affected by 
chain-1 skills!

TEXT_WR_BREAD_CHAIN_2.text:
Enemy is only affected by 
chain-2 skills!

TEXT_WR_BREAD_CHAIN_3.text:
Enemy is only affected by 
chain-3 skills!

TEXT_WR_BREAD_STAGE_10.text:
Length of chain that affects
enemy continuously changes!

TEXT_WR_DG_ACCEL_SPEED.text:
Oh no! Magic overload...!
Look out for side effects!

TEXT_WR_DG_ACCEL_SPEED_INIT.text:
The battle begins amidst
time acceleration magic!

TEXT_WR_DG_BUGLC_LOGIC_0001.text: Woohoo! Let's contaminate all the machines!

TEXT_WR_DG_BUGLC_MOVE_SPEED_DOWN_0001.text: Ugh, these bugs are so annoying… Don't stop now!

TEXT_WR_DG_BUGLC_SAVE_DEVELOPER_0001.text: Wait, that's… Let's go. This isn't the time for standing around!

TEXT_WR_DG_BUGLC_SAVE_DEVELOPER_SUCCESS.text: This guy's keen on escaping, huh? Thanks to him, your block generation speed has been increased.

TEXT_WR_DG_BUGLC_SPEED_DOWN_0001.text: Hmm, time's slowing down… Use my power. It should help.

TEXT_WR_DG_RWBY_RUN_FAIL.text: I should be leaving now. Ciao!

TEXT_WR_EP5_BLIZZARD_SIS_CHRONOS.text: Blizzards. Do not panic and use my power.

TEXT_WR_EP5_BLIZZARD_SIS_DESERT.text:
Ugh, another one!?
I'll rip it to shreds.

TEXT_WR_EP5_BLIZZARD_SIS_DOG.text:
Watch out! It's a blizzard!
Quickly, use my power!

TEXT_WR_EP5_BLIZZARD_SIS_FOREST.text:
I see a storm brewing.
Use the power of the goddess!

TEXT_WR_EP5_BLIZZARD_SIS_SILUNIS.text:
A snowstorm is approaching. 
Let my powers help you.

TEXT_WR_EP5_BLIZZARD_SIS_SILUNIS_HIDDEN.text:
A snowstorm approaches. 
Let my powers help you.

TEXT_WR_EP5_BLIZZARD_SIS_VOLCANO.text:
Hmph. Flurries!
Use my power if you need it!

TEXT_WR_EP5_BLIZZARD_SIS_WINTER.text:
Quite the blizzard.
Calm down, just use my power.

TEXT_WR_EP7_DIONNE_BOSS_DIONNE.text:
Kukuku... You rotting piece trash! 
Fight to your deaths! Kukuku!

TEXT_WR_EP7_DIONNE_BOSS_DIONNE_NOFACE.text: A forboding gloom enfolds the enemy.

TEXT_WR_EP7_EL_BOSS_ELTALOS.text: Here all light shall be quenched.

TEXT_WR_EP7_EL_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
My abilities are being repressed, 
but they shall return before long. Fear not.

TEXT_WR_EP7_EL_SIS_DESERT.text:
What? My powers aren't working! 
T-time out!

TEXT_WR_EP7_EL_SIS_DOG.text:
I...I think I spent all my powers. 
Whew...

TEXT_WR_EP7_EL_SIS_FOREST.text:
... My powers are not returning. 
Is it possible to rest a little?

TEXT_WR_EP7_EL_SIS_SEA.text:
... That being... 
has swallowed my powers...

TEXT_WR_EP7_EL_SIS_SILUNIS.text:
The void has swallowed the light... 
Yet it shall surely return.

TEXT_WR_EP7_EL_SIS_SILUNIS_HIDDEN.text:
The void has swallowed the light... 
Yet fear not, it shall return.

TEXT_WR_EP7_EL_SIS_VOLCANO.text:
I-I'm just a bit tired! 
Protect me in the meantime!

TEXT_WR_EP7_EL_SIS_WINTER.text:
A worthy foe, to have stolen my powers. 
Wait... they will return!

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_HARD_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
No SP? I see.
Let us calmly see to the situation.

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_HARD_SIS_DESERT.text:
Woah?! What's this?
Our SP isn't recharging!

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_HARD_SIS_DOG.text:
The SP isn't recharging at all!
What's happening?!

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_HARD_SIS_FOREST.text:
It is true we cannot obtain SP,
but don't be afraid.

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_HARD_SIS_SEA.text:
...This darkness. It's
keeping us from gaining SP.

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_HARD_SIS_SILUNIS.text:
We shall not be able to obtain SP
before this darkness passes.

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_HARD_SIS_SILUNIS_HIDD.text:
We shall not be able to obtain SP
before this darkness passes.

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_HARD_SIS_VOLCANO.text:
Hmmph. The SP isn't recharging!
Maybe it's due to this darkness...

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_HARD_SIS_WINTER.text:
Oho, our SP has been sealed off, I see.
Yet we shall not fall back!

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
Fear not. 
1-chain and 3-chain attacks generate SP.

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_SIS_DOG.text: Eh? Using 2-chains won't fill up our SP!

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_SIS_FOREST.text: Only 1-chain and 3-chain attacks will generate SP.

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_SIS_SEA.text:
... You can only earn SP 
through 1-chain or 3-chains here...

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_SIS_SILUNIS.text:
To earn SP you must use 
1- or 3-chain attacks.

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_SIS_SILUNIS_HIDDEN.text:
To earn SP you must use 
1- or 3-chain attacks.

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_SIS_VOLCANO.text:
If you want SP, 
you'll need to use 1-chain or 3-chains!

TEXT_WR_EP7_HELLAD_SIS_WINTER.text:
So 2-chains do not generate SP. 
An interesting ability indeed!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_FIRE_WIND_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
Use my powers.
This heat could be used to our advantage.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_FIRE_WIND_SIS_DESERT.text:
Ooh, hot.
But my powers are stronger!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_FIRE_WIND_SIS_DOG.text:
Ouch, hot! 
But I can block it with my powers!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_FIRE_WIND_SIS_FOREST.text:
Oh, what a fiery wind.
Use my powers; I shall block it for you.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_FIRE_WIND_SIS_SEA.text:
... This hot wind is uncomfortable.
Use my powers... I'll cool us down.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_FIRE_WIND_SIS_SILUNIS.text:
This… volcanic wind…? 
Use my powers. It may come in handy.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_FIRE_WIND_SIS_SILUNIS_HI.text:
This… volcanic wind…? 
Use my powers. It may come in handy.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_FIRE_WIND_SIS_VOLCANO.text:
Use my powers. I'll show you
the real goddess of the volcano!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_FIRE_WIND_SIS_WINTER.text:
Ha, what a pitiful attack with hot air!
I can just blow it away no problem.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_HIDDEN_BOSS.text:
Will cutting down that revenant give me answers?
Then I shall burn it with my flames!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_HIDDEN_START.text:
A mysterious power seeps out from the ring...
Perhaps it has something to do with the spirit we just saw.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_3_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
... Ensnared by the vines, I see.
Break free by rapidly using blocks.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_3_SIS_DESERT.text:
Ugh! I can't move anymore!
Let's escape by rapid firing blocks!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_3_SIS_DOG.text:
We're trapped!
Press the blocks quickly to escape!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_3_SIS_FOREST.text:
Oh dear, we're trapped. It is alright though;
will you try pressing your blocks?

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_3_SIS_SEA.text:
... We can't move...
Let's try using a bunch of blocks...

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_3_SIS_SILUNIS.text:
These vines are trapping us.
Press blocks in succession to escape.

These vines are trapping us.
Press blocks in succession to escape.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_3_SIS_VOLCANO.text:
These insolent vines! Tying us up!
Quick! Use your blocks!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_3_SIS_WINTER.text:
Hahaha! We're trapped... interesting.
But there's no time for this. Press the blocks.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
These are not normal plants.
I feel something ominous about them, be careful.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_SIS_DESERT.text:
Ah! Something's grabbing my feet!
These vines are so gross!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_SIS_DOG.text:
Huh? There's something wriggly...
These vines are giving me the creeps...

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_SIS_FOREST.text:
These are mischievous vines,
to be clutching my feet like this.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_SIS_SEA.text:
... How rude,
you should be careful of these vines...

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_SIS_SILUNIS.text:
These vines do not mean well.
Be careful where you step.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_SIS_SILUNIS_H.text:
These vines do not mean well.
Be careful where you step.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_SIS_VOLCANO.text:
What are these annoying things?
Ha, they have some nerve, grabbing me!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_PLANT_SIS_WINTER.text:
Grabbing ME? These plants have nerve!
These are worth keeping an eye on!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
Stop flailing about in such an disgraceful manner.
I can release you from the binds.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_SIS_DESERT.text:
Ugh, it's hard to move in this rain.
Let's get through with my powers!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_SIS_DOG.text:
It's cold and sludgy…
Use my power to shake it off!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_SIS_FOREST.text:
Rain is good for plants, but not now.
Won't you try using my powers?

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_SIS_SEA.text:
... Water is good, but this rain...
I'll make it stop with my powers...

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_SIS_SILUNIS.text:
This rain binds the feet.
It can be washed away with the power of light.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_SIS_SILUNIS_HIDDEN.text:
This rain binds the feet.
It can be washed away with the power of light.

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_SIS_VOLCANO.text:
Mere rain won't extinguish me.
I'll burn it up with my powers!

TEXT_WR_KURENAI_RAIN_SIS_WINTER.text:
Impediments, tsk.
Let me give you a hand.

TEXT_WR_OLYMPIC_RAIN_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
The torch might go out.
Protect the torch with my power.

TEXT_WR_OLYMPIC_RAIN_SIS_DESERT.text:
Gee! It's icy!
Use my power to fire up!

TEXT_WR_OLYMPIC_RAIN_SIS_DOG.text:
Oops! Such cold rain!
I will protect the torch from the rain with my power!

TEXT_WR_OLYMPIC_RAIN_SIS_FOREST.text:
Rain helps trees grow,
but puts fire out. Please use my power.

TEXT_WR_OLYMPIC_RAIN_SIS_SEA.text:
... I don't hate rain...
But not now... I should make it stop with my power.

TEXT_WR_OLYMPIC_RAIN_SIS_SILUNIS.text:
Protect the torch from the rain with my power. 
The flame must be protected.

TEXT_WR_OLYMPIC_RAIN_SIS_SILUNIS_HIDDEN.text:
Protect the torch from the rain with my power. 
The flame must be protected.

TEXT_WR_OLYMPIC_RAIN_SIS_VOLCANO.text:
This much rain won't stop me.
Captain, show them my power!

TEXT_WR_OLYMPIC_RAIN_SIS_WINTER.text:
Tickling. 
I can blow them away with my power.

TEXT_WR_RAID_BS_MANACAR_END_AIRBOOM.text:
Gasp... What is this devilry...? 
It is as if my powers have been drained.

TEXT_WR_RAID_BS_MANACAR_END_OPENING.text:
So it has completely revived its powers... 
It is the end if we do not stop it here.

TEXT_WR_RAID_BS_MANACAR_RUIN_GARDEN_LV2.text:
There are more flowers.
Watch out!

TEXT_WR_RAID_BS_MANACAR_VOID_REGACY.text:
That is... indeed very dangerous.
Destroy it!

TEXT_WR_RAID_BS_MANACAR_VOID_WEAKNESS.text:
Feels like all the power is 
leaving me... What is this...!

TEXT_WR_RAID_BS_MANACAR_VOID_WORLDRULES.text:
Seems like he is after a
hero with higher SP first.

TEXT_WR_SMASH_LETS_ROCK_SECOND_SIS_DESER.text:
The enemy is strong!
Let's not back away!

The enemy is strong!
Let's not back away!

TEXT_WR_SMASH_LETS_ROCK_SECOND_SIS_DOG.text:
We must put the battle to an end!
Keep it up!

TEXT_WR_SMASH_LETS_ROCK_SECOND_SIS_DOG_H.text:
We must put the battle to an end!
Keep it up!

TEXT_WR_SMASH_LETS_ROCK_SECOND_SIS_FORES.text:
We are almost at the end!
Do your best until the end!

We are almost at the end!
Do your best until the end!

TEXT_WR_SMASH_LETS_ROCK_SECOND_SIS_SEA.text:
So boring...
Let's put an end to this.

TEXT_WR_SMASH_LETS_ROCK_SECOND_SIS_SEA_H.text:
So boring...
Let's put an end to this.

TEXT_WR_SMASH_LETS_ROCK_SECOND_SIS_SILUN.text:
The battle is at its peak. 
Let us claim the victory that is ours.

The battle is at its peak.

They automatically generate 1 ally block upon appearance. The loser of the game flips the Weiqi board to deal @magical damage@ equal to ^200% of their attack power^ to enemies, stunning them for 0.8 seconds.

TEXT_CHAMP_CHEN_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: Lu Dongbin and He Xiangu play Weiqi and deal @magical damage@ equal to ^100% of their attack power^ 8 times. They automatically generate 1 ally block upon appearance. The loser of the game flips the Weiqi board to deal @magical damage@ equal to ^300% of their attack power^ to enemies, stunning them for 0.8 seconds.

TEXT_CHAMP_CHEN_DESC.text: Lu Dongbin and He Xiangu are training under Chen's Master Ethereal to become Ethereals themselves. He Xiangu is the elder of the two, having brought Lu Dongbin to her Master after discovering his potential to become an Ethereal. However, despite their long training and mastery, they continuously fail to overcome their last trial of wisdom, remaining as 'Half Saints.' Although the Master Ethereal teaches Lu Dongbin and He Xiangu Weiqi to guide them to their path, the two disciples fail to understand their master's meaning: Lu Dongbin cannot stand losing, while He Xiangu can never bring herself to sacrifice a single stone. The Master Ethereal finally tells the two disciples to go and meet other masters of Weiqi in the hopes that they will finally achieve enlightenment. In the lands of Chen, where the two begin their ruthless winning streak, Lu Dongbin and He Xiangu win round after round of Weiqi. Their pride in their countless victories leads them to hear rumors of an expert of the name of Hansung, whom they challenge at once. Although the match between the two Saints and Hansung continues for three days and three nights, victory falls to no one. When Lu Dongbin and He Xiangu, struck with his skill, ask Hansung how an "ordinary human" can play Weiqi so well, the wise warrior tells them to go to Hero Town - where they shall find their answer.

TEXT_CHAMP_CHEN_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text: Upon Lu Dongbin and He Xiangu's appearance, 3 ally blocks are generated as compressed 3-chains.

TEXT_CHAMP_CHEN_PASSIVE_LV1_DESC.text: Allies' armor penetration and resistance penetration are increased by 150.

TEXT_CHAMP_CHEN_PASSIVE_LV2_DESC.text: Allies' armor penetration and resistance penetration are increased by 200.

TEXT_CHAMP_CHEN_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: Allies' armor penetration and resistance penetration are increased by 260.

TEXT_CHAMP_GRAN_KNIGHT_ACTIVE_LV1_DESC.text: Galahad deals #physical damage# equal to ^250% of his attack power and 450% of his resistance.^ For 4 seconds afterwards, he absorbs ^40% of all damage received by the entire team.^

TEXT_CHAMP_GRAN_KNIGHT_ACTIVE_LV2_DESC.text: Galahad deals #physical damage# equal to ^266% of his attack power and 500% of his resistance.^ For 4 seconds afterwards, he absorbs ^50% of all damage received by the entire team.^

TEXT_CHAMP_GRAN_KNIGHT_ACTIVE_LV3_DESC.text: Galahad deals #physical damage# equal to ^280% of his attack power and 600% of his resistance.^ For 4 seconds afterwards, he absorbs ^60% of all damage received by the entire team.^

TEXT_CHAMP_GRAN_KNIGHT_ACTIVE_LV4_DESC.text: Galahad deals #physical damage# equal to ^280% of his attack power and 680% of his resistance.^ For 4 seconds afterwards, he absorbs ^70% of all damage received by the entire team,^ and generates 1 random block for every 2 hits he receives. (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_CHAMP_GRAN_KNIGHT_ACTIVE_LV5_DESC.text: Galahad deals #physical damage# equal to ^341% of his attack power and 750% of his resistance.^ For 4 seconds afterwards, he absorbs ^80% of all damage received by the entire team,^ and generates 1 random block for every 2 hits he receives. (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_CHAMP_GRAN_KNIGHT_EXCLUSIVE_DESC.text: When Galahad uses 'Iron Guard' or 'Light of Guardiance,' the next 2 ally blocks are activated as ^3-chains.^

TEXT_CHAMP_GRAN_KNIGHT_PASSIVE_LV1_DESC.text: The entire team becomes more ^resistant to enemy critical hits by 20%.^

TEXT_CHAMP_GRAN_KNIGHT_PASSIVE_LV2_DESC.text: The entire team becomes more ^resistant to enemy critical hits by 30%.^

TEXT_CHAMP_GRAN_KNIGHT_PASSIVE_LV3_DESC.text: The entire team becomes more ^resistant to enemy critical hits by 40%.^ If an ally receives a critical hit, their armor and resistance are increased by 200 for 1 second.

TEXT_CHA_AR_1_11_DESC.text: The ultimate scarecrow. Why sit still to scare away birds when you can just shoot them down? … For obvious reasons, this model was banned from the market after its release.

TEXT_CHA_AR_2_15_DESC.text: A former soldier who became a freelancing archer after discovering the rigidity of the military. After an inexplicable accident, he became possessed by a ghost, much to the dismay of his partner.

TEXT_CHA_AR_3_17_DESC.text: The original - and grammatically correct - name would be "Flaming Ninjas," but apparently she was feeling very competitive against the "Stormy Ninjas."

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_22_DESC.text: A witch who has hidden into a church from a detective who is hunting her down for alleged theft. Despite her rather ill-fitting nun costume, her persuasive charade wins the trust of the townspeople. Maybe she was too persuasive, in fact - Genevie finds herself unable to leave the town.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_23_DESC.text: Deep in the mountains of Chen, where no human traveler dare to tread, peacefully lives a tribe of Pandas. Despite their serene nature, the Pandas have one great problem: no child has been born to their tribe for decades. Thus when a child is born at last in the house of Panpan, the whole village celebrates in joy. Panpan, however, soon discovers that his son has been born with a disease that slows his growth.

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_24_DESC.text: The daughter of a hunter living near the border of the Roman Republic. After being bitten by a strange-looking spider, Arachne finds herself able to understand the spider language. Hunter by blood, Arachne quickly applies her newly discovered skills by asking spiders to create webs to use as traps or lend her spider venom for hunting. Yet Arachne discovers a downside to her gift: fine hair and spikes begin protruding all over her face and body, which she covers up in her cloak.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_22_DESC.text: The peaceful little town proves rather dull for Genevie, who decides to learn archery to pass the time. She turns out to be terrible with the bow, however, and the children of the village relentlessly tease her. One day, Genevie hits bulls-eye with every arrow, surprising everyone. It turns out that she can use magic to guide her arrows to the target. Days continue by lethargically, until one fateful day when monsters come attacking the town.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_23_DESC.text: In hopes of treating his son's disease, Panpan prays day and night in the Bamboo Forest. One day, two weiqi-playing Ethereals appear before the desperate Panda, touched by his fatherly devotion. The two Ethereals tell him that medicine made from the liver of a rabbit will cure Panpan's son, and Panpan leaves at once to hunt down a live rabbit.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_24_DESC.text: Arachne finds her strange bond with spiders growing stronger as time passes. The "curse" affecting her body becomes more prominent as well, and Arachne flees from the village so no one can find her. It is only after Athena, hearing the rumors of a strange hunter who can speak to spiders, summons her that Arachne hesitatingly steps out from her seclusion.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_22_DESC.text: Realizing that the monster attack is her ultimate opportunity to escape, Genevie attempts to flee in the midst of the uproar. However, when she hears the scream of a child trapped before a vicious monster, Genevie finds herself hesitating between the child and the pathway to her freedom. Another desperate scream startles her into action, and she turns away from her escape route to rapidly draw her bow. It is only after she returns to the town, the child safe in her arms and people praising her with every step, that she realizes the magnitude of her actions. How will she ever leave, now that she is the new hero of the town?

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_23_DESC.text: After wandering throughout the lands and defeating many beasts that cross his path, Panpan hears of a Rabbit Princess who rules over a small mountain. Panpan challenges the Princess to a duel, which continues for a week to the Panda's utter defeat. Finding himself once more at the foot of the mountain, Panpan thinks of his beloved son and vows that he will never give up until he is cured.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_24_DESC.text: Athena understands the extent of Arachne's strength at a glance and asks the hunter to join her forces. Arachne, grateful for being accepted without prejudice, accepts the offer and swears to stay by Athena's side to the end. Having shed the fear that had held her back, Arachne fully turns into the Spider Queen: the deadly beauty and Athena's champion, vanquishing all foes that dare step into her web.

TEXT_CHA_HU_1_11_DESC.text: A craftsman who makes toy guns to pass the time. Immersed in her hobby, she thinks she finally succeeds in making a perfect replica of the most popular model and doesn't realize she made an actual gun…

TEXT_CHA_HU_2_15_DESC.text: An enthusiast of vampire stories. On nights of the full moon, she dresses up as a vampire hunter (to the last detail as written in her books!) and wanders the streets in hopes to catch a glimpse of the fabled species.

TEXT_CHA_HU_3_17_DESC.text: A hunter who chases after anything lucrative. Hunting people was too scary for him, so he decided to go after the bounty itself - hence his title, a "bounty hunter."

TEXT_CHA_HU_4_22_DESC.text: A spy of Neth Empire who has received training from his childhood. Acknowledged as one of the best spies in the Empire, Zahard receives a secret mission to investigate the Palace of Chen. Under the disguise of an ordinary transfer student, Zahard leaves for the East.

TEXT_CHA_HU_4_24_DESC.text: A young man who has grown up in the slums of the Southwestern regions of Hasla. Despising the poverty that permeates his life, Jet tries his hand at every job he can get - but finds himself still destitute. One day, Jet receives advice from a self-proclaimed "bounty hunter" that bounty-hunting should be lucrative enough for his aspirations.

TEXT_CHA_HU_5_22_DESC.text: Zahard successfully carries out his mission, but discovers that he is being suspected as a double agent of Chen. Fearing for his life, he flees the Empire to the kingdom of Chen.

TEXT_CHA_HU_5_24_DESC.text: Jet becomes a novice bounty hunter, aspiring to earn enough money to "live a better life somewhere else." His skills are yet crude and unpolished, but his tenacity makes up for the lack of expertise. Once Jet has his eyes on a bounty, he never fails in obtaining it!

TEXT_CHA_HU_6_22_DESC.text: Believing that he has been betrayed by Neth Empire, Zahard applies for asylum upon arriving in Chen, using the knowledge he has accumulated from his missions. The Emperor of Chen hears of the spy's request and, interest piqued by his allegations, allows him an audience. Zahard reveals the truth of all that has happened, winning the Emperor's trust. He is granted asylum in Chen, and is later accepted to the Elite Secret Forces. Zahard continues to carry out undercover missions in his new home.

TEXT_CHA_HU_6_24_DESC.text: Now a living legend among bounty hunters, Jet becomes loaded with not only bullets but an immense fortune that allows him to escape the dreaded slums of his youth. Yet his hunger for money - or perhaps something else - remains unsatiated, and he continues his career as Loaded Jet, the greatest bounty hunter the southwestern lands have ever seen!

TEXT_CHA_HU_LIMITED_YS8_4_HUMMEL_DESC.text: A Transporter full of mysteries and extreme pride in his career. Once accepting a request from a client, Hummel will refuse to rest until he finds it perfectly carried out.

TEXT_CHA_HU_LIMITED_YS8_5_HUMMEL_DESC.text: Hummel boards the Lombardia for his newest 'job.' After being shipwrecked on the Isle of Seiren, he meets Adol and company in their exploration of the island. Hummel ignores them in the beginning, but joins them after realizing that their objectives are the one and the same.

TEXT_CHA_HU_LIMITED_YS8_6_HUMMEL_DESC.text: Hummel thanks Adol and company after he finishes his 'job' at the northern regions of the Isle of Seiren. Declaring that a safe return home is also a part of his 'job,' he wholeheartedly joins Castaway Village in their mission to escape the island. During their explorations, however, the company is teleported by a mysterious Energy Crystal to the land of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PA_1_11_DESC.text: A scholar who lives in the forest to collect plant samples more easily. He has a habit of talking to himself, the villagers say.

TEXT_CHA_PA_2_15_DESC.text: A nameless knight who silently carries out the requests of his village while others clamor for fame and renown.

TEXT_CHA_PA_3_17_DESC.text: Nothing is known about this mysterious protector of the Ents - save that he is enraged at a certain Elf for daring to eat Ent bark. How barbaric!

TEXT_CHA_PA_4_22_DESC.text: The son of a house of warriors on the outskirts of the Kingdom of Chen. Although his family wishes for Mengqi to become a scholar and thus obtain fame and wealth more easily, Mengqi only wishes to become a warrior like his father. A strained relationship with his father quickly escalates to an outburst, which leads to Mengqi being kicked out of his home. Mengqi leaves with his beloved stallion 'Fierce Dragon' to seek the path of the warrior.

TEXT_CHA_PA_4_23_DESC.text: A run-of-the-mill mercenary of Nosgard. One day, Heim happens to hear a rumor of great treasure hidden deep in the forbidden Sacred Ground of Nosgard. Ignoring the fact that no one is allowed to tread into the sanctuary, Heim persuades some of his friends to follow him on what should be his most lucrative adventure.

TEXT_CHA_PA_4_24_DESC.text: A wizard idol star produced to compete against Cano. Despite her slogan "Wizard Girl with Magic Power that Hunts Down Villains", some say she pushes around the special effects team to make her look like an actual magic wielding wizard.

TEXT_CHA_PA_5_22_DESC.text: In the foggy depths of the mountains Mengqi trains alone, never looking back. When he finally steps forth to take the performance exams of Chen, his prowess and skill with his spear makes him an instant favorite with the generals of Chen. Yet Mengqi regards his success as short-reached, and leaves for the frontlines of the battlefield to perform great feats his father may acknowledge.

TEXT_CHA_PA_5_23_DESC.text: Heim and company barely defeat the Guardian of the Sacred Ground before entering the forbidden sanctuary. They soon realize that the sanctuary is guarding something under its seal, but before they can escape they fall under a cursed sleep. Doomed to become the new Guardians of the Sacred Ground, they slumber...

TEXT_CHA_PA_5_24_DESC.text: She would always have a chat with villains ahead of the match, during which they would surrender. This makes fans raving over Yuna calling her an "Icon of Peace," however, those who had "the chat" with her could not particularly agree with that nickname.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_22_DESC.text: Mengqi fights at the vanguard of his army for five long years, achieving one victory after another until the war is won. His glorious return home is met by a heartfelt reunion and acknowledgement from his father. Mengqi, renewed by his father's approval, goes on to perform greater feats and victories, winning for himself the title of the Five Tiger General of Chen.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_23_DESC.text: ...Until one day, after hundreds of years, when a break in the seal of the sanctuary finally awakens Heim. Heim accepts the curse of the Guardian and, his determination renewed, begins searching for the disturbance. Through his yet hazy mind memories of a clown flash by now and then, and Heim closes his eyes in confusion.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_24_DESC.text: One day, a villain who requested to remain unnamed talks to media that Yuna's magic is fabricated and she is in fact so violent and such a bully that even the worst villains do not want to get into a fight with her. The potential publicity nightmare, however, does not effect her popularity, yet she becomes even more famous for being the bad girl. And rumor has it that nobody has heard of or seen the villain who leaked the truth about her.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_24_NAME.text: Yuna, the Rookie of the Year

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_4_SAHAD_DESC.text: A fisherman from the Greek area. A dynamic and free-spirited man of middle age and great physique, Sahad is well-liked for his lively disposition and amiable personality.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_5_SAHAD_DESC.text: On Sahad's return voyage home, the Lombardia is attacked by a mysterious monster of the sea, stranding the passengers on the Isle of Seiren. It is while being chased by a 'Variant Beast' that Sahad meets Adol and company, and after receving their help to drive the Beast away, Sahad decides to joins them.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_6_SAHAD_DESC.text: Sahad, with his great store of knowledge and experience of the sea, helps the Castaway Village by giving survival advice and fishing lessons. While exploring the northern shore of the island, he comes to meet Dana - the girl of Adol's dreams. Joining the company to help recover Dana's memories, Sahad too is transported by the power of the Energy Crystal to Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_RICOTTA_4_DESC.text: A girl of the wilderness who had been living on the Isle of Seiren long before the passengers of the Lombardia washed ashore. Due to her long life in the wild, she possesses the ability to talk to animals. Innocent yet always hungering after knowledge, Ricotta uses books drifted ashore to study about the outside world.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_RICOTTA_5_DESC.text: Ricotta meets and helps Adol and company in their battle against the 'Variant Beast.' Giving them clues on how to defeat the 'Ancient Species,' she then joins the group to find 'Father,' who has not returned after leaving for the mountain one month ago.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_RICOTTA_6_DESC.text: After finally reuniting with 'Father' on the northern side of the island, Ricotta decides to help out Adol and the people of Castaway Village. On their mission to help Dana recover her memories, a mysterious power flows out of the Energy Crystal to teleport them all to the dimension of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PR_1_11_DESC.text: A beekeeper who collects honey from the forest to sell at the market. It's rather unclear whether his bee costume really does drive away monsters, but recently some people have been talking of a "beeman monster" that they saw in the forest.

TEXT_CHA_PR_2_15_DESC.text: A priest who tragically fell in love with an agent of the Shadow Roses and attempted to elope, but was captured before they could succeed. Afterwards, he became the subject of a mysterious experiment - but even while succumbing to the darkness, he still thinks of her.

TEXT_CHA_PR_3_17_DESC.text: A former priest of the Order of the Goddess who has been conducting research in the Palace under the Cardinal's orders. While he has a brilliant mind, he is opportunistic and tends to be rather lazy most of the time. Needless to say, he receives many looks of reproach in the laboratory.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_22_DESC.text: An exchange student from Chen who has recently arrived at Neth Empire Private Academy. An exceptionally gifted student, Cronette is the target of both admiration and jealousy of her peers. Yet there are rumors that she is no ordinary goody two-shoes…

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_23_DESC.text: Vernil may not think much of Heim's story about the treasure allegedly buried in the Sacred Ground of Nosgard, but her affections for the mercenary drives her to accompany him on his quest.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_24_DESC.text: Growing up, Ricky never chased luck. Luck chased Ricky. This led him to mass fortune. However, the money never could fill the void inside him. After hearing about Super Fighting Cards Competition being held in Chen, something draws him into listing himself up for the challenge. Perhaps this is what he needed to fill the void.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_22_DESC.text: The rumors are only too true: student by day and hacker by night, Cronette is in fact a renowned underground hacker, infamous for her perfectedly honed skills and indomitable curiosity. Chance leads the genius hacker one day to a highly protected piece of data placed under a complicated security system. Curiosity piqued, Cronette decides to break into the system.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_23_DESC.text: Vernil helps Heim fight the Guardian of the Sacred Ground to victory, but soon realizes that the sanctuary is guarding something far greater than any treasure. Before they can escape, however, the pair falls under the curse of the Sacred Ground, doomed to slumber forever as the new Guardians.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_24_DESC.text: Thanks to his luck, Ricky easily takes victories against many talented card players and finally faces the champion, Spade Queen. However, his luck runs dry against her and he finds himself completely defeated for the first time by someone of tireless practice and self-discipline. On his way back home, Ricky is more motivated than ever and determines to work hard to be able to challenge the reigning champion once again.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_22_DESC.text: Cronette succeeds in deactivating the data's security system. To her disappointment, however, she discovers nothing save for several boring files concerning members of an unknown organization. The enraged hacker maliciously begins to overwrite the contents of the first file that catches her eye: that of a person named 'Zahard.' Vaguely satisfied, Cronette exits the database - unaware of the consequences her actions will bring about.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_23_DESC.text: Hundreds of years pass by in cold silence - until one fateful day when Vernil, sensing a disturbance in the sanctuary, awakens from her long sleep. She immediately starts off to find her beloved Heim, but falls back unconscious when something - or someone - attacks her from the behind...

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_24_DESC.text: After tireless practice, Ricky is back in the competition, more prepared than ever. This time, the final match is a tight game and the audience is captivated by the skills of the two great players. Ricky makes an aggressive move towards the end, but fails to see the queen's next, which delivers the victory to her once again. Nonetheless, Ricky leaves the game feeling like a different man, as if he has finally found that one missing piece to his soul.

TEXT_CHA_WA_1_11_DESC.text: A member of the Adventurer's Guild. She and her husband had been traveling around the continent when he went missing in the forest. Further travels have been postponed until she finds her no good of a husband, hrrmph.

TEXT_CHA_WA_2_15_DESC.text: An agent of the Order of the Shadow Rose. After falling in love with a priest who treated her wounds, she confessed the secret of her Order and attempted to elope together. Unfortunately, they were captured before they could succeed, and were forced to undergo several... mysterious experiments.

TEXT_CHA_WA_3_17_DESC.text: A Ratman enthusiast who ventured into the underground sewers. No news was heard of her until one day, when rumors spread of a strange figure in the shadows attacking people.

TEXT_CHA_WA_4_22_DESC.text: A warrior of legendary lineage and exceptional swordsmanship, Izuna is regarded by both herself and others as the obvious heir to the current Master of the clan. When, to everyone's surprise, the Master declares a commoner as his successor, Izuna protests in outrage and asks him about his decision. The Master only answers that she is simply "not meant to lead," to which the young warrior storms out in indignation.

TEXT_CHA_WA_4_24_DESC.text: Enviously called the witch of her era in old Pumpkin City, Cassia and her abilities of learning a spell on sight win the envy of every witch and wizard in town. After learning every spell discovered by the witches of Pumpkin City, the young Cassia wanders the city in search for new knowledge that will satiate her hungry mind. She comes to discover a sealed chamber deep within the labyrinthine alleyways of Pumpkin City.

TEXT_CHA_WA_5_22_DESC.text: Izuna does not return to the dojo, instead swearing to herself that she will master her swordsmanship and show the Master her worth. Having departed quite hastily, however, she soon finds herself run out of money and a place to stay. Izuna decides to hunt down wanted criminals for a living, telling herself that such arrangements are temporary.

TEXT_CHA_WA_5_24_DESC.text: Cassia easily breaks the seal and enters the chamber. She discovers a sole antique sword in the middle of the room, and when she picks it up, the blade starts to tell her of curses, dark hoaxes, powerful magic: the dark magic forbidden to all witches of Pumpkin City. Cassia vaguely tells herself that the sword is a thing of evil and that she must escape at once, but the whispers of the blade prove too seductive. Years afterward, a series of rumors spread throughout Pumpkin City of witches being abducted one by one, and a dark figure gazing from the shadows. The Four Great Witches of Pumpkin City, perceiving the truth behind the rumors, investigate into the matter, and discover that Cassia is the culprit.

TEXT_CHA_WA_6_22_DESC.text: With every fugitive she turns in, Izuna finds herself not only richer - but also more famous and experienced for her accomplishments. Even when she attempts to return home a newly made celebrity, she finds herself overrun with requests to capture the next criminal or monster. Izuna finally admits that the life of a free and famous bounty hunter may be her true calling, and, instead of the road back home, starts on a journey to hunt down her fortune.

TEXT_CHA_WA_6_24_DESC.text: It is revealed that Cassia, consumed by her desire to use the magic she had learned, had obeyed the sword's whispered commands to sacrifice human beings for magical experiments. Cassia flees from Pumpkin City under the attack of the Four Great Witches, and the evil blade is broken in the process. Only Cassia knew, therefore, that Plaga - the malevolent spirit of the blade - had already consumed and were inhabiting her soul. Cassia and Plaga, now one and whole, start their long journey to find a stronger vessel and finally destroy the Four Great Witches once and for all.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_SPR_4_TWILLY_DESC.text: Ana Heinkel had been right all along. Had the House of Tasitte not retained Twillie's blade, everything would have gone as planned. Twillie was the one factor that the pride of Heinkel had overlooked - the one factor that had led to failure.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_SPR_5_TWILLY_DESC.text: For every battle Twillie led her soldiers at the vanguard, never failing a single mission. Her illustrious greatsword, bearing the honor of the House of Tasitte, struck fear again and again into the hearts of her enemies, never losing its dignity even in the dust of the battlefields.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_SPR_6_TWILLY_DESC.text: It was to be the last battle. The plains over which each army would take its last stand was cool for the season, but the sunlight shone as in peaceful spring. Only the wind whispered in fear, and great silence rumbled through the earth. The moment everything came to a standstill, the plains erupted with the shouts of war - and amidst them, the two women who would decide the tide of fate turned to face each other.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_YS8_4_ADOL_DESC.text: A red-haired adventurer and swordsman of exceptional skill. From his childhood, Adol grew up listening to great stories of legends and myths in faraway lands. Throughout his life, he comes to embark on countless adventures of his own, leaving behind more than a hundred adventure logs and journals.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_YS8_4_DANA_DESC.text: The girl who continuously appears in Adol's dreams. Dana is originally from the ancient Kingdom of Eternia, a long extinct civilization whose capital, Aegias, had stood in the northern regions of the Isle of Seiren. After much training, Dana had become the 'Maiden of the Great Tree' to reign over the kingdom together with the king, leading their people to golden prosperity. However, after having a vision of the end of the world, Dana decides to fight against that destiny and seals herself into a long slumber.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_YS8_4_LAXIA_DESC.text: The proud daughter of the Roswell family, a noble house of Garman. Her noble upbringing however, does not always keep her temper from boiling to the surface.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_YS8_5_ADOL_DESC.text: Adol embarks the passenger ship 'Lombardia' as a sailor. After the liner sinks due to a sudden attack of a mysterious sea creature, Adol wakes up on white sandy shores - realizing that he has been washed ashore on the Isle of Seiren, the "island forever cursed."

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_YS8_5_DANA_DESC.text: In her dreams, Dana comes to meet a red-haired man, sharing his mind and helping him in his adventures. After a long time, the red-haired man and his company finally meet Dana, sealed at the base of the Great Tree.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_YS8_5_LAXIA_DESC.text: After the passenger ship Lombardia sinks to the attack of a mysterious sea creature, Laxia finds herself on the unchartered Isle of Seiren. She is the first to meet Adol, another castaway, and join him to explore the island.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_YS8_6_ADOL_DESC.text: Together with his companions, Adol builds Castaway Village and rescues survivors of the shipwreck to find a way to escape the Isle of Seiren. During his endeavors, he comes to meet Dana, the blue-haired girl of his dreams, and decides to help her recover her memories. While studying the ruins of Ancient Aegias for this purpose, Adol accidentally touches a mysterious Energy Crystal - from which a mysterious power flows out to teleport them to the dimension of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_YS8_6_DANA_DESC.text: The awakened Dana shares a mental connection with Adol and has no recollection of her memories save for the ones she has made in Castaway Village. In order to recover her memories, she joins the company to explore the ruins of Aegias. When they discover a great hole in the ruins of the palace, Dana suddenly feels excruciating pain in her head. At the same time, a Energy Crystal nearby resonates to create a disruption in time and space - teleporting the company to the dimension of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_YS8_6_LAXIA_DESC.text: Laxia initially struggles to get along with the survivors at Castaway Village, unused to interacting with people of such various classes and careers. However, after enduring many hardships together, she comes to accept them as companions and opens up as a human being. After meeting Dana, she agrees to help her recover her memories and goes to explore the northern side of the Isle of Seiren - when a mysterious power from the Energy Crystal teleports them to Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_WI_1_11_DESC.text: A magician who dared to openly criticize the Cardinal and had to flee from continued attempts at his life. He now lives alone in the sewers, hiding from the world, ready to attack anyone whom he deems an intruder.

TEXT_CHA_WI_2_15_DESC.text: A noble lady of a renowned family in Trista. Despite her formidable status, she is rather innocent, and dreams of learning love spells to capture the heart of the true love of her life.

TEXT_CHA_WI_3_17_DESC.text: A magician who has been conducting research under the Cardinal's orders. Earnest, diligent, and fastidious, she's a great favorite of her bosses, but is rather disliked by her colleagues.

TEXT_CHA_WI_4_22_DESC.text: A trickster who enjoys clever disguises and troublesome deceptions. One day, Loki comes across a tribal village in the snowy plains of Nosgard. Seeing the villagers' happy lives irritates Loki, who desires to see "something fun" - and so the clown begins to devise the cleverest trick he has ever carried out.

TEXT_CHA_WI_4_24_DESC.text: The chief of the Tribe of Winter Wind, a people that lived in ancient Nosgard. The Winter Wind Tribe may not be the strongest clan in the history of Hasla, but the wise prophecies of their Great Oracle, Lakias's benevolent yet firm leadership, and the unified strength of the tribespeople themselves allow them victory over the harsh winters of Nosgard. The winter wind, the namesake of their tribe, is what brings these people together, and keeps them warm.

TEXT_CHA_WI_5_22_DESC.text: With his forked tongue and smooth voice, Loki attempts to divide the Nosgard tribe against one another. However, the wise Tribal Chief guides the villagers against Loki's trickery, bringing them together even closer than before. The trickster is left to seethe over his failure.

TEXT_CHA_WI_5_24_DESC.text: Yet one day, a strange rumor circulates within the tribe, sowing in the people's hearts the seeds of mistrust. Only through Lakias's persuasive words do they remain united; they are brought even closer together, in fact, as if to repent their former doubts. The very next day, however, the Great Oracle makes a new prophecy.

TEXT_CHA_WI_6_22_DESC.text: As a final resort, Loki disguises himself as a renowned sorcerer. He then tells the Tribal Chief a false prophecy, persuading him to retreat into the heart of a glacier and pray for one hundred days in order to avoid the wrath of the heavens. With the Tribal Chief out of the way, Loki easily plants seeds of suspicion and hatred into the heart of the tribal village. War breaks out, and the tribe comes to destroy itself. Yet in the midst of its ruins, Loki, gleeful with his masterpiece of mayhem and destruction, only laughs and goes to seek his next victims.

TEXT_CHA_WI_6_24_DESC.text: The prophecy of the Great Oracle is an ominous one, portending great tragedy: if the Chief of the Tribe does not offer prayer to the gods for one hundred full days, the whole Tribe of the Winter Wind shall be cursed with the greatest plague that they have known. As the Great Oracle is never wrong, Lakias travels to the Sanctuary of Nosgard to start her prayers. At the moment she utters the first verse, however, a great avalanche traps her within its icy glaciers and puts her under enchanted sleep. Hundreds of years later, on a fateful spring day, Lakias finally awakens from her slumber.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SPR_4_ANNA_DESC.text: The ruler of Gotruvin, a small but proud marcher state. Ana leads her troops to the War of the Spring Garden, seeking to justify the Marquis of Hiosbruke's right of succession.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SPR_5_ANNA_DESC.text: It is in the midst of the petals of a great tulip field that the War of the Spring Garden comes to a clash: Ana, with her soldiers, is unfaltering in facing the generals of the House of Tasitte. In order to compensate the great difference in their number of troops, Ana uses her powers of telekinesis to single-handedly shoot many muskets at once. She marches forward to the center of the field, uncompromising and unafraid, the power of a single woman surmounting that of a single army.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SPR_6_ANNA_DESC.text: Yet Ana's victory is stolen away from her as Twillie of Tasitte, wielding her illustrious greatsword, stops her path. It is on the day of the last cold spell that Ana, the golden iris heraldry on her chest gleaming in the chilly sunlight, and Twillie, her eternal adversary, meet once more in the great tulip field. Yet with the raising of each of their weapons a sudden blizzard engulfs the two figures - leaving behind only the spring breeze in their trace.

TEXT_CHOICE_COSTUME_EVENT_WARGAME_DESC.text: The Great Pumpkin War Event Reward

TEXT_CHOICE_COSTUME_TERESA_CHRISTMAS_DES.text: You can select 1 Teresa's Winter Costume out of a collection of 11.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_CAKE_01_DESC.text: Delicious cake sitting on a wooden cake stand.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_CHAIR_01_DESC.text: A red chair with a comfy cushion and a high backrest, great for long bouts of sitting.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_DRAWER_01_DESC.text: A dresser equipped with a spacious surface and extra drawers underneath for efficient storage.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_FIREPLACE_01_DESC.text: A fireplace made of red brick with Christmas decorations. A must-have for the holiday season.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_JAM_01_DESC.text: A small jar of organic honey.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_OWL_01_DESC.text: A snowy owl perched on a branch. It's more expressive than it looks.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_PRESENT_01_DESC.text: A big pile of presents: the dream of every child for Christmas.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_SLED_01_DESC.text: A sled-shaped chair that seems more fit for Santa Claus than anyone else.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_SNOWGLOBE_01_DESC.text: A large snowglobe depicting a snowy winter village.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_SNOWMAN_01_DESC.text: A snowman adorned with a top hat and a scarf. It has been magically enchanted not to melt.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_SNOWMAN_02_DESC.text: A snowman adorned with a fedora and twin revolvers. It has been magically enchanted not to melt.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_TERRACE_01_DESC.text: A doorway leading to a scenic view of a snowy winter day

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_TERRACE_02_DESC.text: A doorway leading to a scenic view of a snowy winter night

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_TREE_01_DESC.text: A seasonal tree great for any room with a festive spirit.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_TREE_02_DESC.text: A seasonal tree great for any room with a festive spirit.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_BOTTOM_TREE_03_DESC.text: A seasonal tree great for any room with a festive spirit.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_CENTER_HANGINGTREE_01_DES.text: A wreath for the holiday season, topped with a lovely reason.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_CENTER_HORN_01_DESC.text: Fake antlers to hang on your wall. No animals were harmed in the making of this ornament.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_CENTER_SOCK_01_DESC.text: Who knows - if you hang it on the mantle, someone may leave behind presents!

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_CENTER_WINDOW_01_DESC.text: A snowy winter day can be seen outside this window.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_CENTER_WINDOW_02_DESC.text: A snowy winter night can be seen outside this window.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_TOP_BULB_01_DESC.text: A string of colorful lightbulbs that can be installed anywhere in the season.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_TOP_BULB_02_DESC.text: A string of colorful lightbulbs that can be installed anywhere in the season.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_TOP_BULB_03_DESC.text: A string of colorful lightbulbs that can be installed anywhere in the season.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_TOP_BULB_04_DESC.text: A string of colorful lightbulbs that can be installed anywhere in the season.

TEXT_CHRISTMAS_TOP_BULB_05_DESC.text: A string of colorful lightbulbs that can be installed anywhere in the season.

Only a Hero of grade 3 or higher
can possess a special skill.
