TEXT_CLT_WEAPON_CAT_NORMAL_DESC.text: Normal Weapons may be used by all heroes of its class. Also, you cannot forge them into Soulbound Weapons or change their options.

TEXT_COLLECTION_CAT_DHERO_DESC.text:
Legendary heroes grow steadily from 1 Star to 6 Stars.
Legendary heroes' average stats are 15% higher than that of Normal and Master heroes of the same rank.

TEXT_COLLECTION_CAT_HERO_DESC.text:
Normal Heroes become a random Master Hero 
upon reaching 4-Stars, after which their growth is fixed.

TEXT_COMMON_ACCURACY_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Accuracy of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_ATK_POWER_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Attack Power of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_BOUILLABAISSE_STONE_1_DESC.text: A stone that possesses mana, used by Bouillabaisse to control additional weapons.

TEXT_COMMON_BOUILLABAISSE_STONE_2_DESC.text: A pendant engraved with the picture of a poor family of fishermen drawing their nets.

TEXT_COMMON_CRIT_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_CRIT_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Chance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Evasion of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_DOMPERIGNON_STONE_1_DESC.text: A darkly tarnished emblem of the Order of the Goddess.

TEXT_COMMON_DOMPERIGNON_STONE_2_DESC.text: A broken recordstone. It seems to have belonged to the monk Dom Perignon.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINCHIEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: A strange stone that the Goblin Chief always held near his heart. It is said to bestow power to its beholder, and has been passed down generations of Goblin captains.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINCHIEF_STONE_2_DESC.text: A statue made of an undefined mineral, seemingly resembling a Goblin warrior. It once belonged to the Goblin Chief.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINCHIEF_STONE_3_DESC.text: A finely polished stone that belonged to the Goblin Chief. Unidentified runes flicker on its surface.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINMASTER_STONE_1_DESC.text: A medal that belonged to Crouching Ox. Similar medals were found from the bodies of several amateur Goblin Champions.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINMASTER_STONE_2_DESC.text: A piece of cloth that had been bound to the grip of Crouching Ox's blade. On it are written several words in the Goblin language, probably the names of people or places.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINMASTER_STONE_3_DESC.text: A pocketful of pebbles that Crouching Ox had been carrying. It holds quite a few colorful pebbles, stained by children's hands.

TEXT_COMMON_KINGTIGER_STONE_1_DESC.text: A badge belonging to the captain of the Catapult Goblins. On its back are drawn, in a crude, childish hand, what seems to be a young Goblin and hearts.

TEXT_COMMON_KINGTIGER_STONE_2_DESC.text: An engine part of a driving system revamped by the Goblins. Words in the human Common Language are written on it: "Property of the Heaven's Cavalry. Anyone seen possessing it will receive immediate punishment."

TEXT_COMMON_KINGTIGER_STONE_3_DESC.text: An insignia etched with crude drawings: eleven shield symbols, five hammer symbols, 33 sword symbols, and one tiger symbol.

TEXT_COMMON_MATAHARI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A crimson jewel that is also the symbol of the greatest dancer in Trista. It seems to burn from its own ashes.

TEXT_COMMON_MATAHARI_STONE_2_DESC.text: A jewel of a unique hue and texture, protected by government officials within the kingdom of Valencia.

TEXT_COMMON_MAX_HP_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Maximum HP of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_PENETRATE_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_PENETRATE_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_RECEIVE_DMG_RATE_STONE_1_DES.text: Increases the Damage Reduction rate of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Golden and still very much alive.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_2_DESC.text: It focuses light to a single brilliant point, powerful enough to melt even stone.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_EP1_HEAL_1_DESC.text:
Heals ally HP by 500 per second
(This effect cannot be stacked.)

TEXT_COMMON_SET_EP1_HEAL_2_DESC.text:
entire team's Armor and Resistance +100
(This effect cannot be stacked.)

TEXT_COMMON_SET_HEAL_STONE_1_DESC.text: A bolt retrieved from Djer's body, weathered by time.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_HEAL_STONE_2_DESC.text: The yellow beak of an eagle. It is customarily used as a talisman among the people of the desert.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAGIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: Jackal's claw. Be careful - it's very sharp.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAGIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: A bullet shot by Djer. Be careful - it may explode if you're not careful.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: This rock-solid molar crushes even - well, rock.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: Narmer's broken claw. It seems to be made out of an unknown material.

TEXT_COMMON_WINDWALKER_STONE_1_DESC.text: The relic of a goblin tribe of the ancient desert, long extinct. On the base of a crimson rock found commonly in the desert, there seem to be engraved the remains of a sharp thorn, the tooth of a hound, etchings resembling a 'V,' and a dragon scale.

TEXT_COMMON_WINDWALKER_STONE_2_DESC.text: An arrowhead sharpened by lost spells. It induces sulfur poisoning - the same that is often contracted around the Oasis.

TEXT_COMMON_WINDWALKER_STONE_3_DESC.text: The root of a tree engraved with mythical symbols…and also the scribblings of what seems to be a very young Goblin, resembling macarons and donuts.

TEXT_CONFIRM_SELL_ADVENTURER_HERO_DESC_I.text: When a Normal hero is promoted, the hero becomes a random hero of the next rank. Class does not change.

TEXT_CONFIRM_SELL_DESTINY_HERO_INFO.text:
Legendary heroes grow steadily from 1 Star to 6 Stars.
Legendary heroes' average stats are 15% higher than that of Normal and Master heroes of the same rank.

TEXT_CONFIRM_SELL_HERO_LEGEND.text:
Legendary Heroes grow steadily and have 15% higher stats than
normal heroes.

Really retire the hero?

TEXT_CONFIRM_SELL_IN_GACHA_HERO_INFO.text: Contract only heroes are 4 Star heroes, acquirable only from Premium contracts

TEXT_CONFIRM_SELL_LAGENDARY_HERO_INFO.text: When a normal hero is promoted to 4 Stars, the hero becomes a master hero that will stay the same when promoted through 6 Stars.

TEXT_COSTUME_INVEN_LACK_DESC.text:
Cannot purchase more Skins as the max no. of Skins has been reached.
Go to Skin Management?

TEXT_COS_EVENT_HU_17_FLOWER.text: Scarlet of Pride in Full Bloom

TEXT_DECO_GOLDEN_CARRIAGE_01_DESC.text: A carriage symbolizing good luck. There is not a single soul in Hasla whose spirits aren't raised by the sight of this carriage.

TEXT_DECO_LIMIT_BURNINGTREE_01_DESC.text: A tree that grows around the Primal Volcano. Bella insists that it is fully alive, but many heroes expressed their doubts upon seeing the tree. Limited Event Quest reward for April 2018.

TEXT_DECO_LIMIT_CACTUS_01_DESC.text: A cactus plant with a beautifully bloomed flower. Limited Event Quest reward for April 2018.

TEXT_DECO_LIMIT_CHERRYTREE_01_DESC.text: A cherry tree blossoming in eternal spring. Its petals gently fall with the wind. Limited Event Quest reward for April 2018.

TEXT_DECO_LIMIT_FOOTBALL_01_DESC.text: Did you know that soccer balls are made of 12 black pentagon patches and 20 white hexagon patches? Limited Quest reward for July 2018.

TEXT_DECO_LIMIT_SOCCERBENCH_01_DESC.text: A bench for managers, coaches, and players - well, on the bench. Limited Quest reward for July 2018.

TEXT_DECO_LIMIT_SOCCERTROPHY_01_DESC.text: A golden trophy given to the victorious team. It symbolizes 'victory' (obviously). Limited Quest reward for July 2018.

TEXT_DECO_LIMIT_WATERPLANT_01_DESC.text: A fish bowl holding a piece of the sea. Limited Event Quest reward for April 2018.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_BASKETBALLBOX_01.text: For all your basketball storing needs.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_BASKETBALLNET_01.text: A very durable basketball hoop perfect for shooting hoops and playing games. Just dunk it.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_BOOKSHELF_01_DES.text: A bookshelf holding various books and other reading material.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_CHEERSTAGE_01_DE.text: A stage where cheerleaders perform. Go team!

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_CLEANING_01_DESC.text: Used for cleaning the floor. Make sure to take the bucket to rinse the mop.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_DESK_CHAIR_01_DE.text: The basic model for students' academic needs.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_DESK_CHAIR_02_DE.text: The basic model for students' academic needs.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_DESK_CHAIR_03_DE.text: The basic model for students' academic needs.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_DOOR_01_DESC.text: A door that opens by sliding to the side. You can think of a thousand pranks to be played using this.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_FILESHELF_01_DES.text: A bookshelf holding various files and binders.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_LECTURE_DESK_01_.text: Used for placing lecture notes and other teaching material in class. Someone has decorated it with a tiny vase.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_LOCKER_01_DESC.text: Store everything you want. Combination lock sold separately.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_POT_01_DESC.text: It seems extremely well cared for. Someone must be very affectionate of it.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_STAND_01_DESC.text: Watch your favorite games from these bleachers.

TEXT_DECO_SCHOOL_BOTTOM_STAND_02_DESC.text: Watch your favorite games from these bleachers.

TEXT_DEEMO_MAXLEVEL_REWARD_HELP.text: A chest rewarded for extra tree growth.

TEXT_DG_OLYMPICS_DESC.text: Stop the snowfall in Pumpkin City with the roaring fire of the Olympic Flame!

TEXT_DG_OLYMPICS_START.text: Breaking News! Teaming up with Champion Lia will speed you up to the finish line!

TEXT_DG_RUN_DESC.text: Race against Remi, the witch of Pumpkin City, at the Pumpkin Carnival!

TEXT_DUNGEON_ACCEL_SPEED_DESC.text: Drink the Potion of Time to reach superhuman speed and fight against the witches and golems of Pumpkin City!

TEXT_DUNGEON_AF_DESC.text: Defeat the Divine Beast and collect eggs!

TEXT_DUNGEON_BREAD_DESC.text: Earn bread from the Bread Storage to train your heroes!

TEXT_DUNGEON_CRITICAL_DESC.text: A certain scientist has succeeded in creating androids modeled from the great heroes of Hasla. Test your strength against the nuts-and-bolts version of your favorite heroes!

TEXT_DUNGEON_ERROR_KEY_DESC.text:
Not enough Keys to enter!
 
One Key is charged every 20 min. 
 
Or you can buy them from Travelling Merchant Popo!

TEXT_DUNGEON_EVENT_BREAD_DESC.text: What could possibly be found in the depths of the Rabbit Hole?

TEXT_DUNGEON_EVENT_WORLDCUP_DESC.text: Protect the Hasla League from the evil Ball Kickers, who seeks victory through treacherous means!

TEXT_DUNGEON_GOLD_DESC.text: There are rumors of great riches hidden by goblins in these dungeons.

TEXT_DUNGEON_HONOR_DESC.text: Defeat the enemy in the Ancient Training Grounds to earn honor.

TEXT_DUNGEON_KEY_DESC.text: All Keys are refilled again daily at midnight.

TEXT_DUNGEON_KOF_FIGHT_DESC.text: Challenge formidable champions in the world tournament to distinguish the true king of fighters.

TEXT_DUNGEON_RAID_DRAGON_DESC.text: Magnax's bloodcurdling roar echoes through the mountains. Prevent the Apostle from bringing down the end of the world.

TEXT_DUNGEON_RAID_GOLEM_DESC.text: The earth quivers with each step of the Black Golem of the Forest. Stop it before it destroys the village and its people.

TEXT_DUNGEON_RAID_GUARDIANOFRUINS_DESC.text: Lorelei has finally discovered the Temple of Illusions, hidden deep within the desert. Uncover the secret of the Ancient Guardian protecting the Temple.

TEXT_DUNGEON_RAID_KRAKEN_DESC.text: Send the Apostle Kranus, the menace of the sea, back into the deep from whence it came.

TEXT_DUNGEON_RAID_MANACAR_DESC.text: The Apostle sealed within the Tower of Manacar has finally revealed itself. Join forces with the heroes of Roman to defeat the Ruler of Mana.

TEXT_DUNGEON_RAID_SANDWORM_DESC.text: Defeat the Apostle Fenriruth before its sickly stench of poison suffocates the world.

TEXT_DUNGEON_RWBY_RUN_DESC.text: Join forces with the Huntresses of Remnant to arrest the interdimensional criminal Roman.

TEXT_DUNGEON_SCHEDULE_WEEK_INFO_MOVING_D.text: All dungeons open every day at {0}. Only dungeons that open regularly are listed in this schedule.

TEXT_DUNGEON_STORY_FURY_DESC.text: The Road of Fury has appeared in the Tower of Manacar…

TEXT_DUNGEON_STORY_RUIN_DESC.text: The Road to Ruin has appeared in the Tower of Manacar…

TEXT_DUNGEON_STORY_VOID_DESC.text: The Road to the Void has appeared in the Tower of Manacar…

TEXT_DUNGEON_TOPDEALER_1_DESC.text: Participate in the contest held by Fergus, the beloved town blacksmith!

TEXT_DUNGEON_TRIAL_PAAR_DESC.text: Heavy hammers and swift arrows bow down under the gravity of this dungeon.

TEXT_DUNGEON_TRIAL_SWHU_DESC.text: Blades and guns are of no use here.

TEXT_DUNGEON_TRIAL_WIPR_DESC.text: Other weapons must be wielded in this dungeon, the walls of which no magic can penetrate.

TEXT_DUNGEON_UNSEAL_DESC.text:
When a dungeon is unsealed, it can be entered for
1 hour. Unseal the dungeon? (Use 1 key.)

TEXT_DUNGEON_WEAPON_ARCHER_DESC.text: Treasures await at the end of the Ordeal of the Bow.

TEXT_DUNGEON_WEAPON_HUNTER_DESC.text: Treasures await at the end of the Ordeal of the Gun.

TEXT_DUNGEON_WEAPON_PALADIN_DESC.text: Treasures await at the end of the Ordeal of the Hammer.

TEXT_DUNGEON_WEAPON_PRIEST_DESC.text: Treasures await at the end of the Ordeal of the Orb.

TEXT_DUNGEON_WEAPON_WARRIOR_DESC.text: Treasures await at the end of the Ordeal of the Sword.

TEXT_DUNGEON_WEAPON_WIZARD_DESC.text: Treasures await at the end of the Ordeal of the Staff.

TEXT_DUNGEON_XMAS_DESC.text: Sweet friends have come a-caroling for the holiday season.

TEXT_DUNGEON_XMAS_HARD_DESC.text: Scary friends have come a-caroling for the holiday season.

TEXT_EPIC_3G_STONE_1_DESC.text: Flintstones that Grease carried around everywhere with him. A fine product of the Eastern Kingdoms, they are decorated with a drawing of a white axe.

TEXT_EPIC_ACCURACY_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Accuracy of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_ANCIENREGIME_STONE_1_DESC.text: A fragment of evil found floating in the depths of Trista.

TEXT_EPIC_ANCIENREGIME_STONE_2_DESC.text: An exotic ore that illuminates a path to the secret of the world.

TEXT_EPIC_ANCIENREGIME_STONE_3_DESC.text: A possessed item that bestows power to its beholder, whoever it may be…

TEXT_EPIC_ATK_POWER_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Attack Power of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_AVENIR_STONE_1_DESC.text: The manastone Avenir uses to control her flow of mana.

TEXT_EPIC_AVENIR_STONE_2_DESC.text: A crudely wrought ring. It seems to be a gift from someone.

TEXT_EPIC_AVENIR_STONE_3_DESC.text: The source of the Artificial God's powers.

TEXT_EPIC_AZATHOTH_STONE_1_DESC.text: A fragment darker than the darkest of nights. It's shaped like a grain of rice.

TEXT_EPIC_AZATHOTH_STONE_2_DESC.text: A gently pulsating fragment shaped like a human heart.

TEXT_EPIC_AZATHOTH_STONE_3_DESC.text: A stone with faintly engraved letters, of which only the following are legible: "Ma…j…s"

TEXT_EPIC_CRIT_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_CRIT_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Chance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Evasion of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_GG_STONE_1_DESC.text: A necklace that provides some protection from contamination. The right side of its triangular shape is folded towards the center.

TEXT_EPIC_LEESIN_STONE_1_DESC.text: A broken blade belonging to Ratoichi. You can feel steely determination resonating from it.

TEXT_EPIC_MAX_HP_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Maximum HP of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_PENETRATE_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_PENETRATE_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_REBOUILLABAISSE_STONE_1_DESC.text: The identification tag of a soldier of the Heaven's Cavalry. There is an indecipherable code written on it.

TEXT_EPIC_REBOUILLABAISSE_STONE_2_DESC.text: The identification tag of a sergeant of the Heaven's Cavalry. The lieutenants and other upper rank officers seem to have been purged from the order.

TEXT_EPIC_REBOUILLABAISSE_STONE_3_DESC.text: An unidentifiable manastone used by Bouillabaisse to control his additional weapons.

TEXT_EPIC_RECEIVE_DMG_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Damage Reduction rate of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_REDOMPERIGNON_STONE_1_DESC.text: A shard of teardrop that fell on Dom Perignon's cheeks. If you hold it in your hand, an image is played of a Shadowdemon demolishing the slums and its people.

TEXT_EPIC_REDOMPERIGNON_STONE_2_DESC.text: It seems to be a token of gratitude from the citizens: "To Dom Perignon, friend of the poor and ill."

TEXT_EPIC_REDOMPERIGNON_STONE_3_DESC.text: Used to make beer and other alcohol. It still smells sweet.

TEXT_EPIC_RESIDUALLION_STONE_1_DESC.text: The insignia of a knight who made his way into legends. On it are written the words, "Meister des langen Schwertes: Master of the Longsword."

TEXT_EPIC_RESIDUALLION_STONE_1_TITLE.text: Badge of the Order of the Lion Maistre

TEXT_EPIC_RESIDUALLION_STONE_2_DESC.text: Only the immortal words of faith to the Order of the Goddess gleam within this empty armor of a long dead knight.

TEXT_EPIC_RESIDUALLION_STONE_3_DESC.text: A jewel inlaid in the pommel of the longsword. It has lost its original radiance and is now covered in a black, viscous liquid.

TEXT_EPIC_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_RUDERAT_STONE_1_DESC.text: One of Rudrat's bounties he plundered from the human world when he worked in a band of thieves. Its original form is unclear.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_1_DESC.text: "No physical blow could break through Narmer's surface." - 'Set'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_2_DESC.text: "Her brilliant necklace seemed to dazzle not only one's eyes, but also one's mind and heart..." - 'Isis'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_EP1_HEAL_1_DESC.text:
Heals ally HP by 2000 per second
(This effect cannot be stacked.)

TEXT_EPIC_SET_EP1_HEAL_2_DESC.text:
Entire team's Armor and Resistance +300
(This effect cannot be stacked.)

TEXT_EPIC_SET_HEAL_STONE_1_DESC.text: "It was only in the reflection of Banoub's blank eyes that we could detect any trace of emotion - that of our own, of fear and despair." - 'Isis'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_HEAL_STONE_2_DESC.text: "We had barely defeated Djer when we came to a stark realization: that we had not, in fact, defeated it." - 'Osiris'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAGIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: "And the light from Djer's thorn pierced the earth, cleansing it completely." - 'Lorelei'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAGIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: "Khasekhemwy's rage was pure terror, torn from the very realm of nightmares." - 'Set'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: "From Narmer's livid tail rained down the storm of despair." - 'Osiris'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: "A pure, primitive power it was, Khasekhemwy's fist: an intense and fatal force that could not be resisted." - 'Osiris'

TEXT_ERROR_ACCEPTABLE_QUEST_NOTICE_DESC.text: You cannot accept any more requests.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_4_12.text: Lunar Mark' lasts 5 seconds, and deals damage to all enemies.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_4_15.text: (Upon activating passive) Stuns an enemy and deals 4000 neutral damage, twice every time the enemy is hit by the fan.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_1.text:
(Upon activating passive) Gon summons 'Tiga,' which deals physical damage equal to 1000% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)
After summons, she immediately uses 'Hunt Start!'

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_12.text: Lunar Mark' lasts 5 seconds, and deals damage to all enemies. Its damage can be stacked up to 3 times. When 'Lunar Mark' is renewed, the duration of the mark is reset.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_15.text: (Upon activating passive) Stuns an enemy and deals 4000 neutral damage, twice every time the enemy is hit by the fan. Before activating passive, summons 2 fans that each deals physical damage equal to 500% of the hero's attack power, and a southern wind that deals physical damage equal to 1000% of the hero's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_BO_4_21.text: (Passive enhanced) Set sacrifices only 25% of all heals he receives in summoning the dead.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_BO_5_21.text: (Passive enhanced) Set sacrifices only 25% of all heals he receives in summoning the dead.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_BO_6_21.text:
(Passive enhanced) Set sacrifices only 25% of all heals he receives in summoning the dead.
(Passive added) The 'Land of the Dead' is enhanced to 'Lore of the Bygone.'
'Lore of the Bygone': Set deals physical damage equal to 125% of his attack power every 0.5 seconds to enemies within his range. (Cooltime: 3 seconds) If enemies receive 6 hits by 'Lore of the Bygone,' Set summons 'Royal Hounds' at the enemy's rear to deal physical damage equal to 600% of his attack power 3 times.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_4_21.text: (Block skill enhanced) Upon using a block skill, Athos receives 25% less damage from enemies for 1 second.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_5_21.text: (Block skill enhanced) Upon using a block skill, Athos receives 25% less damage from enemies for 1 second.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_6_21.text:
(Block skill enhanced) Upon using a block skill, Athos receives 35% less damage from enemies for 1 second.
(Passive enhanced) Upon firing his additional shot, Athos stuns the enemy for 0.5 seconds, his accuracy increased to 20% for the attack.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_LIMITED_YS8_HUMMEL_4.text: (Passive enhanced) 'Flash Guard': Damage Reduction +20%, Critical Chance +10%

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_LIMITED_YS8_HUMMEL_6.text:
(Passive enhanced) 'Flash Guard': Damage Reduction +20%, Critical Chance +10%
(Upon using block) Instead of 'Bust Shot,' Hummel activates 'Guilty Raid' to deal physical damage equal to 1500% of his attack power to the enemy at front. This attack is acknowledged as a 3-chain. (Cooltime: 6 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_12.text: (Passive enhanced) 'Mark of the Sun' additionally deals physical damage equal to 100% of Rebecca's armor and resistance, respectively.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_21.text: (Upon activating passive) Schula receives all damage directed at the entire team for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_5_21.text: (Upon activating passive) Schula receives all damage directed at the entire team for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_12.text:
(Passive enhanced) 'Mark of the Sun' additionally deals physical damage equal to 100% of Rebecca's armor and resistance, respectively.
(Passive added) Upon dealing additional damage through the 'Mark of the Sun,' Rebecca swings her mace to deal physical damage equal to 500% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 4 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_21.text:
(Upon activating passive) Schula receives all damage directed at the entire team for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)
(Passive enhanced) The duration of Schula's attack power debuff to the enemy is increased to 10 seconds. Additionally, her attack power buff to the entire team is increased to 25%, and can be stacked 2 times maximum.
(Passive added) If Schula is hit 5 times, she activates 'Rage of the Artisan,' dealing physical power equal to 5000, and canceling all buffs of the enemy. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_5.text:
Kriemhild's attack speed increases by 40%. 'Flamespout' and 'Ultimate Flamespout' both deal 250% more damage.
(Upon Activating Passive) Kriemhild's movement speed increases by 40%, her knockback resistance by 50%, and critical chance by 15% for 5 seconds.
(Passive Added) Upon activating 'Ultimate Flamespout' 2 times, Kriemhild activates 'True Ultimate Flamespout' that deals physical damage equal to 1500% of her attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_LIMITED_GG_6_1.text: (Upon Activating Passive) May receives damage for the entire party for 3 seconds, and spins her arms to deal physical damage equal to 500% of her maximum HP + 500% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_LIMITED_YS8_RICOTTA_4.text:
(Upon activating passive) Damage Reduction +20%, Speed +10%
(Passive Enhanced) Hits needed to activate passive decreased by 1

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_LIMITED_YS8_RICOTTA_6.text:
(Upon activating passive) Damage Reduction +20%, Speed +10%
(Passive Enhanced) Hits needed to activate passive decreased by 2
(Passive Added) If Ricotta activates her passive during 'Flash Move,' her next block skill is changed to 'Dinosaur Throw.'
('Dinosaur Throw') Upon using any block regardless of its chain number, Ricotta throws a bone of the 'Ancient Species' to deal physical damage equal to 2000% of her attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_LIMITED_YS8_SAHAD_4.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Flash Guard': Damage Reduction +20%, Critical Chance +10%

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_LIMITED_YS8_SAHAD_6.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Flash Guard': Damage Reduction +20%, Critical Chance +10%
(Passive Enhanced) 'Seine Toss' generates 40 SP.
(Upon activating 'Seine Toss') Sahad's next block skill is activated as 'Magnus Wave' that deals magical damage equal to 400% of his attack power and magical damage of 5000. Hit enemies receive 50% more damage for 5 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_4_10.text: (Upon activating passive) Increases critical chance by 25%, and duration of 'Focus Mode' by 2 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_6_10.text:
(Upon activating passive) Increases critical chance by 25%, and the duration of 'Focus Mode' by 2 seconds.
(Passive altered) The lightning beams of battle drone 'Tesla' changes to 'Lightning Burst' that deals physical damage equal to 700% of attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_OR_4_20.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Human Spirit: Yin' damage +100%
(Passive Added) All enemies hit by 'Human Spirit: Yin' lose 15 SP. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_OR_4_21.text: (Upon activating passive) The entire party receives 25% less damage.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_OR_5_20.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Human Spirit: Yin' damage +100%
(Passive Added) All enemies hit by 'Human Spirit: Yin' lose 15 SP. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_OR_5_21.text: (Upon activating passive) The entire party receives 25% less damage.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_OR_6_17.text:
(Passive enhanced) Allies under the effect of 'Ocean's Vanity' receive an additional buff that increases attack power by 30% of Seiren's attack power. If Seiren uses her own block during 'Ocean's Vanity,' the shield is upgraded to 'Ocean's Pearl.' When 'Ocean's Pearl' disappears, Seiren recasts 'Ocean's Vanity' over the ally. 
('Ocean's Pearl') 'Ocean's Pearl' increases the affected ally's resistance by 50% of Seiren's resistance.
(Passive added) Seiren casts 'Ocean's Pearl' over the entire party 1 time per 10 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_OR_6_20.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Human Spirit: Yin' damage +200%
(Passive Added) All enemies hit by 'Human Spirit: Yin' lose 30 SP. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_OR_6_21.text:
(Upon activating passive) The entire party receives 25% less damage.
(Passive added) 'Blessing of the Sandman' heals allies by [10/15/30]% of Marpei's attack power 5 times for 5 seconds. Healed allies activate their next 2 blocks as 3-chains. (Cooltime: 10 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_ST_4_21.text: (Passive enhanced) The damage of 'Light of Illusions' shot from Osiris's 'Ancient Magic Circle' is increased to 100%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_ST_5_21.text: (Passive enhanced) The damage of 'Light of Illusions' shot from Osiris's 'Ancient Magic Circle' is increased to 100%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_ST_6_21.text:
(Passive enhanced) The damage of 'Light of Illusions' shot from Osiris's 'Ancient Magic Circle' is increased to 100%.
(Passive altered) For the duration of his 'Ancient Magic Circle,' Osiris casts a different spell according to the number of blocks used by other allies.
1-chain: The Eye of Horus - The duration of 'Ancient Magic Circle' is increased by 10 seconds.
2-chain: The Hand of Anubis - Osiris decreases the enemy's resistance by 25% for 5 seconds, and deals magical damage equal to 250% of his attack power. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)
3-chain: The Curse of Osiris - Osiris decreases the enemy's evasion by 25% and SP by 50 for 5 seconds, and deals magical damage equal to 500% of his attack power. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_4_1.text: (Upon Activating Passive) 'Ultimate Holy Sword' deals 200% more damage.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_4_21.text: (Passive enhanced) All enemies hit by 'Desert Tide' decrease the SP by 15.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_4_8.text: Upon using 3-chain Uzimant charges forward and increases his own attack power by 150%. This effect cannot be canceled.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_5_1.text: (Upon Activating Passive) 'Ultimate Holy Sword' deals 200% more damage.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_5_21.text: (Passive enhanced) All enemies hit by 'Desert Tide' decrease the SP by 15.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_6_1.text:
(Upon Activating Passive) Leon's critical chance increases by 25% and maximum HP by 10% for 5 seconds.
(Passive Altered) With every 3 blocks he uses, Leon activates 'Legendary Holy Sword' to deal physical damage equal to 600% of his attack power and 15% of his maximum HP. 'Legendary Holy Sword' ignores all enemy armor by 200% of Leon's own armor. If 'Legendary Holy Sword' accurately hits the enemy, Leon activates the passive one more time. (Cooltime: 3 second)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_6_21.text:
(Passive enhanced) All enemies hit by 'Desert Tide' lose 15 SP. The number of hits needed to activate 'Desert Wave' is decreased to 3 hits, and its cooltime by 1 second.
(Passive added) Upon using 'Desert Wave' 2 times, Isis instantly activates 'Desert Fury.'
'Desert Fury': Isis deals magical damage equal to 1000% of her attack power, stunning her enemies for 1.5 seconds and pushing them back.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_6_8.text: Upon using 3-chain Uzimant charges forward and increases his own attack power by 150%. He ignores debuff effect. Damage of the 'Double Slash' doubles. This effect cannot be canceled.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_YS8_ADOL_4.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Flash Guard': Damage Reduction +20%, Critical Chance +10%

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_YS8_ADOL_6.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Flash Guard': Damage Reduction +20%, Critical Chance +10%, Generate 1 block for himself.
(Passive Enhanced) Damage dealt by 'Force Edge' +150%
(Upon activating 'Force Edge' 3 times) Adol uses 'Blade Rush' that is treated as a 3-chain and deals physical damage equal to 500% of his attack power 3 times. The last hit of 'Blade Rush' stuns enemy for 1 second. Simultaneously, his allies use their 3-chain abilities.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_YS8_DANA_4.text: (Upon activating passive) Damage Reduction +20%, Speed +10%, Life Steal +10%

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_YS8_DANA_6.text:
(Upon activating passive) Damage Reduction +20%, Speed +10%, Life Steal +10%
(Passive Enhanced) Upon activating 'Flash Move,' Dana generates 1 block of her own.
(Passive Added) After activating 'Dragon Spirit,' Dana uses 'Water Burst,' summoning large spheres of water to reel in the enemy and deal magical damage equal to 200% of her attack power per hit.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_LIMITED_YS8_LAXIA_6.text:
(Upon activating passive) Damage Reduction +20%, Speed +10%
(Passive Added) Laxia activates 'Lethal Raid' instead of 'Blitz Charge'. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)
('Lethal Raid') Laxia rapidly charges to the enemy and deals neutral damage equal to 150% of her attack power. She then cuts the enemy in two to deal physical damage equal to 600% of her attack power. This attack decreases hit enemies' armor and resistance by 30% for 5 seconds and cancels all buffs.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_4_3.text: (Passive Added) Upon activating 'Ultra-Magic Beam," every auto attack and block skill Dorothy uses for 5 seconds afterwards will deal magical damage equal to 125% of her attack power and shoot an extra beam.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_16.text:
(Upon Activating Passive) Creates a barrier that absorbs up to 3000 damage.
(Passive added) Upon activating her passive, Vesper summons a 'Water Spirit.' The Water Spirit shoots 4 water drops, each dealing magical damage equal to 300~350% of attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_3.text: (Passive Added) Upon activating 'Ultra-Magic Beam," every auto attack and block skill Dorothy uses for 5 seconds afterwards will deal magical damage equal to 200% of her attack power and shoot an extra beam that dispels all enemy buffs. Additionally, Dorothy's resistance penetration is increased by 100%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_7.text: (Passive altered) Summons 'Heart King' who deals magical damage equal to 1200% of attack power, and decreases attack power of hit enemies by 40% for 5 seconds. Hit enemies also have 10% chance of being stunned for 1 second.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_8.text: (Passive activated) Summons the Griffon that casts additional debuffs to enemies of decreasing accuracy by 15%, critical chance by 10% and resistance by 15%, which doubles the debuffs.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_9.text: (Upon activating passive) 'Enhanced Illusion' reduces affected enemies' resistances by 50% for 5s, and deals +100% damage to enemies with debuffs. Additionally, Mondrian summons 'Jangseungs,' instead of Clones dealing magical damage equal to 480% of his attack power per hit.

TEXT_EXPLORE_HERO_START_4TH_GRADE_MESSAG.text: Only 4-star heroes and above can go exploring.

TEXT_FAILED_TO_LOGIN_PREV.text:
Failed to load account.
Please log in again from the title screen.

TEXT_FAVORITE_DESC.text: Bookmark your favorite menus where you want.

TEXT_FIRST6_EVENT_DESC.text: Event starts when you acquire the first 6-star hero, and ends after 14 days regardless of if the reward has been given.

TEXT_FIRST6_EVENT_TITLE.text: Congratulations on your first 6 star hero!

TEXT_FISHERY_BOTTOM_FISHERYSHOP_01_DESC.text: A little shop for all your fishing needs.

TEXT_FISHERY_BOTTOM_FISHERYSHOP_02_DESC.text: A little shop for all your fishing needs.

TEXT_FISHERY_BOTTOM_FOREST_01_DESC.text: A wooden decoration that is supposed to be the mini version of the Hyro Forest

TEXT_FISHERY_BOTTOM_MINIFISHERY_01_DESC.text: Mini fishing spot for a fishing mania who needs to be in action all the time. A chair and a nice big umbrella are bonus.

TEXT_FISHERY_BOTTOM_NOTICE_01_DESC.text: An important sign for fishermen looking for fishing spots.

TEXT_FISHERY_BOTTOM_RODCRADLE_01_DESC.text: A rack to organize your fishing rods.

TEXT_FISHERY_CENTER_CLOUD_01_DESC.text: A cloud decoration. You could express your mood with it.

TEXT_FISHERY_CENTER_SUN_01_DESC.text: A sunny decoration. You could express your mood with it.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_BUNGFISHBREAD_DESC.text: A bread baked in the shape of a carp. Contrary to the norm, this one contains actual carp to lure fish more easily.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_JUNGARI_DESC.text: A refrigerated sardine. You picked out the smaller ones to use as bait.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_KOIBREAD_DESC.text: A golden bread that contains more glutinous rice and fat and is chewier than carp bread.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_KRILL_DESC.text: A small and nutritious crustacean that constitutes the diet of many other organisms, serving as the very foundation of marine ecosystems. It is also the popular choice for many fishermen as both freshwater and deep sea bait. Should not be confused with shrimps.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_OJINGA_DESC.text: A squid used for bait. Before using it, you must cut it into appropriate portions according to the fish you are trying to catch. It is rather tough and difficult to cut.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_SPINNER1_DESC.text: A small object that comprises of a ball bearing at its center, around which you can spin the object to your heart's content. For some reason, spinning it calms you and relieves your anxiety.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_SPINNER2_DESC.text: The upgraded version of Spinner MK1. The edges have been sharpened to improve its performance. Fish will surely lose their minds upon seeing this bad boy spin!

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_START_DESC.text: A homemade bait made by mixing water and ground insect or grain and then shaping the resulting paste into a round ball. It isn't very good for the environment.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_TOPBLACK_DESC.text: A bait series designed by the Hasla Fishing Association. The black color, symbolizing death and despair, invokes fear in the heart of all fish that see it.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_TOPBLUE_DESC.text: A bait series designed by the Hasla Fishing Association. The blue color, which also symbolizes the sorrow of defeated fish, will entice all kinds of fish to bite.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_TOPRED_DESC.text: A bait series designed by the Hasla Fishing Association. The red color emits out a warning to all fish that a serious fisherman is in town.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_TOPYELLOW_DESC.text: A bait series designed by the Hasla Fishing Association. The yellow color cheerily taunts fish into biting.

TEXT_FISHING_BAIT_WORM_DESC.text: The most popular - and perhaps even famous - choice of bait. It belongs to the biological kingdom of Animalia.

TEXT_FISHING_FLOAT_BEGINNER_DESC.text: A durable float that reacts sensitively to bites and doesn't get easily trapped between rocks.

TEXT_FISHING_FLOAT_BRONZE_DESC.text: A bronze float made in the shape of a fish.

TEXT_FISHING_FLOAT_ELECTRIC_DESC.text: A float in the shape of a lightbulb. It lures in fish with light.

TEXT_FISHING_FLOAT_EXPERT_DESC.text: A quality float made by an experienced artisan with fine materials.

TEXT_FISHING_FLOAT_GOLD_DESC.text: A gold float made in the shape of a fish.

TEXT_FISHING_FLOAT_LOVERDUCK_DESC.text: A float designed in the shape of a duck by a prominent artist. Gazing at it, you feel at peace.

TEXT_FISHING_FLOAT_MIDDLE_DESC.text: A float for more experienced fishermen.

TEXT_FISHING_FLOAT_SHYPOD_DESC.text: A state-of-the-art float specially designed by the Hasla Fishing Association. It lures in fish with vibrations and sound.

TEXT_FISHING_FLOAT_SILVER_DESC.text: A silver float made in the shape of a fish.

TEXT_FISHING_FLOAT_START_DESC.text: An ordinary float that is a part of the starter kit given to you by Fishernyan. You should probably get a new one before long.

TEXT_FISHING_ROD_BAMBOO_DESC.text: A rod made out of bamboo and some string. Classy.

TEXT_FISHING_ROD_BORON_DESC.text: A rod made out of boron, a blackish metal that is said to rival diamonds in strength.

TEXT_FISHING_ROD_CARBON_DESC.text: A rod made out of carbon fiber. Durable, flexible, and light enough for every fishing scenario you can think of. We hope.

TEXT_FISHING_ROD_GLASS_DESC.text: A rod made out of glass fiber. It is extremely durable, being resistant to both heat and wear.

TEXT_FISHING_ROD_GOLD_DESC.text: A rod made out of pure gold. Good for fishing, better for showing off.

TEXT_FISHING_ROD_IRON_DESC.text: A rod made out of steel. It's quite durable, but a little heavy.

TEXT_FISHING_ROD_KEVLAR_DESC.text: A rod made out of kevlar, a synthetic fiber five times stronger than steel. Only a few companies possess the patent to this material.

TEXT_FISHING_ROD_PREMIUM_DESC.text: A high-performance rod with a metal body and a wooden grip.

TEXT_FISHING_ROD_START_DESC.text: An ordinary rod that is a part of the starter kit given to you by Fishernyan. You should probably get a new one before long.

TEXT_FISHING_ROD_TITANIUM_DESC.text: A rod made out of titanium, a material stronger yet lighter than steel. It is difficult to produce and thus expensive.

TEXT_FISH_ALL_BOOTS_DESC.text: A threadbare rubber boot that has been wandering the seas for some time. You probably shouldn't put it on.

TEXT_FISH_ALL_CAN_DESC.text: An empty can that you fished out. People need to recycle!

TEXT_FISH_ALL_NET_DESC.text: An abandoned fishing net, often called a "ghost net." Even at this very minute, countless fish and other marine creatures are dying after becoming trapped in such nets, through starvation or suffocation.

TEXT_FISH_ALL_PEARL_DESC.text: The elegant jewel of the sea. Its iridescent hue reminds you of sunlight breaking on the waves.

TEXT_FISH_ALL_TIRE_DESC.text: A rubber tire that you fished out. It seems as if it had been in the water for a long time.

TEXT_FISH_AUTOFISHING_DESC.text:
[Auto Fishing]

1. Leave behind your fishing rod and come back after a certain amount of time to collect fish. 

2. In Auto Fishing, you have a higher chance of acquiring other items than fish.

3. Auto Fishing automatically ends when you run out of Bait.

4. You can stop Auto Fishing anytime you choose.

TEXT_FISH_AUTOFISHING_STOP_DESC.text:
Stop Auto Fish?

Your current fishing progress will be lost.

TEXT_FISH_FAIL_2.text: It looks like you didn't catch anything...

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ALIGATORGAR_DESC.text: A primitive species that is usually found in swamps. It resembles its namesake, while bigger members of this species even eat alligators when the opportunity arises.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_AROWANA_DESC.text: A large tropical fish that can live even in the most hostile of environments with hardly any oxygen. It is popular as aquarium fish, and its price spans a great range in accordance with its color and species.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_BAEKRYUNFISH_DESC.text: A species of carp that is classified as an invasive species due to its threatening size and high reproduction rate.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_BASS_DESC.text: A type of bass that belongs to the sunfish family. It spawns in weedy waters and eats smaller fish and insects. Along with the bullfrog and the bluegill, it is categorized as an invasive species.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_BLACKAROWANA_DESC.text: A species of arowana. While it can be bred as aquarium fish, it is highly susceptible to stress and tends to die unexpectedly.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_BLUEGILL_DESC.text: A freshwater fish that is found in the slower waters of streams and rivers. Due to its high reproduction rate and voracious appetite for smaller fish and shrimp, it is classified as an invasive species. The thorns on its dorsal fin are quite sharp, so be careful.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_BROWNSONGA_DESC.text: A nocturnal freshwater species that is native to colder waters, and feeds on smaller fish and insects. Breeding this fish in artificial hatcheries is notably difficult.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_BUDDLEBUNGFISH_DESC.text: Recognized for its long fin, this exotic aquarium fish changes the color of its fins and the pattern of its scales according to its mood.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_BULLFROG_DESC.text: A large type of frog that often threatens the ecosystem with its massive appetite and aggressive breeding behavior. Its characteristic croak, as well as its ample size, can prove to be surprisingly frightening.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_BUNGFISH_DESC.text: A fish belonging to the Cyprinid family found in lakes, swamps, rivers, and other bodies of water. It is uncommonly resilient to environmental change and pollution.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_CANDIRU_DESC.text: While this fish may resemble loaches, it is actually a type of catfish. A parasitic species, it enters a host fish's body through its gills and feeds off its flesh.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_CHOFISH_DESC.text: As can be inferred from its name, this freshwater fish has a big appetite for grass and other aquatic plants. If you see round fish excrement with a diameter of approximately 1 centimeter, it won't be long before you see a grass carp darting before your path.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_CHULGAPSHARK_DESC.text: A primitive fish whose major characteristics have remained unchanged for a long time. Contrary to its fierce appearance, this species possesses a meek and tame disposition. Its eggs are widely recognized as a delicacy, going by the name of caviar.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_COELACANTH_DESC.text: A species that was once thought to be extinct but was recently discovered. It is a rare species considered a living fossil, possessing the DNA of both fish and mammal.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_COLORINGFISH_DESC.text: A decorative species of carp selectively bred for their characteristic scale color and pattern. It must follow a specific diet to maintain their color, or its color will change back to its natural state. The best species of koi are traded at surprisingly high prices.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_DONGJAGAE_DESC.text: A freshwater fish that has many nicknames, dubbed for the quirky noise it makes when caught. While normally consumed as food, it has recently been bred for decorative purposes.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ELECTRICEEL_DESC.text: Eletric eels can generate up to 850V of electricity, which they use to hunt their prey. Their tail takes up 80% of their entire length.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_GAJAE_DESC.text: A type of a crustacean found in fresh water. Legend says that it was once a shrimp that envied the hard shells and claws of crabs.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_GOLDENSSOGARI_DESC.text: A beautiful and rare species of temperate perch that is famous for its golden scales, which are the result of a coloring mutation. It falls under the same species as the ordinary mandarinfish.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_GOLDFISH_DESC.text: One of the most common aquarium fish. Despite the popular myth that goldfish have a memory that spans all of three seconds, experiments prove that it actually remembers simple facts for up to 24 hours. Turns out that "having the memory of a goldfish" is actually a compliment in disguise.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_GOLDHALFMOON_DESC.text: A species of halfmoon that glows golden. It is rare as it is beautiful, and can only be seen, much less caught, with luck on your side.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_GUPPY_DESC.text: A species of tropical fish that lives in freshwater, characterized by the colorful patterns of its scales and caudal fin that make it a popular aquarium fish. It is called by different names according to its pattern. Its diet is mainly constituted of mosquito larvae.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_HALFMOON_DESC.text: A freshwater fish well known for its big and beautiful fins, which make it a popular aquarium fish. Bettas don't only have a pretty face, however - they have a long history as fighting fish due to their belligerent nature.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_HYANGFISH_DESC.text: A type of carp that became a separate species after two successive mutations. It has less scales and is plumper than the common carp, and can be eaten raw as sashimi.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_KINGCATFISH_DESC.text: A colossal catfish that is said to be bigger than a human being. Many legends have been derived from its sinister shadow swimming under the surface.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_LUNGFISH_DESC.text: A fish that can breathe air through its lungs. Due to this ability the lungfish can live both in and out of water, and is regarded as the ancestor of amphibians and reptiles. Its versatility helps it survive in the dry desert.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_MIGGURAGI_DESC.text: Loaches can live in dirty water as they can breathe through the surface of the water. Apparently, loaches and weatherfish are different species from each other. In Korea, chueo-tang (loach soup) and fish porridge are popular dishes made with loach.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_MINMOOLNABIGOGI_DES.text: A fish with memorable pectoral fins. It is a different species from its marine relative, the butterflyfish.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_MORAEMOOJI_DESC.text: A freshwater fish that lives in clean water. It dwells at the sandy bottom of the river and helps cleanse the water.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_NORMALFROG_DESC.text: The poster child for amphibians and hibernation. Disclaimer: kissing it will not change it to a member of royalty.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_DESERTCATFIS.text: A catfish with scales the color of sand. An extreme glutton, it greedily swallows the smaller fish of the oasis with its undiscriminating mouth.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_DESERTDRAGON.text: A species of arowana that is native to the desert. Arowanas are popular aquarium fish, and are called various names that include the word "dragon" according to their color.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_DESERTEEL_DE.text: A species of eel that has survived in the hostile desert thanks to its camouflage, which makes it resemble the surrounding sand.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_FIREFISH_DES.text: A fish that is literally on fire. It is small and thus not much of a threat, although you will get a burn if not careful.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_FIREGAEBOKCH.text: A species of mola mola that breathes fire. Yes, you read that right. Unfortunately, every time it releases its impressive flames, the fumes propels it backwards so rapidly that it can never find its way back home.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_FIRESAILFISH.text: A species that is similar to the common sailfish but has burning gills. A formidable predator of volcano lakes, it swims at high speeds in even the hottest of lava.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_FLAMEAROWANA.text: A species of arowana with flaming scales. While coveted by collectors for its exquisite beauty, it is extremely hard to come across, as it can only live in hot lava.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_GRILLEDFISH_.text: Oops, it seems like this fish didn't make it in the boiling waters of the volcanic lake. It smells delicious.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_LAVAICEFISH_.text: No one knows how this particular species of smelt, which originally inhabited the icy streams of the northern mountains, came to be found in the lakes of the Primal Volcano. Most Lava Smelts, whose flesh is made of ice, end up getting extinguished in the hot lava. Needless to say, they have a short lifespan.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_LAVATUNA_DES.text: A fish native to the lava lakes of Hasla. The belly of this particular species of tuna is made of hard basalt - bad news for all sushi lovers out there.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_MAGMAGUPPY_D.text: The Great Magma Guppy - known to all aquatic creatures as the wrath of the Volcano, the bane within the flames - was once too an ordinary fish. A small fry at the bottom of the food chain, it had had to flee to the hottest lava lake of the Primal Volcano to survive. Soon afterwards, news traveled near and far of a fish that knew no fear. It had returned. It was strong. It was alive. It was the Great Magma Guppy, who could cook other fish into delicious steak with a single slam of its body.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_STEAMBUSHIRI.text: A species of amberjack that breathes out steam from its gills. It turns a reddish color when it swims at high speeds.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_ORIGIN_THEONEFISH_D.text:
A mysterious fish born in the fires of the Primal Mountain.
One Fish to rule them all, One Fish to find them, 
One Fish to bring them all and in the lava bind them...

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_PACU_DESC.text: While this fish may resemble the vicious piranha, it has squarer teeth and feed on fruit that falls from trees into the water.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_PADDLEFISH_DESC.text: A primitive fish that retains most of its prehistoric characteristics. The electroreceptors on its rostrum help it detect electric fields that reveal the presence of potential prey.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_PIRAMI_DESC.text: A popular choice for bait and other fish's meals. What a sad life.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_PIRANHA_DESC.text: A carnivorous freshwater fish with surprisingly sharp teeth. Piranhas hunt their prey in large groups - called schools - and attack not only members of their own species, but also large mammals that unluckily cross their path.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_PIRARUCU_DESC.text: One of the largest freshwater fish in the world, the red pirarucu (literally meaning "red fish") is the natural predator of piranhas. It must swim up to the surface every 15 minutes to breathe and save oxygen within its air bladder.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_RAINBOWSONGA_DESC.text: A trout notable for its rainbow scales - hence its name. It is commonly bred for food.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_REDTAILCATFISH_DESC.text: A massive type of catfish that inhabits large rivers. It has a meek temper, but like many other catfish, swallow everything in its path with its large and tough mouth. It is sometimes bred as aquarium fish in bigger tanks.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_SNAKEHEAD_DESC.text: A large freshwater fish that can live anywhere - swamps, mud flats, ponds, lakes, rivers, you name it - as long as it has enough food and space. It is used for a variety of purposes, including food, medicine, and postpartum care products.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_SSOGARI_DESC.text: A freshwater fish that is recognized by its colorful patterns resembling apricot blossoms. It is a nocturnal species and can be found in streams with clear water and rapid currents. Upon feeling threatened, the mandarinfish will raise the dorsal fin on its back.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_TIGERFISH_DESC.text: A large freshwater fish that is as extremely predatory as its name and appearance suggest. Its hunts alone, chomping on smaller fish with its menacing teeth.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_TILAPIA_DESC.text: This omnivorous fish is commonly seen in a variety of habitats due to its rapid reproduction rate and high versatility.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_TRUEBUNGFISH_DESC.text: A species of catfish commonly seen in streams and fords. It is easily recognized by the dark lateral line cutting across its body.

TEXT_FISH_FRESHWATER_WELSCATFISH_DESC.text: A large catfish species that lives in slow-flowing rivers and lakes. It is characterized by a flat and broad head, a wide mouth, and a scaleless body. The wels catfish's sharp sense of hearing and touch make up for its poor eyesight.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_AGWI_DESC.text: A wide, ovoid fish that uses the bulb-like lure on its dorsal fin to attract prey. Surprisingly, it is considered a delicacy despite its ugly appearance.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_BAEKSANGARI_DESC.text: The fearsome predator of the seas, feared for its sharp teeth and strong jaw. Despite its reputation, smaller members of this species are occasionally hunted by killer whale pods.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_BALLROCK_DESC.text: A species that inhabits shallow waters around rocks and reefs. Even amateur fishermen can easily catch this fish, as it is easily lured by all kinds of bait. It even tastes good and is used in a variety of dishes.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_BANGEDOM_DESC.text: A blackish brown fish. Its richness in fat makes it a popular delicacy, but the largescale blackfish is difficult to catch due to its surprising agility and intelligence. Fishermen have dubbed it the nickname of "the black knight of the seas."

TEXT_FISH_SEA_BARRACUDA_DESC.text: A predatory fish with a very bad temper. It will perceive anything that glitters as food and attack. Watch out for its sharp teeth!

TEXT_FISH_SEA_BIGEYETUNA_DESC.text: A species of tuna that inhabits warmer waters. It is widely consumed around the world as sashimi, canned products, and other dishes.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_BOKFISH_DESC.text: A species that normally inhabits tropical estuaries. When surprised or attacked, it inflates its body in self-defense. One pufferfish possesses enough poison to kill 33 human adults.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_BUMGORAE_DESC.text: Don't be fooled by the orca's cute looks! While called the "wolf of the seas" for its aggressive disposition and tendency to hunt in groups, the killer whale is also a very social creature; it lives in matrilineal communities structured around the matriarch, and communicates with members of the pod through vocalized "songs."

TEXT_FISH_SEA_CHAMDOM_DESC.text: Called the "beauty of the seas" for its attractive appearance and good taste, the red seabream is said to bring good luck.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_CHAMTUNA_DESC.text: A species that travels in large shoals at speeds of up to 90km/h. Famous for its good taste, it has continuously been overfished around the world, resulting in a rapid decline of its population.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_CHUNGFISH_DESC.text: A species that feeds on small crustaceans, such as plankton. It forms very large schools in abundant numbers, but is still easy prey and the main source of diet for a variety of predators.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_CHUNGSAECHI_DESC.text: A large species that has a sharp, spear-like bill. It is strong enough to pull out fishhooks when caught.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_COPPERBAND_DESC.text: A species that inhabits the shallower waters of oceans and coral reefs. It is a popular aquarium fish due to its bright and colorful pattern and elegant shape.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_DAEGU_DESC.text: A large fish that can be found living in schools in deeper waters. Rich in vitamins and widely consumed as food, it is also the main ingredient of fish and chips.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_DOLDOM_DESC.text: A fish recognized by its black vertical stripes. While considered the best of the "four seabreams" it is notoriously difficult to catch, as it is not only vigilant but also tends to dwell at the bottom of the sea.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_DOTSAECHI_DESC.text: A big species of billfish that is characterized by its dorsal fin, which covers the span of its tail and is often called a "sail" for that reason. It can swim at speeds up to 110 km/h, making it the fastest marine creature known to humankind.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_GAEBOKCHI_DESC.text: Also called the ocean sunfish, the mola mola is a strangely shaped fish with developed dorsal and ventral fins and lack of tail. Before diving down into deeper waters, it has a tendency to "surface bask" - or float on the surface of the water to save enough heat for the dive - becoming temporarily vulnerable to the prying hands of fishermen.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_GALCHI_DESC.text: A fish characterized by a long silvery body, hence its name. It is nocturnal.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_GAMSUNGDOM_DESC.text: One of the "four seabreams" along with the red seabream, striped beakfish, and largescale blackfish, the black porgy is a popular catch among fishermen. Its sharp dorsal fin and strong jaw require caution.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_GASHIBOK_DESC.text: A fish with sharp spines all over its body. If it feels threatened, it will "puff" its stomach to a round shape and point its spines, much in the resemblance of a menacing chestnut.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_GGONGCHI_DESC.text: Also called the mackerel pike. It is one of the most popular fish consumed by humans as food, as it is rich in fat and nutrients. It can be widely found in waters where the cold and warm currents meet.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_GGOTGAE_DESC.text: A type of crab that can be commonly found in shallow waters or mud eddies. It is commonly consumed as food.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_GODEUNGFISH_DESC.text: A common species belonging to the tuna and mackerel family. It inhabits clear waters between the epipelagic and middle zones of the ocean. Rich in Vitamin B2, iron, and fatty acids such as Omega-3, it is widely caught for consumption.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_HWANGSAECHI_DESC.text: A large fish with scales tinted bronze. Considerably bigger than other species of fish, the swordfish is recognized by its elongated body shape and lack of scales, which they lose when they reach adulthood. Its "sword," which takes up more than half of its entire length, can be used to injure and kill even whales.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_IMYEONSOO_DESC.text: A species of mackerel that inhabits colder waters. Many fishermen and divers have praised the beauty of mackerel schools swimming in open sea. If you have more culinary interests, grilling or frying it without removing its skin will result in a tasty dish.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_JOGI_DESC.text: A migratory fish that follows warm currents to reproduce. It normally moves in large schools and is characterized by the loud croaking sound it makes. Its skull bone is extremely durable - classifying the fish as a "hardhead" - and has medicinal uses.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_JUGGUMI_DESC.text: A species of octopus that resides on the sandy bottoms of shallow waters. It is distinguished from long arm octopuses by the golden ring around the base of its third leg.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_JUNGARI_DESC.text: A great source of protein, calcium, and other vitamins, sardines are a favorite meal of bigger fish - especially mola mola.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_MINFISH_DESC.text: A species that resides primarily on the sandy bottom of shallow waters. It creates a characteristic croaking sound through its air bladder.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_NONGFISH_DESC.text: A migratory fish normally caught and eaten in the summer.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_NUPCHI_DESC.text: Also called a halibut, the olive flounder is characterized by its flat body and askew eyes. The eyes of this fish are normally set during its smolt stage, but gradually move to the side as the fish matures.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_OJINGA_DESC.text: A cephalopod widely found in both shallow and deep waters. It feeds on small fish and other creatures with the suction cups of its tentacles and its toothy mouth. It dies shortly after mating.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_PEPPERMINT_DESC.text: A type of angelfish with beautiful vertical stripes. It is an extremely rare and expensive species that is difficult to breed.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_REDBARRACUDA_DESC.text: A species recognized by its sharp and pointed mouth. It feeds on a variety of prey including smaller fish, octopus, shrimp, and crab.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_SAEWOO_DESC.text: A crustacean found all over the world in a variety of habitats, in both freshwater bodies and oceans. It is an important source of food for many countries for its richness in protein and calcium, and is also widely used as animal feed and fish bait.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_SALMON_DESC.text: Salmon eggs hatch in freshwater streams, after which smolts travel to the open ocean. In autumn, mature salmon swim upstream back to their natal streams to lay their eggs.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_SAMCHI_DESC.text: A fish belonging to the mackerel family. It feeds on small fish, drawn especially by fast-moving prey. Its tender meat makes it a popular source of food.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_SANGALCHI_DESC.text: A gigantic species that is the motif of many legends and myths throughout the lands due to its size and beauty. It usually stays in deeper waters, but is sometimes swept to the shore by a strong current.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_SOONGFISH_DESC.text: A fish native to both tropical and temperate regions. It is also capable of living in fresh water, and will sometimes swim upstream in search for food.

TEXT_FISH_SEA_WOORUCK_DESC.text: A commonly found fish that is often eaten raw as sashimi. Although born black, it changes color to gray or white as it matures.

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_GRADE_4_GACHA_ONLY_DESC.text: 100% Chance of Recruiting a Contract Only Hero

TEXT_GATE_CHALLENGE_DESC.text: Challenge more dangerous foes and earn rewards to boost your heroes' powers.

TEXT_GATE_KURENAI_DESC.text: At the Primal Mountain, the heroes of Ryu Kingdom and the Woopa Tribe must gather to stop the mysterious power of the Primal Flames.

TEXT_GATE_PRACTICE_DESC.text: Study your team's power and abilities by training against the most technologically advanced scarecrows in the continent.

TEXT_GATE_SCENARIO_DESC.text: Become a legend of the epic world of Crusaders Quest.

TEXT_GATE_SOUL_DESC.text: Lord Soltar, the tyrant of the bygone century, has awoken from his long slumber to conquer the world. Who shall stop his army of shadows?

TEXT_GATE_SUBSCENARIO_DESC.text: In other corners of the world, more stories await - as well as a mysterious power that lies waiting for its true master.
