TEXT_GROUND_MANSION_MARBLE_01_DESC.text: A marble floor that is both elegant and natural. Its luster gives the room a glamorous sheen.

TEXT_GROUND_SCHOOL_WOOD_01_DESC.text: A pleasant and cozy hardwood floor.

TEXT_GYPSI_LOW_INHERIT_BOOK_ALL_01_HELP.text: You can increase a hero's inheritance level, nya.

TEXT_GYPSI_LOW_INHERIT_BOOK_ARCHER_01.text: You can increase a Archer's inheritance level, nya.

TEXT_GYPSI_LOW_INHERIT_BOOK_HUNTER_01.text: You can increase a Hunter's inheritance level, nya.

TEXT_GYPSI_LOW_INHERIT_BOOK_PALADIN_01.text: You can increase a Paladin's inheritance level, nya.

TEXT_GYPSI_LOW_INHERIT_BOOK_PRIEST_01.text: You can increase a Priest's inheritance level, nya.

TEXT_GYPSI_LOW_INHERIT_BOOK_WARRIOR_01.text: You can increase a Warrior's inheritance level, nya.

TEXT_GYPSI_LOW_INHERIT_BOOK_WIZARD_01.text: You can increase a Wizard's inheritance level, nya.

TEXT_GYPSI_NEGOTIATE_DESC.text: Bargain prices with Popo using Jewels. Bargained items are 50% off. Wanna try?

TEXT_GYPSI_RANDOMBOX_ITEM_CARVESTONE_HEL.text: I'm so excited which Sigil it is going to be, nya!

TEXT_GYPSI_RANDOMBOX_MAP_HELP_2.text: An ancient chest that Popo has found on her and Toto's travels throughout the lands of Hasla. It seems to be full to the brim with maps.

TEXT_HELP_10101_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. A Team is composed of three Heroes, a Goddess, and a Champion.
2. Upon forming a Team, you must choose one Hero as the Leader of the party. The Leader 's skill block is generated 50% more often.
3. You can recruit your friends' Heroes once a day. (Only in Scenario Mode)
4. Taking a friend's Hero to battle will earn your own Heroes 50% more EXP. The friend receives 3 Honor in return.
5. You can save Teams in the Hero > Team Menu, and load them upon preparing for battle.

TEXT_HELP_10102_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Heroes move and deal attacks automatically.
2. If you touch the Skill Blocks at the bottom of the screen, the respective Hero will use their Block Skill.
3. The strength and effect of Block Skills differ depending on the number of blocks in the chain used. A maximum of 3 blocks make up a chain.
4. Using a Hero's Block Skill charges the Goddess Skill gauge, which can be pressed to activate the Goddess Skill. Each Goddess has different abilities, so be sure to check them out in the Goddess Room!
5. Pressing the Champion Button will activate the Champion's Active Skill. Keep in mind that there is a limit to the number of times a Champion's Active Skill can be used per round.

TEXT_HELP_10201_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Check out your Account Level, Colosseum Rank, and Fame.
2. You can also check your Achievements, Fame distribution, and Portrait Panel in the Fame tab.
3. Look over the Monuments you have collected in game.
4. Check the accumulation of your wealth and resources.

TEXT_HELP_10202_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Receive and manage various rewards and items.
2. Read official announcements, Dev Letters, and Patch Notes in the 'Letter' tab.
3. Items you receive through the Mailbox will be categorized into different tabs depending on their usage. 
4. All mail are stored up to 30 days. They will be automatically deleted afterward.

TEXT_HELP_10203_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. You can add up to 70 friends in game. Trade Meat and Honor with your game friends once every day!
2. Receive additional rewards by trading daily Honor with more game friends.
3. You can bookmark friends by pressing the star button left of the player's portrait icon. Bookmarked friends are automatically listed at the top of your friends list.
4. Up to 5 friends can be deleted per day.
5. Search and add friends through searching IGN, connecting your Facebook account, or using Bluetooth!

TEXT_HELP_10204_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. You can cancel your purchase within 7 days of purchase if you have not used the product. Please note that there is a chance you will lose your purchase information if you do not sync your account data. 
2. Purchase a variety of game goods, including Package Items, Jewels, Gold, Game Items, and Hero Skins!
3. You will receive Bridget Points in proportion to the price of your in-app purchase.
4. Bridget Points can be spent in the 'Point' tab of the Shop.

TEXT_HELP_10205_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. You can use Jewels to recruit Heroes or acquire Weapons.
2. Different contracts will recruit different kinds of Heroes.
3. Support Hero Contracts can be purchased with Honor twice every week.
4. If you recruit a duplicate 4-Star and above Hero through 10 Consecutive Gold, Special, or Event Contracts, you will be guaranteed as many Books of Inheritance as the number of duplicate Hero(es) recruited.
5. You can get and use up to 10 Promote Contracts per day through watching ads.

TEXT_HELP_10206_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Use Ovens in Chocolat's Bakery to receive Bread every few hours.
2. Each Oven requires a different amount of time to finish baking, and gives different types of bread upon completion.
3. You can use Jewels to immediately finish baking.
4. The Mysterious Oven can be used 10 times a day by watching ads.

TEXT_HELP_10207_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Curious about the world of Crusaders Quest? Read up on the Heroes, Weapons, and lore of Hasla in the Library of Dimensions.
2. Track the progress of your Hero and Weapon collection.
3. Recruiting certain Heroes will unlock Hero Stories - little episodes featuring the Heroes of Hasla. You will earn rewards for unlocking each Hero Story.
4. Review Scenario episode cutscenes.
5. View illustrations of Heroes you have recruited.

TEXT_HELP_10208_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Special Skills are divided into Normal Special Skills, which can be transferred to Heroes 3-Stars and above, and Advanced Special Skills, which can be transferred to Heroes 5-Stars and above. (Excluding Support Heroes)
2. A Hero can learn only one Special Skill at a time.
3. Heroes of different classes can learn different Special Skills.
4. Transferring a Special Skill requires Gold and Honor.
5. You must meet certain conditions to unlock and upgrade Special Skills.
6. 1 level higher skill will be transferred by obtaining Great Success.
7. Transferred skills can be deleted.

TEXT_HELP_10209_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Decorate your own Hero Home in game using Heroes, furniture, Monuments, and other decorations.
2. You can place up to 6 Heroes within your Hero Home.
3. Heroes placed within the Hero Home can be interacted in various ways. Try touching and dragging them around!
4. Place furniture and decorations in your Hero Home by rotating and reversing.

TEXT_HELP_10210_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Manage Bread, Berries, and Books of Inheritance needed for Heroes' growth.
2. Use Items to increase your Heroes' stats.

TEXT_HELP_10211_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Permanently store Chests, Sigils, and Buff Potions.
2. Up to 999 Chests can be stored in a single slot. A maximum of 10 Chests can be opened at a time.
3. One Sigil is stored per slot.
4. Milk of Growth can be used from this menu. Other Buff Potions can be selected in the Battle Preparation menu.

TEXT_HELP_10212_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Manage skins you have earned in game.
2. Dress your Heroes in skins.

TEXT_HELP_10213_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Manage your Weapons and Rings, and view detailed information.
2. Equip Heroes with the appropriate Gear.

TEXT_HELP_10214_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Receive Quests and clear them for various rewards.
2. Quests are classified into different tabs depending on their category.

TEXT_HELP_10215_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Send your heroes on expeditions to receive various rewards.
2. Every Exploration has different conditions that can be met to earn bonus rewards.
3. Up to four Explorations can be held at a time.
4. Only 4-Star and above heroes can be sent on Explorations.
5. You can immediately complete an Exploration by using Map pieces.

TEXT_HELP_10216_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Traveling Merchants appear randomly in Scenario stages. Rescue them for a chance to purchase their wares.
2. If you give up or fail to clear the stage, you will not be able to rescue the Traveling Merchant.
3. Once rescued, the Traveling Merchant will linger in town for 15 minutes. Take a look at their wares for various rare items!
4. Pay jewels or watch ads to get a better deal.

TEXT_HELP_20101_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. The Heroes of Crusaders Quest are categorized into 6 classes: Warriors, Paladins, Archers, Hunters, Wizards, and Priests.
2. Additionally, they can be further classified by their rarity: Legendary, Contract, Promote, Secret, Normal, and Support.
3. Heroes can be leveled up by playing Scenario Mode and Dungeons, as well as completing Explorations.
4. Heroes of different ranks have different maximum Levels and Training Levels: 
  - 1-Star: LV10/-
  - 2-Star: LV20/+1
  - 3-Star: LV30/+2
  - 4-Star: LV40/+3
  - 5-Star: LV50/+4
  - 6-Star: LV60/+5
5. You will receive 1 Jewel upon training any Hero to maximum Level for the first time.
6. Heroes 4-Stars and above are aligned to specific forces.

TEXT_HELP_20102_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Legendary Heroes can be recruited through clearing special Dungeons and earning Destiny Points.
2. They range from 1- to 6-Stars, and are fixed in their promotion stages.
3. Legendary Heroes have higher stats on average than other types of Heroes.

TEXT_HELP_20103_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Contract Heroes can be recruited through Premium and Special Contracts.
2. Contract Heroes range from 4- to 6-Stars, and are fixed in their promotion stages.

TEXT_HELP_20104_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Meet a random Promotion Hero by promoting a 3-Star Hero of the same class.
2. Promotion Heroes range from 4- to 6-Stars, and are fixed in their promotion stages.

TEXT_HELP_20105_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Normal Heroes can be recruited in various ways.
2. They range from 1- to 3-Stars, and change into a random hero of the same class upon promotion.

TEXT_HELP_20106_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Secret Heroes can be recruited only through limited events or special conditions.
2. Secret Heroes 4-Star and above are fixed in their promotion. There are several 3-Star Secret Heroes as well.
3. Secret Heroes do not belong to a particular force, but can reinforce all Champions.

TEXT_HELP_20107_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Support Heroes are used to reinforce forces (Champions).
2. Support Heroes can reinforce all forces. The amount of Friendship they supply depends on their Star Grade.
3. Support Heroes range from 3- to 6-Stars. They cannot be promoted.

TEXT_HELP_20108_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Retiring a Hero will earn you Honor.
2. Heroes do not return once they are retired. Be careful!

TEXT_HELP_20201_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Heroes can eat Bread and train to increase their Training Level.
2. Training requires both Bread and Gold.
3. Heroes can eat 6 Bread at a time. Obtaining Great Success will grant 50% more Training EXP.
4. Training Levels are marked in percentages, in green letters.

TEXT_HELP_20202_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Heroes can be promoted once they reach maximum Level and Training.
2. Promoting requires a certain amount of Honor for each Hero grade.
3. 6-Star Heroes and Support Heroes cannot be promoted.

TEXT_HELP_20203_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. 6-Star Heroes can eat Berries to gain additional stats.
2. Each Hero can eat a different amount of Berries.
3. You need Gold to eat Berries.
4. Up to 6 Berries can be eaten at once. Obtaining Great Success will grant 50% more stats.
5. Berry Training progress is marked in percentages, in blue letters.
6. The more Berries Heroes eat, the darker color their Training Level letters become. A Hero who has reached maximum Training and Berry Training will have their Training Level marked in orange.

TEXT_HELP_20204_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. 6-Star Heroes who have reached maximum Level and Training can receive Inheritance.
2. Different stats are increased for every Inheritance Level.
3. Up to10 Books of Inheritance can be used at once.
4. Inherited Heroes can be distinguished by their purple Level marks.

TEXT_HELP_20301_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. All Heroes have their own Block Skill.
2. The higher the Hero's Star Grade, the stronger the Hero's Block Skill becomes.
3. Up to 3 blocks can be joined to form a chain. Using longer chains will trigger stronger skills and/or bonus effects. 
4. Touch the Skill icon to see more detailed information.

TEXT_HELP_20302_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Heroes 4-Star and above have a special Passive Skill. (Excluding Support Heroes)
2. Passive Skills are activated by the usage of the Hero's own or other allies' blocks, the number of attacks, hits dealt to the enemy, cooltimes, and other various conditions.
3. Passive Skills are divided into Main and Support Types depending on their activation conditions.
4. Passive Skills can be enhanced by equipping Soulbound Weapons.

TEXT_HELP_20303_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Special Skills can be transferred to Heroes 3-Stars and above at the Skill Lab. 
2. Using a Hero's Block Skill will increase their SP in proportion to the number of blocks used.
3. A Special Skill block is formed upon reaching 100 SP, after which the gauge is reset to 0.
4. Special Skill blocks cannot be linked into chains.

TEXT_HELP_20401_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Soulbound Weapons can only be equipped by certain 4-Star and above Heroes.
2. Lower grade Heroes cannot equip weapons of grades higher than their own.
3. Soulbound Weapons can be obtained through forging Old Weapons or opening Golden Weapon Chests.
4. All Soulbound Weapons have 1 Soulbound Ability and 2 random Upgrade Options (Attack, Defense, and Function).
5. The two random Upgrade Options can be changed by using Random Weapon Option Tickets and Weapon Option Selection Tickets.
6. The Soulbound Ability of a Soulbound Weapon greatly enhances the Hero's skills, granting them stronger attacks or new passives.
7. Forge a Soulbound Weapon further to enhance its Soulbound Ability to its maximum potential.

TEXT_HELP_20402_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Old Weapons can be forged into Soulbound Weapons, which are stronger than Normal Weapons.
2. Old Weapons can be acquired in Fortress of Souls, Dungeons, Raids, Explorations, or purchased from Traveling Merchants.
3. Forging requires Iron and other materials found in the Fortress of Souls.
4. Old Weapons can be equipped by Heroes, but be aware that they have no weapon options whatsoever.

TEXT_HELP_20403_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Normal Weapons can be equipped by heroes of the appropriate class regardless of their grade.
2. They can be acquired through various routes.
3. Normal Weapons have different numbers of options based on their grade.
4. The types of weapon options (Attack, Defense, Function) are set for all Normal Weapons, and cannot be changed.

TEXT_HELP_20404_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Merchant's Weapons can be sold or salvaged to earn a great amount of resources.
2. Merchant's Weapons can be obtained through opening Golden Weapon Chests and Soul Boxes.

TEXT_HELP_20405_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. You can salvage weapons to earn Iron.
2. If you choose the Enhanced Salvage option upon salvaging, you can earn bonus Crystal Powder, Crystal Shards, and Crystals.
3. With every salvage you have a low possibility of obtaining Great Success, which grants you 100% more rewards.

TEXT_HELP_20406_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Upgrading a weapon will transfer a random option to the slot.
2. Weapon Options are divided into three categories: Attack, Defense, and Function.
3. Be sure to check the 'Option Info' before you attempt to upgrade a weapon. Here you can see the Weapon Options available at your Mercenary Level.
4. Soulbound Weapon options can be changed by using Random Weapon Option Tickets or Weapon Option Selection Ticket.
5. You can upgrade your weapon to higher options as your Mercenary Level increases.
6. You can purchase locked Weapon Options with Gold.
7. Obtaining Great Success on the weapon upgrade will grant a 15% bonus to the option.
8. A weapon that has both options upgraded with Great Success will be marked with the letters 'MAX.' 
9. When you upgrade an option, the previous option will be deleted.

TEXT_HELP_20407_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Only Old and Soulbound Weapons can be forged.
2. Forging an Old Weapon will result in 2 random ★4 Soulbound Weapons, of which only 1 may be chosen.
3. You may use Bridget Points to retry forging for other weapons before choosing between the two. You will not get duplicate weapons for 5 retries.
4. Forging a Soulbound Weapon will promote its grade. 
5. Forging materials may be obtained in the Fortress of Souls and Challenge Mode.

TEXT_HELP_20408_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. 6-Star Soulbound Weapons can be inlaid with Sigils to gain extra stats.
2. In order to inlay a Sigil, you must first add a slot to a Soulbound Weapon. 
3. Adding a slot to a 6-star Soulbound Weapon requires another 6-Star Soulbound Weapon as the Material Weapon. Material Weapons will be destroyed upon attempting to add a slot. 
4. Obtaining Success will add 1 slot to the base Soulbound Weapon, while obtaining Great Success will add 2 slots. 
5. Each attempt to add a slot will grant you 1 Fergus Point. You can use Fergus Points to obtain 100% Great Success on your next try.

TEXT_HELP_20409_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. You can inlay a Sigil in a Soulbound Weapon that has a slot.
2. You need Gold in order to inlay a Sigil.
3. You can unequip inlaid Sigils by paying Fergus.
4. If you attempt to inlay a new Sigil in a slot that already has a Sigil, the original Sigil will be destroyed.

TEXT_HELP_20410_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Rings can be obtained through clearing Manacar Raids, Weekly Quests, and Legend of Primal Flames Side Story Dungeon.
2. A Ring has a main option and several sub options depending on the ring's grade.
  - 1-Star Rings: 1 Main Option / 2-Star Rings: 1 Main Option + 1 Sub Option / 3-, 4-Star Rings: 1 Main Option + 2 Sub Options / 5-,6-Star Rings: 1 Main Option + 3 Sub Options
3. Rings are classified by their main options and ranks.
4. Ring options are randomly drawn within a certain range.
5. They are further classified by their option grades, ranging from Bort, Inferior, Intermediate, Superior, to Premium.
6. Further information on Ring options can be found through Ring information.

TEXT_HELP_20411_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Converting ring options requires either Essence of Flames or Essence of Mana.
2. Essence of Mana can be obtained by extracting rings or playing 'Legend of Primal Flames' Side Story Dungeon.
3. Essence of Flames can be obtained by playing 'Legend of Primal Flames' Side Story Dungeon.
4. Essence of Flames can be used to upgrade the rank of the main and sub options of rings.
5. Essence of Mana can be used to randomly convert ring sub options.
6. The number of possible conversions depends on the ring's grade.
  - 1-, 2-Star Rings: 1 times
  - 3-, 4-Star Rings: 2 times
  - 5-Star Rings: 3 times
  - 6-Star Rings: 5 times

TEXT_HELP_20412_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Skins change the appearance of Heroes and grant extra stats.
2. They can be worn and managed in Inventory:Skins.

TEXT_HELP_20501_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Examine the skills of the Goddesses who have joined your Mercenary.
2. You can talk with the Goddeses. Additional dialogues will be added as you progress along Scenario Mode.

TEXT_HELP_20502_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Only one Goddess can accompany a team at a time.
2. The Goddess Skill gauge/button can be found above the block generation field. 
3. Using Heroes' block skills charges the Goddess Skill gauge, the amount depending on the number of blocks used.
4. If you charge the gauge to a certain level, you can touch the button to use a Goddess Skill.
5. Up to 3 Goddess Skills can be charged.
6. You can change the position of the Goddess Skill gauge/button in Settings.

TEXT_HELP_20601_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Champions represent a particular force or country in Hasla.
2. Champions are recruited through meeting certain conditions. 
3. A particular 6-Star Promotion Hero is needed to recruit a Champion.
4. Champion Skills are automatically upgraded when the Champion is leveled up.
5. Once a Champion reaches maximum level, they obtain a powerful Transcended Skill called a Buff.
6. Champion stats are decided by the accumulation of the party Heroes' stats.

TEXT_HELP_20602_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. In order to reinforce a Champion, you must send Heroes of the same faction and increase the Friendship Level of the Champion, strengthening the fellowship's alliance.
2. The amount of Friendship obtained by sending a Hero depends on that Hero's category and Star Level.
3. Support Heroes can reinforce all Champions regardless of forces.
4. Once you reach maximum Friendship with a Champion, further reinforcements will earn you bonus rewards.
5. A Hero will not return once sent to a Champion.

TEXT_HELP_20603_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Only one Champion can accompany a team at a time.
2. When a Champion accompanies a team, the Champion Skill Gauge/Button appears above the block generation field.
3. You can touch the Champion Gauge to use the Champion's Active Skill, which is charged some time after the stage begins.
4. Each Champion Skill has different cooltimes and maximum activation limits.
5. Champion Buttons are placed in the same direction as the block generation direction. You can customize the button location in Setting.

TEXT_HELP_30101_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Scenario Mode consists of various episodes, chapters, and stages held across the lands of Hasla. 
2. Playing Scenario Mode requires Meat. 1 Meat is recharged every 6 minutes.
3. You can earn not only Mercenary and Hero EXP, but also various rewards useful for your gameplay.
4. Goddesses, Champions, and Friend Heroes can accompany your party.
5. Friend Heroes have a cooltime of 24 hours after being taken.
6. You can check the Record menu to see Hero parties used by other players to clear the stage. 
7. If you die in a Scenario stage, you can continue playing by watching ads or using Jewels.
8. If you continue playing after dying, your Heroes will be revived and granted immunity for a few seconds.
9. If you rescue a Traveling Merchant in stage, the Merchants will show their wares in town for 15 minutes.

TEXT_HELP_30102_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Challenge Mode is unlocked after clearing Episode 1 of the Kalard Chronicles.
2. Playing Challenge Mode requires Meat. 
3. Watch out for strong Challenge Monsters and their formidable attacks!
4. After defeating the Champion Monster, you can choose to either continue the Challenge or escape the stage. If you choose to escape, you will take the rewards you have earned to that point.
5. If you die in Challenge Mode, you can continue playing by using Jewels.
6. If you die in Challenge Mode, you will lose all the rewards you have earned.
7. You can obtain Iron, Sigils, and Books of Inheritance by playing Challenge Mode.
8. Goddesses and Champions can accompany your party.

TEXT_HELP_30103_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Earn resources needed to forge Soulbound Weapons.
2. A Hero can enter the Fortress only once a day. However, you can use Jewels to reset any Hero's entrance.
3. A floor can be entered only once a day. However, you can use Jewels to replay a stage.
4. An event is activated on a random floor every day. Clearing this event will grant 50% more rewards.
5. On certain floors you have a chance of finding either a currupted fragment or a fragment of Danan.
Fragment of Danan: If you succeed in defending it to the end of the stage, you will receive 50% more rewards. 
- Event Floors Include: The Dark Hall - 1, The Wall 1, The Grand Gallery
Corrupted Fragment: If you fail to destroy it in time, nearby enemies will grow stronger.
- Event Floors Include: The Gates - 2, The Dark Hall - 2, The Wall - 2
6. The Hero Bosses of the Fortress are constituted of Heroes of top Colosseum victors from the previous week.
7. If you die in the Fortress, you can continue playing by watching ads or using Jewels.

TEXT_HELP_30104_MAIN.text: Side Story: Legend of Primal Flames

TEXT_HELP_30104_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Earn special Rings and Essence needed to convert Rings.
2. You need Tokens of Flames to play this Side Story. Only 3 Tokens are charged every day, and do not recharge over time. You can use Jewels to buy more Tokens (3 at a time). 
3. While playing Legend of Primal Flames, you will need to make certain decisions or choose differing paths. Your decision may bring about different results, so think wisely!
4. Goddesses and Champions can accompany your team.
5. You cannot continue playing if you die in Legend of Primal Flames.

TEXT_HELP_30105_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Play around with various settings to test out teams and study their skills.
2. Unlock more scarecrows by progressing along Scenario Mode.
3. Advanced scarecrows have higher HP and attack power.
4. You can change teams or scarecrow options without exiting the stage.

TEXT_HELP_30201_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Spend a Ticket to battle a random opponent in the Colosseum.
2. Tickets recharge every 2 hours, to a maximum of 5 Tickets.
3. Upon spending a Ticket, you have one hour to play 5 rounds of battle.
4. The Colosseum closes when you reach the time limit, or lose a round.
5. Before each round, you can purchase useful Buffs with Gold.
6. Each round has a time limit of 3 minutes. Particular Hero stats will be buffed for the course of the battle.
7. If the battle does not conclude at the end of 3 minutes, the winner is decided by the total sum of the remaining Heroes' HP.
8. Only Goddesses can accompany a team to the Colosseum. Champions cannot enter.
9. If you win a round, you will earn Meat, Honor, and Victory Points. Obtaining certain amounts of Victory Points will upgrade your Colosseum Tier (Bronze/Silver/Gold/Master) and Rank Reward.
10. Your Colosseum Tier is reset Monday of every week. You will receive a Rank Reward based on your final Colosseum Tier and Rank for the week.
11. The 1st place Colosseum victor will have the statue of their Main Hero placed in town for the following week.1st to 3rd place Colosseum victors will unlock special dialogue with the Goddesses and residents of the town.
12. You can use Honor to change your opponent up to 10 times a day.

TEXT_HELP_30202_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Fight real-time battles with other players.
2. You can choose to either meet a completely random opponent or choose an opponent in the Lobby.
3. Records of wins and losses are reset every Monday.
4. Records are kept only on random Friendly Duels.
5. Only Goddesses can accompany a team to Friendly Duels. Champions cannot enter.

TEXT_HELP_30301_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Earn useful items or recruit Legendary Heroes.
2. Keys are required to enter Dungeons. One Key is recharged every 20 minutes, to a maximum of 15 Keys.
3. Jewels can be used to purchase more Keys.
4. Check out the Dungeon Schedule to see which dungeons open.

TEXT_HELP_30302_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. In the Legendary Hero Dungeons, you can not only recruit Legendary Heroes, but also acquire weapons and other useful items. There are six Legendary Hero Dungeons in total: 
  - Disarm / Black and White / Gravity Labyrinth
  - The Void / Path of Rage / Road to Ruin
2. Legendary Heroes can be recruited through Destiny Points, which are earned through clearing the Dungeon. 
3. If you are lucky, a Legendary Hero may join you right away!
4. Using the Potion of Destiny from the Shop will earn you extra Destiny Points every round.

TEXT_HELP_30303_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Earn various items useful in training your Heroes.
2. Each Dungeon opens on different days of the week. 
  - Chilly Bread Storage (Tuesdays, Saturdays)
  - Goblin's Secret Storage (Sundays)
  - Witch Race (Thursdays)
  - Ancient Trining Grounds (Everyday)
  - Time Acceleration (Sundays)

TEXT_HELP_30304_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Event Dungeons open randomly for a limited time. Check out their schedule through the community and official announcements!
- Rush! Heroid
- Weapon Ordeals
- The Rabbit Hole
- Don't Mess with Fergus!
- Hungry Hungry Fergus
- Draco's Nest

TEXT_HELP_30401_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Raids are real-time cooperative dungeons played by 2 users.
2. Meat is required to enter a Raid.
3. Each Raid Boss is divided into different levels. The stronger the Boss, the better your rewards!

TEXT_HELP_30402_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Fight Apostle Bosses and earn upper tier weapons!
2. There are a total of four Apostle Bosses. Only 1 Apostle Boss Raid is open at a time, changing every week.
3. Each Apostle Boss gives different types of weapons.

TEXT_HELP_30403_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. The 'Ruler of Mana' Raid can only be entered after clearing 'The Void,' 'Path of Rage,' and 'Road to Ruin' Dungeons.
2. 'Ruler of Mana' remains open at all times after unlocking. 
3. Clearing the Raid will reward you Rings and Gold.
4. Each floor of the Raid requires different strategies to clear.
5. If you're having trouble, checking out the Manacar Guide Toon in Menu > Media > Comic Menu may help!

TEXT_HELP_30404_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. This feature is unlocked after clearing Episode 1 of the Kalard Chronicles. 
2. You have the chance of earning Set Sigils upon clearing the raid.
3. The Guardians of the Ruins are resistant to either physical or magical damage.
4. Each Boss Monster will use a powerful skill upon reaching a certain point of its HP. Tap the screen repeatedly to avoid danger!

TEXT_HELP_30501_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Catch fish to increase your Fisher Rank and earn Fish Coins.
2. Increasing your Fisher Rank will unlock better gear and fishing spots.
3. Fish Coins can be traded for various items at the Trading Post.
4. Fishing requires 1 Bait per round.
5. You cannot fish if you do not have any Bait.
6. Your Main Hero will fish. You can change your Main Hero in the Fishing Gear Menu.

TEXT_HELP_30502_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. After you arrive at your chosen fishing spot, touch the Reel button to cast your line and start fishing. 
2. Casting 
- You must first cast your line to start fishing. If you succeed in pressing the button when it reaches the center of the casting gauge, you will have a higher chance of catching bigger fish. 
3. Biting 
-Wait until a fish bites! 
-This process can last up to 60 seconds.
-The higher your Fisher Rank(FR) and Bite Rate are, the faster you'll get a bite. 
4. Pulling
- When you feel a fish bite, touch the Reel button to enter a duel with the fish.
- If you fail to press the button in time, the fish will escape. 
5. Fighting 
- In order to succeed, you must pull in the fish toward the Hero.
- The distance between the Hero and the fish are measured in meters ('m'). If the fish gets 40% farther from the initial distance, it will escape. 
- Press the Reel button to reel in your line. Let go of the button to release your line. 
- Reeling in will also increase the Tension Gauge of your line. 
- If the Tension Gauge reaches its limit, your line will break and the fish will escape. 
6. Tension Gauge 
- The Tension Gauge is divided into three sections, each of a different color. 
- Blue: The line is loose. The fish will get farther away from the Hero. 
- Green: The tension of the line is good. The fish will be pulled toward the Hero. 
- Red: The line is taut. The fish will be pulled toward the Hero more quickly than when the Gauge is at green, but you must be careful not to reach the very end of the Gauge. 
7. Fish Skills 
- Stronger fish sometimes leap out of the water. 
- When the fish leaps out of the water, it generates block board or slide control event. 
- If you are successful at the block or slide event, it will deal great damage to the fish and reel it closer to you. 
- If you fail, you won’t be able to reel for a short amount of time and the fish will pull further away.

TEXT_HELP_30503_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. You can purchase or equip fishing equipment.
2. Once acquired, fishing rods and floats can be permanently used.
3. Bait is an expendable resource and must be purchased to continue fishing.
4. Equipment stats can influence the fishing experience and results. 
-Power: Faster reeling
-Big Fish Chance: Rarer, bigger fish. Impact on auto fishing
-Bite Chance: Higher chance in fish biting your bait
-Bonuses: Additional stats to fishing spots
5. Trade in Fish Coins for various items at the Trading Post.
6. Number of purchases of some items at the Trading Post reset every Monday

TEXT_HELP_30504_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. View lists of fish that can be captured at each fishing spot, your current collection progress, and more information about the fish you have caught.
2. If you capture all fish that can be captured at every fishing spot, you will complete your Fish Collection Album and receive a special reward.
3. The Best Record for every fish is reset once a day.

TEXT_HELP_30505_MAIN_DESC.text:
1. Leave behind your fishing rod and come back after a certain amount of time to collect fish. 
2. In Auto Fishing, you have a higher chance of acquiring items other than fish.
3. Auto Fishing automatically ends when you run out of Bait.
4. You can stop Auto Fishing anytime you choose.
5. Big Fish Chance of equipment gives you a higher chance of catching big fish.

TEXT_HELP_EXP_BUFF.text:
Activation Effect
Earn 100% more Hero EXP through clearing Scenario Mode stages for {0} hours.
 
#Scenario Only#

TEXT_HELP_QUEST_01_DESC.text:
1. The quests are related to the main story of Crusaders Quest.
2. You can try these quests as many times as you want.
3. Once a quest is cleared, it does not appear again.

TEXT_HELP_QUEST_02_DESC.text:
1. You can rank up by clearing the quests that repeatedly show up to acquire Quest Rank (QR) EXP points. 
2. There are benefits to ranking up. 
- Quest clear limit and quest rejection are reset every time you rank up.
- You have better chance to get rare quests. Rare quests have better rewards.
- More quests are displayed by reaching certain rankings.
- Daily quest clear limit is increased at certain rankings.
- The number of quest rejection is increased at certain rankings.
- My ranking icon is upgraded at certain rankings. 
3. Quests will be randomly displayed on the list.
4. There are rankings for quests. Quests that are of higher ranking than your rank will not show up.
5. Quests that are at least 200 rankings below you will not show up.
6. The rarer the quest, the better rewards you can get.
7. There is no limit to accepting quests, however, there is daily clear limit.
8. Once you reject a quest, another quest will be suggested. There is a daily quest rejection limit. (A rejected quest will not show up again.)
9. Tap the quest rank image to check your quest ranking info.

TEXT_HELP_QUEST_03_DESC.text:
1. Quests with a  time window to complete.
-Daily: Resets a certain time daily.
-Weekly: Resets a certain time weekly.
-Limited: Available only during the event period.
2. You do not have to accept these types of quests. You can clear the quests in the Quest menu by meeting the conditions.
3. If you cannot complete a quest in the given time limit, it will be reset or completely disappear.

TEXT_HERO_OFFERING_LEGENDARY_GOAL.text: Send a Promotion Hero for Champion reinforcement.

TEXT_HERO_OFFERING_SUPPORT_GOAL.text: Send a Support Hero for Champion reinforcement.

TEXT_HOTTIME_ALARM_ALL_02.text: A limited-time reward is waiting for you! Login NOW!

TEXT_HOTTIME_ALARM_EVENING_01.text: Good work today, Captain! Login NOW for a gift!

TEXT_HOTTIME_ALARM_EVENING_02.text: Login NOW for a gift and visit your Heroes!

TEXT_HOTTIME_ALARM_LUNCH_01.text: How was your lunch? Here is a gift for dessert!

TEXT_HOTTIME_ALARM_MORNING_01.text: Start your day with CQ! Login NOW for a gift!

TEXT_HOTTIME_ALARM_MORNING_02.text: Your Heroes got you a gift overnight! Login NOW!

TEXT_HOW_TO_FORGE_WEP_MAKE_2.text: Obtainable from Raid, Ancient Dungeon, and Story Mode.

TEXT_HOW_TO_GET_DOC_INFO_DESC.text:
–This Hero can be obtained in the Dungeon.
 
–Each time there will be a different dungeon with a different obtainable Hero.
 
–Go check out the Dungeon and get a new Hero.

TEXT_HOW_TO_GET_DOC_WEAPON_INFO_DESC.text:
– This Weapon can be acquired in the Dungeon.
 
– 1-2 Star Weapons can be acquired on the 3rd Floor.
 
– 2-4 Star Weapons can be acquired on the 8th-13th Floors of the Dungeon.
 
– 2-5 Star Weapons can be acquired on the 18th Floor of the Dungeon.

TEXT_HOW_TO_GET_EVENT_INFO_DESC.text:
Obtained only by participating in an event. Be sure to check the 
in-game notices or the official website for all the
latest news!

TEXT_HOW_TO_GET_EVENT_INFO_WEAPON_DESC.text:
Obtained only by participating in an event. Be sure to check the 
in-game notices or the official website for all the
latest news!

TEXT_HOW_TO_GET_GRADE_UP_INFO_WEAPON_DES.text: Soulbound Weapons can be forged using materials obtained from the Fortress of Souls, unlocked after clearing Deep Sea Stage 1.

TEXT_HOW_TO_GET_WEAPON_CHOOSE_OPTION.text: How to obtain Weapon Option Selection Tickets

TEXT_HOW_TO_GET_WEAPON_CONVERT_RESET.text: How to obtain Random Weapon Option Tickets

TEXT_HOW_TO_GET_WORLDBOSS_WEAPON_INFO_DE.text:
– This Weapon can be acquired from the Raid.
 
– 2-5 Star Weapons can be acquired on the 1st Floor of the Raid.
 
– 3-6 Star Weapons can be acquired on the 2nd Floor of the Raid.
 
– 4-6 Star Weapons can be acquired on the 3rd Floor of the Raid.
 
– 5-6 Star Weapons can be acquired on the 4th Floor of the Raid.

TEXT_INHERIT_BOOK_EPIC_LEVEL_MAX_DESC.text: This hero has already reached maximum level.

TEXT_INHERIT_BOOK_MAX_EPIC_LEVEL_SIMPLE_.text: The hero reached the Maximum Level.

TEXT_INHERIT_BOOK_OVER_10_CHOOSE_SIMPLE_.text: Up to 10 Books of Inheritance can be used at once.

TEXT_INHERIT_BOOK_UNLOCK_DESC.text: Books of Inheritance can be used by heroes who have reached both LV60 and MAX training.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_10_1.text: Oh? You seem energetic as always! Hahaha!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_11_1.text: The folks in this place don't seem so different from us.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_11_2.text: There seem to be others who are in the same boat as us. Or the lack of one.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_12_1.text: I miss my wife and daughter back home…

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_12_2.text: This place reminds me of Eternia…

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_13_1.text: So many curious things!! Ricotta sees them for the first time!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_13_2.text: …Yes… There are many things here completely new to me.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_14_1.text: Dana, Dana, there are so many wonderful things. Ricotta never saw so many, for the first time ever!!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_2_2.text: Cough, cough! Whoa! Thought I was a goner back there! What happened just now?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_3_2.text: Adol, Adol! Where in the world are we?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_4_2.text: Hmm… Adol, it seems that we've been teleported to a place called… Hasla.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_5_2.text: Adol, what is this place…? The Energy Crystal suddenly shone, and…

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_6_1.text: It seems to be a different world from ours.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_7_1.text: Haha… Miss Ricotta, you seem even more excited than when you first arrived at Castaway Village.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_7_2.text: Right! So many things that I have never ever seen, even in books. Lots, too!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_8_1.text: Things got a little more complicated than we had planned, Hummel, but I trust you shall carry out your job as usual.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_8_2.text: Of course. This is also part of the "Transporting" business, after all.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTEREGG_YS8_9_2.text: Yes, thank you for your concern.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_246_1.text: Once a traitor, always a traitor. I have my eye on you.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_246_2.text: Ha, I never did expect a warm welcome.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_247_1.text: The daughter of a Great General... 'Tis a pity she is already betrothed.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_247_2.text: What is that man even riding? What a freak.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_248_1.text: Such illustrious feats even in your blindness... You are truly an honorable soldier, General.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_248_2.text: Nothing is impossible when the eyes of your soul are open.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_249_1.text: A mere dancer darting in and out of the Palace! What would our ancestors say?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_249_2.text: I'm on a very important secret mission, you know!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_250_1.text: Who could have framed me like this? Think, Zahard!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_250_2.text: Achoo! Is someone talking about me?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_251_1.text: On what allegations are you suspecting me a double spy?!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_251_2.text: Kssshhh -... There have been reports that you have been snooping around forbidden material lately...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_252_2.text: No wonder your performance was too good to be true...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_253_1.text:
Hey now, as fellow baldies 
let's not be mean to each other

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_253_2.text: Never shall I allow harm to come to the people of my country!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_254_2.text: Who would have known there are men more evil than hunters of innocent animals...!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_255_1.text: My stage is the WORLD! I go wherever I can find an audience.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_255_2.text: Ooh, a clown! What brings you to this little ol' town?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_256_1.text: Oh, I like blowing apart villages TOO! Let's have some fun TOGETHER, eh, buddy?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_256_2.text:
Your act must have been terribly dull 
if it killed your entire audience.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_257_1.text: The look on people's faces as they realize they have been tricked..! It's the one reason I can't stop doing this!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_257_2.text: I agree - it's the cat's meeooow!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_258_1.text: I'll break away these chains and find my own place in the world!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_259_1.text: Life is lived only freely, as water flows down a stream to the sea.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_259_2.text: Sigh... Although fate seems very intent on intervening with my naps...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_260_1.text: An island full of riches? Tell me where it is!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_260_2.text: I'm not telling... for free, that is.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_261_1.text: I'll hone my skills so no one will be able to laugh at me.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_261_2.text: Hmm... You seem to have the soul of a true warrior.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_262_1.text: Do you know how big of a bounty is on your head? Gosh, I'm gonna be so rich!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_262_2.text: How fortunate... Tyrfing has been starving...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_263_1.text: A mysterious chief researcher of Rapture Science? I'll find out all about you soon!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_263_2.text: Someone has hacked into the database... I'll need to alert the Security Department about this.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_264_1.text: Huh? How can there not be a single picture of your face anywhere?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_264_2.text: Kssshh... It is strictly confidential information.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_265_1.text: A nurse who once fought in the N.D.D... Something smells fishy around here.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_265_2.text: Another emergency shift? I hardly have time to rest!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_266_1.text: A bakery frequently visited by the captain of the Revolutionaries... It must be a secret hideout.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_266_2.text: Mmm, the macarons from Chocolat's Bakery are the best!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_267_1.text: Well... Yeah... I guess you can say that.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_267_2.text: I heard everything, Sister Genevie! Your inner archer awakened in time to save the life of a child!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_267_3.text: You're my hero, Sister Genevie! You're the pride of the Order.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_268_1.text: Okay, now you're starting to scare me.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_268_2.text:
I too have... An experience like that. Where I
woke up to a scene of death and carnage.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_269_1.text: Err, what would a devout nun have to do with a thief, right? Ha ha... ha..

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_269_2.text: Mm? I smell a fellow thief somewhere!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_270_1.text: I'm sure that thief would have fled the scene long ago. If she wasn't such an idiot... Sob.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_270_2.text: I'm tracking down a thief who has hidden in this village, woof! I ask for your cooperation!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_271_1.text: Yawn... Have we met before...? I think I saw you in my dreams once...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_271_2.text: Wait... I know you. You're Marpei from the Training Academy.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_272_1.text: I understand. ... Thank you for being alive.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_272_2.text: My sister and I may not hate you any longer... But I will never forgive you as long as I live.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_273_1.text: Your Majesty... Your Majesty? Ugh, where did he go this time?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_273_2.text: Oh dear. I seem to have made Joan angry again, ha ha.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_274_1.text: Thank you. It is my foremost duty to assist His Majesty.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_274_2.text: You always have my gratitude, Lady Joan.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_275_1.text: I feel a suspicious presence around here...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_275_2.text: Huh, that knight... I should be more careful around her.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_275_3.text: Oh, look, Tia! What a beautiful garden.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_276_1.text: Hrrmph. I still think Hikari is prettier, but I'll admit that the show was okay.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_276_2.text: No way. But I'll admit she comes in second place, AFTER Rachel.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_277_1.text: Oh, not at all! I simply loved your show - as always!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_277_2.text: I apologize for my sister. She can be rather protective...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_278_1.text: What must I do? My heart breaks with every passing moment at the thought of her.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_278_2.text: If you truly love her, you must trust her.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_279_2.text: Hey there little guy! Where did your human go?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_280_3.text: He seems different from the rest of us, woof!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_281_1.text: Haha, be careful not to fall over in your excitement.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_282_1.text: Hohohoho! Build a lavish white garden in the palace grounds at once!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_282_2.text: ... She has changed with becoming empress.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_283_1.text: HEY! No flames around my wooden puppets!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_283_2.text: But I want to play, too!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_284_1.text: Quality over quantity, that's what I always say!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_284_2.text: Ha! Try cooking for more than 300 soldiers every day.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_285_1.text: Hot takoyaki! Round, hot, savory takoyaki!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_285_2.text: Huh, this alley smells like home...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_285_3.text: Look, Sister! It's takoyaki - just like the ones we used to eat!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_286_2.text: Huh...A human or a horse...? You there, would you like a carrot?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_287_2.text: Is this what you call a true horseman?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_287_3.text: Haha, what a strange horse. Isn't that right, Fierce Dragon?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_288_1.text: W-what's this dark presence?! Surely it's an evil spirit!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_288_2.text: Ugh... Going 72 hours without sleep was NOT a good idea...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_289_1.text: Oh, are you the new exchange student from Chen? Let's have lunch together!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_289_2.text: Sorry, but I'm not here to make friends.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_290_1.text: I know that your grades are perfect, Cronette, but maybe you could pay more attention in class.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_290_2.text: Oh, but I already know everything.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_291_1.text: Ksshhh... This fire... cannot be extinguished...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_291_2.text: I-it's saying something, Sir! I-is it a demon, Sir?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_291_3.text: Kee kee kee... Nothing can put out the flames of hell!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_292_1.text: Ksssh... Be careful not to touch the flames on her back... Kssssh....

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_292_2.text: Huh? These flames aren't hot at all, Sir!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_292_3.text: I can control them at will, you see. Cool, huh?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_293_1.text: The Witch of Fire... Ksshhh... I thought she existed only in fairy tales...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_293_2.text: I'll go find the Witch of Water too, Sir!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_293_3.text: Eh? Vesper? What do you need that idiot for? Wait a second, who are you?!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_294_1.text: Hellfire that destroys everything in its path...!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_294_2.text: The essence of Primal Flames, the very core of the Primal Mountain!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_294_3.text: Whatever you guys are up to, I'm having no part of it!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_295_1.text: Neth technology is the BEST IN THE WORRRLDDD!!!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_295_2.text: Something must have happened to his brain during his surgery...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_296_1.text: Oh dear. I wonder if my darling shall approve of these ears.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_296_2.text: Huh?! What are these things on the top of my head?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_296_3.text: I knew bunny ears would become popular! I'm so happy!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_297_2.text: O Sleep Fairy... Please grant me sleep without dreams!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_298_1.text: A true swordsman must know when to draw his blade.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_298_2.text: What are you suggesting there, huh?!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_299_2.text: H-huh? You're not at ALL what I expected.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_299_3.text: Come one, come all! The next show will start soon!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_300_1.text: Oh no! I forgot where I hid my stash of acorns!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_300_2.text: Hahaha, silly squirrel! You need to mark your hiding place. I hid mine under a cloud!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_301_1.text:
Vivian this, Vivian that!
They should know pouring tea isn't that difficult!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_301_2.text: It's a maid's duty to read into her master's needs and provide everything before the order!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_302_3.text: Welcome. It has been some time since a traveler from another world arrived through the portal.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_303_1.text: Ana. Surely you don't expect another magical portal to save your pathetic life?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_303_2.text: Remember, Twillie. I will take your life as easily as from a shriveled flower the moment we return.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_304_1.text: Ah, Balisada! A fine sword, but second to mine.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_304_2.text: What did you say? I will BURN you!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_305_1.text: Oh, if it isn't the great Master Wolfram! How long it has been!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_305_2.text: Cassia... No, Plaga, I should say.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_306_1.text: The crybaby has all grown up! Do you still cry often, little Vesper?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_307_1.text: A new face! Can it be the second Witch of the Forest? The old one must be dead, then.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_307_2.text: What a bother... You will show some respect for my master.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_308_1.text: The wisdom this blade whispers to me...! It is a whole world unveiled before your eyes!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_308_2.text:
This aura...
You're a user of Dark Magic.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_309_1.text: Plaga did warn me about the 'Goddess of the Night'...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_309_2.text: Is she finally awake? Well, then... I must go greet my new pupil.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_310_1.text: I seek a certain Book of Magic... I will make your time worthwhile.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_310_2.text: You speak of Hellad's Book... Kee kee. Follow me.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_311_1.text: Keeping her departed soul chained to a rotting body... An evil genius, indeed!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_311_3.text: I will not give up my Sien, no matter what others may say.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_312_1.text: I see you keep your strength at bay, O True Blade of Evil...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_312_2.text: Hey Balrog, can't you do anything cool like that sword? Huh?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_313_1.text: Explain yourself. What called you to do this to my tribe?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_313_2.text: Trust? Faith? Love? You and your tribe were SO booooring! I needed some FUN!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_314_1.text: And I thought the lineage of the Frost Elves had been lost, long ago.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_314_2.text: We may live in hiding, but we're still alive and well, thanks.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_315_1.text: The icy winds of the North blow about you... Where did you get that strength?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_315_2.text: That strange light... Do you know the source of my powers...?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_316_1.text: Oh dear. I see the... dermatological heritage... is rather strong in our blood.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_316_2.text: Hmm?! How do you know the royal secret?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_317_1.text: You there, Elf! Hands off my lunch!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_317_2.text: Ooh, this is some tree I've never had before... Yum!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_318_1.text: A baby panda...?! How did a child of our tribe end up in her hands?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_318_2.text: Huh? Hey, Pups! He must be a friend of yours!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_319_1.text: Hundreds of years gone by...? But my family... My friends... Everyone...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_319_2.text: I'm still here for you, Heim.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_320_1.text: You were the one who showed us the way to the Sanctuary...! How are you still alive?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_320_2.text: It's not time for my grand finale yet! The show must go on!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_321_1.text: Your wish is my command, Lady Athena.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_321_2.text: How beautifully you have grown, Arachne. I have high expectations for you.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_322_1.text: I only listen to Lady Athena and no other.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_322_2.text: Arachne, was it not? You shall be of great use to me.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_323_1.text: Bwahaha! Do I smell some bling 'round here?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_324_1.text: Ugh. Do NOT need to be reminded of my pauper days.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_324_2.text: Ooh, this bark will be perfect for my afternoon snack!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_325_1.text: I don't think they can, uh, be exactly called 'pilots'...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_325_2.text: Aviation is made possible by the upthrust provided by wing parts A, C, D, and F. Do you require further assistance?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_325_3.text: How do I fly, you ask? All it takes is faith and trust.Oh! And something I forgot: dust. Just a little bit of fairy dust!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_326_1.text: Catching a shark with bare hands...! That is quite a feat, young lady.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_326_2.text: Anything that falls under my radar will be mine sooner or later!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_329_1.text: How much did all these physical upgrades cost you?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_329_2.text: This boy from the Eastern Kingdoms... offered me a secured loan...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_329_3.text: I received subsidies from the government. Being a mad scientist has its perks.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_330_1.text: It doesn't matter what 'type' of fish - only the bigger the better!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_330_2.text: Hoho, young one... Size is only relative within the embrace of nature.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_331_2.text: That idiot Dox... You should recognize your nemesis by now, ahem!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_331_3.text: You're (finally) under arrest! ... Wait a second, you don't smell right...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_332_1.text: I'll never get tired of the glittering of gold! It is the best thing in the world!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_332_2.text: Of course! It's an adventurer's dream to find treasure chests full of gold and jewels!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_333_1.text: Hey there, my friends! Have some gold bars as a token of my friendship!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_333_2.text: Uh, no thanks. You can keep your money - by your own haughty self!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_333_3.text: This is not the Osiris I once knew...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_334_1.text: Please, Professor... No more group projects...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_334_2.text: Ooh, look! A real live college student! I can't wait to start the campus life!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_334_3.text: Hmm, I hear it's hard to get into veterinary schools...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_335_1.text: Silence, you coward! Have you not had a taste of the might of great empires?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_335_2.text: You only shame yourself, Mengqi. You will do better to return.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_335_3.text: Generals, why do we not make peace? There is no need for war.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_336_1.text: A 'shrimp burger'?! A disgrace! This cannot be called a hamburger at all!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_336_2.text: One Chai Burger set coming right up!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_337_1.text: What's this? This stew has no meat!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_337_2.text: Go to the Base Exchange if you wanna complain.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_338_1.text: I have found you at last! The legendary chef of 'the Whiskers of the Red Dragon'!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_338_2.text: Oh, Grandpa, have you been bragging about me to your friends again?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_339_1.text: This fried egg rice! It tastes like rich gold enveloped with the finest silver!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_339_2.text: Oho! A customer who knows his food, all right!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_340_1.text: This 'octopus bread' is better than I thought it would be! Yum, yum...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_340_2.text: You're eating them up so quickly! This is the fastest my hands can go!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_341_2.text: Maybe he just really likes cake.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_342_1.text: Oh, another crow costume just like mine! Hello there, caw!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_343_1.text: Comfortable PJs are a must-have for a good nap!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_343_2.text: And so is your favorite Mr. Teddy Bear!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_343_3.text: A glass of warm milk always helps, too!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_344_1.text: Ain't no better music for the soul than hip hop, YO!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_344_2.text: This era is meant for the melodies of PUNK ROCK!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_344_3.text: Um, do either of you like K-pop by any chance? My newest song just came out!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_345_1.text: Go out and see the world, ladies! There's a lot waiting for you there!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_345_2.text: L-Lady Schula?! I-I-I - I admire you very much..!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_345_3.text: Ooh, hello Lady Schula! It's been some time since I last saw you!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_346_1.text: Tsk, tsk... When you said you had an 'appointment,' this is not what I expected, milord.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_346_2.text: M-Master Schula...! I- This is not what you think it is!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_347_1.text: Fresh flowers, woof! Fresh flowers picked from the garden!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_347_3.text: Gasp! How did you grow these cherry blossoms in this season?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_348_2.text: Hmmph. White lilies are the fairest of them all. Wouldn't you say so, Twilly?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_348_3.text: How about tulips, Anna? Does it not remind you of better days - such as the day of your defeat, for example?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_349_1.text: T-that teddy bear... looks really soft...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_349_2.text: So does your bunny! Do you want to trade for a bit?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_350_2.text: (Oh no...! I forgot all about my shift...!)

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_350_3.text: Who cleaned the decks this morning?! You call this a clean deck?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_351_1.text:
Treasure Pumpkin Patch or bust!
Charge!!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_351_2.text: Are you perchance… in Vesper's team?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_351_3.text:
I'll just let you guys duke it out,
My popcorn is ready.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_352_1.text: Really, you three... Wasting your energy on such a trivial title...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_352_2.text: Hrrmph! Don't cry when we don't let you join next time!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_353_1.text: Really, you three... Wasting your energy on such a trivial title...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_353_2.text: Oh dear, don't be so angry, Arita. You'll grow old before your time.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_354_1.text: Really, you three... Wasting your energy on such a trivial title...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_354_2.text: Hmm, I would say I acted only as a leader should: try to win and clean up the whole mess.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_355_1.text: The best part of fishing... is the waiting.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_356_1.text: Hmm, this must be quite a big catch...

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_356_2.text: Ouchie! What's this hook doing here?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_357_1.text: Spade Queen! I will definitely win next time!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_358_1.text: My luck can't just be used for that!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_358_2.text: You there. I got a job for us.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_359_1.text: Hmph, how long are you going to keep that image up?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_359_2.text: A new idol! Let's work hard together!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_360_1.text: Enemy spotted! Let's add you to my wealth of popularity!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_361_1.text: Sorry for the wait~ number one idol Yuna enters the stage!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_361_2.text: Oho~ so that's what it means?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_362_1.text: Be careful. Of me. You don't want to cross me.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_362_2.text: Victoria is for me, and only me!

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_363_1.text: Don't you think that person had as much luck as I did?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_363_2.text: Do you believe in the Clover?

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_364_1.text: Treasure hunting is nice, but I have a different goal in mind.

TEXT_INTERACTION_EASTER_EGG_364_2.text: I…we would be so rich if you became a treasure hunter with me!

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_02.text: I apologize as the captain of the ship.

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_03.text: I could do with more supplies, but this should be enough.

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_04.text: I'll try my best to heal the wounds.

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_05.text: This would be child's play to our blacksmith back home.

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_06.text: Some fugitives have histories that cannot be so simply told, my red-haired friend.

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_07.text: (Shipwrecked as soon as I set out… I'm the wreck.)

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_08.text: (Let's think of this as a new beginning!)

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_09.text: (We should go search the opposite side of the island now…)

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_10.text: (The Castaway Village has become quite crowded.)

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_11.text: (We should be able to escape as soon as we finish preparing the boat.)

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_12.text: (This won't be easy… But at least we have hope.)

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_13.text: (The construction of the ship seems well underway.)

TEXT_INTERACTION_LOBBY_YS8_14.text: (Great! It's time to leave this island!)

TEXT_ITEM_ADDSTATITEM_HELP.text: Obtain random berry of a certain grade.

TEXT_ITEM_BREAD_HELP.text: Obtain random bread of a certain grade.

TEXT_ITEM_BUFFITEM_HELP.text: A mysterious potion that comes in different flavors. Each type of potion increases particular stats for one round.

TEXT_ITEM_CHOICE_COSTUME_HELP.text: A contract that allows you to get a skin of your choice.

TEXT_ITEM_CHOICE_HERO_HELP.text: A contract that allows you to recruit a Hero of your choice.

TEXT_ITEM_CHOICE_WEAPON_HELP.text: A contract that allows you to get a weapon of your choice.

TEXT_ITEM_COLLECTEVENT_HELP.text: A collection item that can only be obtained in limited periods. It can be traded for other event rewards.

TEXT_ITEM_COSTUME_HELP.text: Upgrade your Heroes' looks and earn bonus stats.

TEXT_ITEM_CRYSTAL_HELP.text: Crystals that highly emit the power of Souls. Used to forge ★6 Soulbound Weapons.

TEXT_ITEM_DECORATION_HELP.text: An item that can be put in your Hero Home.

TEXT_ITEM_DUNGEONKEY_HELP.text: A key needed to enter Dungeons. Every Dungeon requires a different number of keys to enter.

TEXT_ITEM_ESSENCE_FLAMES_HELP.text: Essence containing the pure energy of Primal Flames. Used for converting Ring ranks and options.

TEXT_ITEM_ESSENCE_HELP.text: Essence containing the pure energy of Mana. Used for converting Ring options.

TEXT_ITEM_EXP_BUFF_HELP.text: Heroes will receive more EXP from playing Scenario Mode during the allotted time.

TEXT_ITEM_GACHA_HERO_HELP.text: Sign a contract to recruit a Hero.

TEXT_ITEM_GACHA_WEAPON_HELP.text: An elaborately adorned chest holding top quality weapons and other items.

TEXT_ITEM_GOLD_HELP.text: A gold coin. Widely used throughout the continent of Hasla.

TEXT_ITEM_HEART_HELP.text: Food needed for Heroes starting out on an adventure. Different locations require different amounts of Meat.

TEXT_ITEM_HERO_HELP.text: Bosses have a set chance to join you as a comrade.

TEXT_ITEM_HONOR_HELP.text: A badge that proves your honor. They can be used to perform Hero-related tasks.

TEXT_ITEM_IRON_HELP.text: Durable material used to forge Soulbound Weapons.

TEXT_ITEM_JEWEL_HELP.text: A finely crafted jewel. It's quite valuable, so use them wisely.

TEXT_ITEM_MAP_HELP.text: Can be used to speed up and instantly finish explorations.

TEXT_ITEM_PIECE_HELP.text: Crystal shards that radiate the power of Souls. Used to forge ★5 Soulbound Weapons.

TEXT_ITEM_POINT_HELP.text: Points that you receive upon making a valuable purchase. They are extremely precious, and can be used to buy rare treasure from the Shop or perform important tasks.

TEXT_ITEM_POWDER_HELP.text: Crystal powder that faintly give off the power of Souls. Used to forge ★4 Soulbound Weapons.

TEXT_ITEM_RING_HELP.text: Obtain a random Ring of a certain grade with a specific Main Option.

TEXT_ITEM_TICKET_HELP.text: A ticket needed to enter the Colosseum.

TEXT_ITEM_TICKET_KURENAI_HELP.text: A tile engraved with a red lotus. Used to enter the Legend of Primal Flames dungeons.

TEXT_ITEM_WALL_HELP.text: A background that can be put in your Hero Home.

TEXT_ITEM_WEAPON_CARVING_COUPON_HELP.text: A coupon secretly issued by a certain blacksmith. Trade in a certain number to ensure two slots on a Soulbound Weapon.

TEXT_ITEM_WEAPON_CHANGE_OPTION_COUPON_HE.text: A coupon secretly issued by a certain blacksmith. Use it to change one general option of a Soulbound Weapon to one of your choice.

TEXT_ITEM_WEAPON_HELP.text: Obtain a random Normal Weapon of a certain grade for a specific class.

TEXT_ITEM_WEAPON_RESET_COUPON_HELP.text: A coupon issued by Fergus. Use it to randomly change the general options of a Soulbound Weapon.

TEXT_KURENAIHIDDEN_BAD_DESC.text:
With one flame the body, with another the mind.
And should even one's fate burn into ashes...

TEXT_MAIN_Q_S2_23_TITLE.text: The Good, the Bad, and the Weird Ratmen

TEXT_MANSION_BOTTOM_BEDBENCH_01_DESC.text: A bedside table that possesses both beauty and utility, and can be used for various purposes. The perfect surface for putting all your bedtime reading.

TEXT_MANSION_BOTTOM_BED_01_DESC.text: A large bed made especially for mansions and estates. With its luxurious drapes and classy canopy, you can be sure you'll get your beauty sleep with style.

TEXT_MANSION_BOTTOM_CHAIR_01_DESC.text: A grandiose sitting chair of red cloth and golden furnishings. Experience the royal life!

TEXT_MANSION_BOTTOM_CLOCK_01_DESC.text: A grandfather clock made out of the finest oak.

TEXT_MANSION_BOTTOM_COLUMN_01_DESC.text: A beautifully crafted column with golden furnishings.

TEXT_MANSION_BOTTOM_DESK_01_DESC.text: A round table covered with a snow-white tablecloth.

TEXT_MANSION_BOTTOM_ENTRANCE_01_DESC.text: The entrance to a mansion. It is kept spick and span by a diligent maid of the household.

TEXT_MANSION_CENTER_PICTURE_01_DESC.text: A frame of a still-life of fruits.

TEXT_MANSION_CENTER_WINDOW_01_DESC.text: The large window of a mansion. Comes adorned with white and crimson curtains.

TEXT_MANSION_TOP_ARCH_01_DESC.text: A decorative arch adorned with golden engravings. A perfect addition to any room.

TEXT_MANSION_TOP_CHANDELIER_01_DESC.text: An elegant chandelier that will immerse any room in radiant beauty.

TEXT_MEAT_PACK_CONTENT.text: Here is your reward for purchasing the Meat Party Pack.

TEXT_MEAT_PACK_DESC.text:
Meat and Gold Galore!
Limited to 3 per Account

TEXT_MESSAGE_DESC.text: Your Mailbox holds up to 300 mail at a time.

TEXT_MONUMENT_17_DESC.text: A gift from the fish freed by the merciful hands of Seiren. Caring for corals seems to be a new trend among fish.

TEXT_MONUMENT_18_DESC.text: Fishernyan's younger brother. Came all the way to Hasla following the footsteps of his brother.

TEXT_MONUMENT_19_DESC.text: A harpoon Fishernyan gave to the Crusaders as a token of appreciation. He used to fish with this all the time.

TEXT_MONUMENT_AF_01_DESC.text: An egg taken from a Draco nest. It was the only real one, the others mere imitations placed to fool a thief's preying hand.

TEXT_MONUMENT_AF_02_DESC.text: A newborn Draco that recently hatched from its egg. It seems to think of you and your company as family.

TEXT_MONUMENT_AF_03_DESC.text: A baby Draco. It needs a lot of daily exercise as its wings are growing quite rapidly. Who'd have ever thought that the little fellow would become such a dear addition to your team?

TEXT_MONUMENT_WORLDCUP_01_DESC.text: The legendary shoes bestowed to the fabled "One with the Blessed Feet," said to kick any ball in a perfect arch.

TEXT_MON_PATTERN_SHADOWDEVIL_CONFUSE_HEA.text: Damage Immunity/HP Heal, Canceled upon activating Goddess skill

TEXT_MON_PATTERN_SHADOWDEVIL_FINAL_ATK_U.text: Atk Pwr Increase, additional Increase per a Mark of the Demon

TEXT_NOFISHCOIN_DESC.text: You do not have enough Fish Coin.

clearing Holy City (Hard) Stage 3-8.

TEXT_NOTYET_CHALLENGE.text: Challenge Mode is unlocked only after clearing all stages of the Kalard Chronicles episode.

TEXT_NOTYET_EXPLORE.text:
Can be used after clearing 
Volcano Stage 1.

TEXT_NOTYET_GUARDIANOFRUINS.text: You must complete all stages of Episode 1 of the Kalard Chronicles to enter.

TEXT_NOTYET_MANACAR.text: You need to clear all stages of Dungeons: 'Road to the Void,' 'Road of Fury,' and 'Road to Ruin' before you enter.

TEXT_NOTYET_SOUL.text:
Can be used after clearing 
Deep Sea Stage 1.

TEXT_NPC_FISHERCAT_DESC.text: A fishing cat who lives on a deserted island in the middle of the ocean. He has traveled all the way to Hasla in order to spread the joys of fishing.

TEXT_PATTERN_CHALLENGE_ANCIENREGIME_DESC.text: 1-Chain Ally Debuff, 2-Chain Ally Damage, 3-Chain Enemy Damage

TEXT_PATTERN_CHALLENGE_BOMB_SUBDESC.text: Neutral damage if bomb is not used

TEXT_PATTERN_CHALLENGE_DEBUFF_DESC.text: Attack pattern changes if not cancelled

TEXT_PATTERN_CHALLENGE_RESIDUALLION_DESC.text: Use Goddess skill to become invincible for 5s

TEXT_PRACTICE_DUMMY_GOLD_NOTYET.text:
Can be used after clearing 
Volcano Stage 24.

TEXT_PRACTICE_DUMMY_SILVER_NOTYET.text:
Can be used after clearing 
Deep Sea Stage 12.

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_ANTIQUE_HELP.text: A chest holding a random Old Weapon.

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_CARVESTONE_SET_LOW_HELP.text: A box from which you can get one of the set Sigils of the Temple of Illusions.

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_GOLD_POCKET_HELP.text: A lucky bag holding a random amount of Gold.

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_KURENAI_WEEKLY_REWARD_HEL.text: A chest that may hold a Ring of Primal Flames, Essence of Mana, or Essence of Primal Flames.

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_RING_GRADE_5_HELP.text: A chest holding a random ★5 Ring.

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_RING_HELP.text: A chest holding a random Ring.

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_RING_KURENAI_HELP.text: A chest holding a random Ring of Primal Flames.

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_WARGAME_REWARD_CENTER _01.text: A reward for the team that occupied a Treasure Pumpkin Patch

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_WARGAME_REWARD_CENTER_MAI.text: You have received a reward for occupying a Treasure Pumpkin Patch!

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_WARGAME_REWARD_SPECIAL _H.text: A reward for the team that occupied a Magical Pumpkin Patch

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_WARGAME_REWARD_SPECIAL_MA.text: You have received a reward for occupying a Magical Pumpkin Patch!

TEXT_RANDOMBOX_WITCH_HELP.text: A chest holding various useful items, delivered straight from Pumpkin City.

TEXT_RANDOM_AF_HELP.text: A chest made in the shape of an egg, seemingly for a special event.

TEXT_RANDOM_CARVESTONE_HELP.text: Appraise to receive a random general Sigil.

TEXT_RANDOM_CHEN_REWARD_NAME.text: Champion Supply Chest: Eastern Kingdom - Chen

TEXT_RANDOM_DOMAIN_REWARD_HELP.text: A chest rewarded for sending extra reinforcements to factions. It seems to hold a variety of rare and valuable items.

TEXT_RANDOM_EAST_REWARD_NAME.text: Champion Supply Chest: Eastern Kingdom - Ryu

TEXT_RANDOM_FREE_REWARD_NAME.text: Champion Supply Chest: Heroes of Freedom

TEXT_RANDOM_GODDESS_REWARD_NAME.text: Champion Supply Chest: Order of the Goddess

TEXT_RANDOM_HAN_REWARD_NAME.text: Champion Supply Chest: Eastern Kingdom - Han

TEXT_RANDOM_INHERITBOOK_HELP.text: Appraise to receive a Book of Inheritance for a random class.

TEXT_RANDOM_LEGENDARY_WEAPON_6_GRADE_HEL.text: A chest holding a random ★6 Soulbound Weapon.

TEXT_RANDOM_MINO_REWARD_NAME.text: Champion Supply Chest: Minor Tribes' Confederation

TEXT_RARE_3G_STONE_1_DESC.text: Georgia's mineral tattoo that she had on her back. It's shaped like the scythe of a reaper.

TEXT_RARE_3G_STONE_2_DESC.text: Gujarat's magnifying glass that he used to aim his shots. It seems to be a product of the Neth Empire.

TEXT_RARE_ACCURACY_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Accuracy of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_ATK_POWER_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Attack Power of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_BOUILLABAISSE_STONE_1_DESC.text: The core of the machine Bouillabaisse used to increase his acceleration force.

TEXT_RARE_CRIT_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_CRIT_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Chance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Evasion of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_DOMPERIGNON_STONE_1_DESC.text: A fragment of "humanity." Holding it in your hand evokes many emotions: happiness, guilt, sorrow, despair, rage, death…

TEXT_RARE_GG_STONE_1_DESC.text: The controlstone that Georg and Geralt used to regulate their synchronization level. The default amount is 30%.

TEXT_RARE_GG_STONE_2_DESC.text: Georg's necklace. On it are engraved the words 'Best friends forever, GG.'

TEXT_RARE_LEESIN_STONE_1_DESC.text: Ratoichi's eyepatch, which he began to wear after he lost his sight to the filth of the sewers.

TEXT_RARE_LEESIN_STONE_2_DESC.text: The belongings of the Warrat who taught Ratoichi all that he knew. It helped to control his senses, which perceived a single drop of water as loudly as thunder.

TEXT_RARE_MATAHARI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A mark that Matahari held in her possession. It is given to the Musketeers of Trista.

TEXT_RARE_MAX_HP_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Maximum HP of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_PENETRATE_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_PENETRATE_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_RECEIVE_DMG_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Damage Reduction rate of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_1_DESC.text: A liquid found running through Narmer's joints. It regularly glows.

TEXT_RARE_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_2_DESC.text: A levitating stone bearing the wear of time. It still weakly floats above your hand.

TEXT_RARE_SET_EP1_HEAL_1_DESC.text:
Heals ally HP by 1000 per second
(This effect cannot be stacked.)

TEXT_RARE_SET_EP1_HEAL_2_DESC.text:
Entire team's Armor and Resistance +150
(This effect cannot be stacked.)

TEXT_RARE_SET_HEAL_STONE_1_DESC.text: Machinery found in Khasekhemwy's core. The light at its center cannot be quenched.

TEXT_RARE_SET_HEAL_STONE_2_DESC.text: The crown from Banoub's head. Shattered yet still beautiful in its pride.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAGIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: A shard emanating blue light. Holding it in your hand, you are vaguely comforted.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAGIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: A blade found within Narmer's tail. You probably shouldn't run around while holding it.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: A shard emanating red light. It makes you rather anxious...

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: A fractured rock that used to be a part of Khasekhemwy. You can feel a mysterious power within.

TEXT_RARE_SHADOWDEVILFINAL_STONE_1_DESC.text: The core of power that the Hybrid Shadowdemon had been holding.

TEXT_RARE_SHADOWDEVILFINAL_STONE_2_DESC.text: A shrunken head decoration piece that belonged to the Order of the Shadow Rose. You can observe veins and nerves entwined within it. Curiously enough, this head is still "connected" to its body.

TEXT_RARE_SHADOWDEVILFINAL_STONE_3_DESC.text: A solidified fragment of "shadow." If not properly dealt with, it attempts to enter the beholder's mind and body.

TEXT_REACH_6GRADE_MAXLV_MESSAGE_TITLE.text: Reward for reaching maximum level of 6-star hero. (Supply hero)

TEXT_REACH_6GRADE_MAXLV_POPUP_DESC.text: A 3-Star Supply Hero has been delivered to your Mailbox.

TEXT_REPEAT_WORLDBOSS1_TITLE.text: Investigating the Entrance to the Temple of Illusions

TEXT_REWARD_S2_WORLDBOSS1_REPEAT.text: Great job! I would love to have your help again.

TEXT_RQ_E_164_1_TITLE.text: The Third of the Four Heavenly Kings 2

TEXT_RQ_E_197_1_TITLE.text: The Strongest of the Four Heavenly Kings 2
