TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_4_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Mark of Mana' is increased by 3 seconds. The marked enemy's evasion decreases by additional 20% and the enemy receives additional 30% damage from Genevie.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_4_23_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Bleeding' attack power +100%, duration +2 seconds 
(Passive Added) If the enemy is above a certain distance from the ground, Panpan shoots 2 shafts of 'Heaven's Bamboo Rain' that deal magical damage equal to 300% of his attack power. If multiple enemies meet this condition, Panpan attacks only the rearmost enemy. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_4_24_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Arachne's 'baby spiders' ignore enemy effects of receiving all damage dealt to their party.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_5_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Mark of Mana' is increased by 3 seconds. The marked enemy's evasion decreases by additional 20% and the enemy receives additional 30% damage from Genevie.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_5_23_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Bleeding' attack power +100%, duration +2 seconds 
(Passive Added) If the enemy is above a certain distance from the ground, Panpan shoots 2 shafts of 'Heaven's Bamboo Rain' that deal magical damage equal to 300% of his attack power. If multiple enemies meet this condition, Panpan attacks only the rearmost enemy. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_5_24_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Arachne's 'baby spiders' ignore enemy effects of receiving all damage dealt to their party.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_22_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Mark of Mana' is increased by 3 seconds. The marked enemy's evasion decreases by additional 20% and the enemy receives additional 30% damage from Genevie.
(Passive Added) If a marked enemy receives 3 hits by 'Chaser's Arrow', she shoots 'Chaser's Arrowstorm' that deals widespread magical damage equal to 2000% of Genevie's attack power. 'Chaser's Arrowstorm' decreases the subject's armor and resistance by 50% for 8 seconds, and dispels all buffs. (Cooltime: 1 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_23_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Bleeding' attack power +200%, duration +3 seconds, heal debuff +50%
(Passive Added) If the enemy is above a certain distance from the ground, Panpan shoots 5 shafts of 'Heaven's Bamboo Rain' that deal magical damage equal to 500% of his attack power and stun hit enemies. If multiple enemies meet this condition, Panpan attacks only the rearmost enemy. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_24_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) Arachne's 'baby spiders' ignore enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies.
(Passive Added) If a 'baby spider' accurately deals a hit, Arachne summons a 'Tarantula' that deals physical damage equal to 500% of Arachne's attack power, giving the target enemy a 'spider bite.' Arachne additionally recovers HP equal to 50% of the damage dealt by the 'Tarantula.' If the enemy is under the effect of a debuff, the 'Tarantula' deals additional damage equal to 500% of Arachne's attack power. If the 'Tarantula' accurately deals a hit, Arachne generates 1 block of her own. The 'Tarantula' ignores enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_4_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Enemy Detection Beam' deals twice the damage.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_4_24_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon activating his block skill, Jet's accuracy increases by 15% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_5_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Enemy Detection Beam' deals twice the damage.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_5_24_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon activating his block skill, Jet's accuracy increases by 15% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_6_22_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Enemy Detection Beam' deals twice the damage.
 (Passive Added) Upon the termination of 'Optical Mark,' Zahard uses 'Crimson Satellite Beam' to deal magical damage equal to 1750% of his attack power.(Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_6_24_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon activating his block skill, Jet's accuracy increases by 30% for 5 seconds. If the enemy hit by Jet's block skill is receiving the damage for their party, Jet reloads his gun to fire 4 shots of neutral damage equal to 500% of his attack power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_4_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) When Mengqi's HP is above 50%, his armor and resistance are increased by 300.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_4_23_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) Enemies affected by 'Land of Ice and Snow' receive an additional evasion debuff of 10%. 
(Upon Activating Passive) Heim charges 1 'Shard of the Guardian' (up to a maximum of 2). 
(Passive Added) Upon charging 2 'Shards of the Guardian,' Heim uses 'Guardian Strike' to deal magical damage equal to 900% of his attack power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_4_24_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Passive effect is upgraded and increases the allies' attack by 30% and movement speed by 5%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_5_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) When Mengqi's HP is above 50%, his armor and resistance are increased by 300.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_5_23_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) Enemies affected by 'Land of Ice and Snow' receive an additional evasion debuff of 10%. 
(Upon Activating Passive) Heim charges 1 'Shard of the Guardian' (up to a maximum of 2). 
(Passive Added) Upon charging 2 'Shards of the Guardian,' Heim uses 'Guardian Strike' to deal magical damage equal to 900% of his attack power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_5_24_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Passive effect is upgraded and increases the allies' attack by 30% and movement speed by 5%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_6_22_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) When Mengqi's HP is above 50%, his armor and resistance are increased by 300. Additionally, he is not stunned upon activating 'Fierce Dragon Charge.' Upon using a 3-chain, Mengqi automatically generates 1 block each for other allies.
 (Passive Added) At the end of his 'Fierce Dragon Charge,' Mengqi uses 'Fierce Dragon of the Heavens' to deal physical damage equal to 1500% of his attack power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_6_23_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) Enemies affected by 'Land of Ice and Snow' receive an additional evasion debuff of 20%. 
(Upon Activating Passive) Heim charges 1 'Shard of the Guardian' (up to a maximum of 2). 
(Passive Added) Upon charging 2 'Shards of the Guardian,' Heim uses 'Guardian Strike' to deal magical damage equal to 1800% of his attack power. After the attack, a fierce blizzard rages for 2 seconds, dealing magical damage equal to 500% of Heim's resistance per 0.1 second. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_6_24_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) Passive effect is upgraded to increase the allies' attack by 50% and movement speed by 30%.
(Passive Added) Upon activating her passive, Yuna uses 'Yuna Cosmic Power, Make Up!' and changes her appearance for 20 seconds. (Cooltime: 20 seconds)
During 'Yuna Cosmic Power, Make Up!,' Yuna receives 25% reduced damage. Additionally, when using her own block during the transformation, she runs toward the enemies in the front and wields her 'Splash Star-Hammer' to deal physical damage equal to 500% of her resistance. 
(Passive added) If the 'Splash Star-Hammer' attack lands successfully, she uses 'Splash Star-Beam,' which deals physical damage equal to 900% of her resistance to all enemies in behind the target. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)
(Passive added) At the end of 'Yuna Cosmic Power, Make Up!', 'Grand Finale' is activated and deals physical damage equal to 3000% of Yuna's resistance.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_4_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Terminal Activation!' Mode is increased by 2 seconds. 'Terminal Activation' additionally increases the allies' critical damage by 20% and accuracy by 10%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_4_23_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Frigid Heart' absorbs twice more damage.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_4_24_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Passive activation condition is changed to using two of his own blocks.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_5_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Terminal Activation!' Mode is increased by 2 seconds. 'Terminal Activation' additionally increases the allies' critical damage by 20% and accuracy by 10%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_5_23_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Frigid Heart' absorbs twice more damage.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_5_24_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Passive activation condition is changed to using two of his own blocks.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_6_22_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Terminal Activation!' Mode is increased by 3 seconds. 'Terminal Activation' additionally increases the allies' critical damage by 30% and accuracy by 20%.
(Passive Added) If another ally uses their Special Skill during 'Terminal Activation!' Mode, Cronette increases the entire team's armor penetration and resistance penetration by 600 for 8 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_6_23_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Frigid Heart' absorbs twice more damage.
(Passive Enhanced) 'Frigid Heart' reduces damage by an additional 10%.
(Passive Added) Upon breaking, 'Frigid Heart' deals magical damage equal to 100% of Vernil's attack power to all enemies, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_6_24_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) Passive activation condition is changed to using two of his own blocks.
(Passive Altered) Upon activating his passive, 3 leader blocks are generated unless Ricky is the leader. (Cooltime: 2 sec) 
(Passive Added) Upon activating passive, 'JOKER' is activated which increases all allies' accuracy and critical chance to 100% for 4 seconds.  (Cooltime: 6 sec)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_CHA_4_22_DESC.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) The balloon's damage is increased by 100%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_CHA_4_24_DESC.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) 'Glacial Sphere' lasts 2 more seconds, and deals additional damage equal to 100% of Lakias's attack power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_CHA_5_22_DESC.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) The balloon's damage is increased by 100%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_CHA_5_24_DESC.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) 'Glacial Sphere' lasts 2 more seconds, and deals additional damage equal to 100% of Lakias's attack power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_CHA_6_22_DESC.text: (Block Skill enhanced) Loki's balloon deals 100% more damage with each bounce. (Passive Added) When his balloon deals 7 hits, Loki summons a 'Jack-in-the-Box' that deals magical damage equal to 500% of his attack power for 4 times.(Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_CHA_6_24_DESC.text:
(Block Skill Enhanced) 'Glacial Sphere' lasts 2 more seconds, and deals additional damage equal to 100% of Lakias's attack power.
 (Passive Added) All 'Glacial Sphere' activated by 'Swift Enchantment' are changed to 'Icy Blizzard.' 'Icy Blizzard' deals magical damage equal to 600% of Lakias's attack power for 3 seconds, and slightly pulls in all enemies. 3 seconds after the attack, Lakias summons 'icy pillars' over the area that deal magical damage equal to 1500% of her attack power and knock enemies into the air. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_SPR_ANNA_4_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Ana's critical chance is increased by 15% during 'Firearm Control,' and 25% during 'Enhanced Firearm Control.'

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_SPR_ANNA_5_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Ana's critical chance is increased by 15% during 'Firearm Control,' and 25% during 'Enhanced Firearm Control.'

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_SPR_ANNA_6_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) Ana's critical chance is increased by 15% during 'Firearm Control,' and 25% during 'Enhanced Firearm Control.'
(Passive Added) If Ana uses her own block during 'Enhanced Firearm Control,' she enters 'Battlefield Control' mode. Additionally, the duration of this mode is increased by 2 seconds. During 'Battlefield Control,' Ana's critical chance increases by 25% and armor penetration by 75%. She also uses 'Gatling Musket' to deal physical damage equal to 800% of her attack power per 1 second.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_CHA_4_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Blade Draw' is increased by 1 second. 'Blade Draw' additionally increases armor penetration by 100 and critical damage by 30%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_CHA_4_24_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Ecstasy' is enhanced to increase Cassia and Plaga's attack power by 10%, critical damage by 20%, and resistance penetration by 150.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_CHA_5_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Blade Draw' is increased by 1 second. 'Blade Draw' additionally increases armor penetration by 100 and critical damage by 30%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_CHA_5_24_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Ecstasy' is enhanced to increase Cassia and Plaga's attack power by 10%, critical damage by 20%, and resistance penetration by 150.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_CHA_6_22_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Blade Draw' is increased by 2 seconds. 'Blade Draw' additionally increases armor penetration by 100 and critical damage by 30%.
(Passive Added) Upon activating 'Blade Draw' or 'Blade Gleam' 3 times, Izuna charges forward and uses 'Dance of the Blade' to deal physical damage equal to 2000% of her attack power over 5 hits. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_CHA_6_24_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Ecstasy' is enhanced to increase Cassia and Plaga's attack power by 10%, critical damage by 20%, and resistance penetration by 150.
(Passive Altered) During Plaga's manifestation, Cassia and Plaga's passive skill changes to 'Soul Harvest.' 
(Passive Added) Upon activating 'Cursed Blade,' Plaga becomes manifest for 20 seconds, enhancing 'ecstasy' to maximum capacity and adding an additional hit to 'Malevolent Blade.' Additionally, all blocks used during Plaga's manifestation are activated with the power of a 3-chain, and Cassia and Plaga use 'Soul Harvest' every 3 blocks. 'Soul Harvest' deals magical damage equal to 1500% of Cassia and Plaga's attack power, and decreases enemy resistance by 30% for 5 seconds. (Plaga Manifestation Cooltime: 23 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_SPR_TWILLY_4_DESC.text: Upon using another ally's 1- or 2-chain, Twillie responds by using her own 1- or 2-chain, respectively.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_SPR_TWILLY_5_DESC.text: Upon using another ally's 1- or 2-chain, Twillie responds by using her own 1- or 2-chain, respectively.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_SPR_TWILLY_6_DESC.text: Upon using another ally's 1- or 2-chain, Twillie responds by using her own 1- or 2-chain, respectively. If she is in 'Earth Shaker' mode, she also receives all damage targeted at the entire party. Additionally, her normal attack, 'Strike of Faith,' and 'Last Stand' are enhanced to each deal 30% more damage over a wider range.

TEXT_WR_BLIND_GUIDE_BOX.text:
Darkness lowers your accuracy by 50%
This effect can be removed by using a flash grenade.

TEXT_WR_BLIND_GUIDE_BOX_2.text:
Also the flash grenade deals damage with intense light.
Use it carefully and burn up enemies!

TEXT_WR_BLIND_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
It is as I expected.
Wait with patience.

TEXT_WR_BLIND_SIS_FOREST.text:
Use flash grenades
to light up the darkness.

TEXT_WR_BOMB_CHANGE_SKILL_BELLA.text:
You can change your Special Skills in this place.
Choose wisely!

TEXT_WR_BOMB_CHARGE_SIS_FOREST.text:
Using a Monster Bomb
will make the battle easier.

TEXT_WR_BOMB_EMPTY_SIS_FOREST.text:
We’ve run out of Bombs.
I'll get more.

TEXT_WR_BOMB_GUIDE_BOX.text: Try using a Monster Bomb block.

TEXT_WR_EP1_WORLDBOSS_TOUCHSKILL_CAMILLA.text:
...! T-this is...!
We're in danger. RUN!!

It looks very dangerous.
We need to stop it before it's too late!

TEXT_WR_EP1_WORLDBOSS_TOUCHSKILL_DJER.text:
Snap out of it!
I'll help you - let's go!

TEXT_WR_EP1_WORLDBOSS_TOUCHSKILL_KHASEKH.text:
One hit will shatter us like dust.
I'll hold it back - get behind me!

Snap out of it!! This is our chance!
I'll help you - let's go!

TEXT_WR_EP1_WORLDBOSS_TOUCHSKILL_NARMER.text:
Get up NOW!!
I'll hold it back - get behind me!

TEXT_WR_FLARE_RECHARGE_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
Are there no more grenades left?
Well, here are more. Use them wisely.

TEXT_WR_FLARE_RECHARGE_SIS_FOREST.text:
I have recharged
the flash grenades!

TEXT_WR_FLARE_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
We can see the Ratmen
more clearly now.

TEXT_WR_FLARE_SIS_FOREST.text:
Defeat the enemy
while it's still bright!

TEXT_WR_GAUGE_MAX_MONSTER_1.text:
What is this ruckus?
You are under arrest!

TEXT_WR_GAUGE_MAX_MONSTER_1_COUNT5.text:
Surround the enemy
and prepare for total annihilation!

TEXT_WR_GAUGE_MAX_SIS_FOREST.text:
Oh no! We made
too much noise!

TEXT_WR_GAUGE_MAX_SIS_FOREST_COUNT5.text:
The battle has gone on for too long.
We can't hold back any longer…

TEXT_WR_GAUGE_SIS_FOREST.text:
Be quiet when 
you attack them.

TEXT_WR_GAUGE_START_ROCHEFORT.text:
Take care of it
as quietly as possible.

TEXT_WR_MANA_BLOCK_1_GUIDE_BOX.text:
The mysterious power restores mana gauge,
which increases Heroes' attack power.

TEXT_WR_MANA_BLOCK_1_GUIDE_BOX_2.text: When mana gauge is filled, skill [Overflowing Mana] deals powerful damage to enemies and empties the gauge.

TEXT_WR_MANA_BLOCK_2_GUIDE_BOX.text:
Use the stream of mana to heal your health,
and increase your attack power.

TEXT_WR_MANA_BLOCK_3_GUIDE_BOX.text: Use the stream of mana to attack Avenir.

TEXT_WR_MANA_BLOCK_NPC_ELLIE.text:
Rata and I will 
try activating the machine!

TEXT_WR_MANA_BLOCK_NPC_RATA.text:
Squeak? There's a strange power
coming out from this machine!

TEXT_WR_MANA_BLOCK_SIS_FOREST.text:
There is a strange power
pervading this palace…

TEXT_WR_REBLIND_SIS_CHRONOS.text:
Darkness falls once more.
Use the flash grenade.

TEXT_WR_SMOKE_BLUE_SIS_FOREST.text:
The monster with the blue aura
seems to have grown weaker.

TEXT_WR_SMOKE_EMPTY_ROCHEFORT.text:
Have you run out already?
Tsk, wait a little.

TEXT_WR_SMOKE_EMPTY_SIS_FOREST.text:
I'll take out another
smoke grenade.

TEXT_WR_SMOKE_GUIDE_BOX.text: Use the smoke grenade block to disarm the enemy.

TEXT_WR_SMOKE_RED_SIS_FOREST.text:
The monster with the red aura
seems to have grown weaker.

TEXT_WR_SMOKE_ROCHEFORT.text:
I'm sure we've weakened the enemy.
Now, for the final stroke.

TEXT_WR_SMOKE_YELLOW_SIS_FOREST.text:
The monster with the yellow aura
seems to have grown weaker.

TEXT_WR_WORLDBOSS_SANDSTORM.text:
What's that sandstorm?
We can't use our Goddess powers!

TEXT_YS8_DUNGEON_LOCK_DESC.text: You must rescue more Castaways to enter the dungeon.
